Fikirku fikir insaani wa achaan da, ana gaa’id nihajji be kalaam hayyin misil al-naas buguuluuh. Misil awwal sallamtu ajsaamku le l-zunuub al-najjasooku wa le l-khataaya al-sawwooku khaatiyiin be ziyaada, hassa’ waajib tisallumu ajsaamku le l-haal al-saalhe wa tabgo naas Allah al-saalihiin.
Wa wakit intu kuntu abiid le l-zanib, ma gidirtu titaabu’u al-haal al-saalhe.
Wa ween al-faayde al-ligiituuha min al-zunuub al-awwal sawweetuuhum dool ? Hassa’ al-eeb karabaaku be sababhum achaan al-zunuub dool yiwaddu al-naas le l-moot.
Laakin hassa’ intu muharrariin min al-zanib wa bigiitu abiid Allah. Wa l-faayde al-talgooha, hi al-haal al-saalhe wa hi tiwaddi al-naas le l-haya al-abadiiye.
Achaan ujrat al-zanib hi al-moot wa l-atiiye al-Allah yantiiha bala taman hi al-haya al-abadiiye fi Rabbina Isa al-Masiih.
Ya akhwaani, intu al-nihajji leeku ta’arfu charii’at al-Tawraat. Wa akiid ta’arfu kadar al-charii’a indaha gudra fi l-naadum wakit hu hayy bas.
Masalan, al-mara al-maakhde marbuuta ma’a raajilha be l-charii’a wakit hu hayy. Laakin kan raajilha maat, al-mara tabga hurra min rubaat al-charii’a.

Wa be misil da, kan machat akhadat raajil aakhar wakit raajilha lissaa’ gaa’id hayy, al-charii’a tuguul hi zaaniye. Laakin kan raajilha maat, hi tabga hurra min al-charii’a di. Wa kan tamchi taakhud raajil aakhar kula, al-charii’a ma tuguul hi zaaniye.

Wa bigi leeku misil da, ya akhwaani. Wakit katalo al-Masiih, intu muttu fi jismah wa bigiitu hurriin min churuut al-Tawraat. Wa be da, tagdaro tichiilu sayyid aakhar wa hu al-naadum al-ba’as min ust al-maytiin. Wa nadkhulu fi l-alaakha al-ma’aayah di achaan nisawwu al-kheer al-Allah yidoorah.
Wakit aniina lissaa’na aaychiin be l-gudra al-insaaniiye bas, wasaaya al-Tawraat sabbabo fi ajsaamna al-chahwaat al-fasliin wa l-chahwaat dool lazzoona le nisawwu al-cheyy al-yiwaddiina le l-moot.

Laakin hassa’ aniina hurriin min churuut al-Tawraat achaan mutna ma’a al-Masiih wa anhalleena min churuut al-Tawraat. Wa be misil da, na’abudu Allah ma be l-ibaada al-gadiime al-hasab al-kalaam al-maktuub, laakin be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus fi l-haya al-jadiide.

Wa kan nuguulu wasaaya al-Tawraat sabbabo foogna zunuub, fi l-kalaam da nuguulu al-Tawraat wa l-zunuub akhwaan walla ? La, abadan. Ma ke achaan awwal ana ma irift al-zanib wa l-Tawraat bas hu arrafaani leyah. Awwal kan al-Tawraat ma gaal {Ma tatma’}, ana ma na’arif al-tama’.
Laakin al-zanib ligi fursa be l-wasiiye wa sabbab foogi kulla nafar al-tama’. Achaan kan wasaaya Allah ma fiihum, al-zanib mayyit.
Awwal ana hayy wa ma irift kalaam al-Tawraat laakin al-wasiiye jaat leyi wa l-zanib hiyi foogi
wa khalaas ana mutt. Wa be misil da, al-wasiiye al-dawwarat tiwaddiini le l-haya waddatni le l-moot.
Achaan al-zanib ligi fursa be jayyit al-wasiiye wa gamma khachchaani wa karab al-wasiiye achaan yaktulni beeha.
Wa khalaas, al-Tawraat mukhaddas wa l-wasiiye mukhaddasa wa saalhe wa adiile.

Wa be misil da, al-cheyy al-adiil katalaani walla ? La, abadan. Laakin al-zanib karab al-cheyy al-adiil wa beyah sabbab foogi al-moot. Wa misil da, al-zanib yin’arif. Wa be l-wasiiye zaatha, charr al-zanib yinchaaf marra waahid.
Na’arfu kadar kalaam al-Tawraat hu hana l-Ruuh, ya’ni jaayi min Allah, laakin ana bachari bas. Ana misil abid wa l-zanib hu misil siidi.
Ana ma nafham al-cheyy al-nisawwiih achaan al-cheyy al-ana nidoor nisawwiih, da ma nisawwiih. Laakin al-cheyy al-ma niriidah, da bas al-cheyy al-nisawwiih.
Wa kan ana gaa’id nisawwi al-cheyy al-fi nafsi ma nidoor nisawwiih, misil da ana nistafig ma’a kalaam Allah wa nuguul hu sahiih wa adiil.
Wa be da, ana ma al-naadum al-yisawwi al-fi’il da. Al-yisawwi al-fi’il hu al-zanib al-gaa’id foogi.
Na’arif ma fi cheyy adiil gaa’id foogi, ya’ni fi tabii’ti al-bachariiye. Indi niiye nisawwi al-kheer laakin ma nagdar.
Ma nisawwi al-kheer al-nidoor nisawwiih laakin al-fasaala al-ma nidoor nisawwiiha, di bas al-cheyy al-nisawwiih.
Wa kan ana gaa’id nisawwi al-cheyy al-ma nidoor nisawwiih, be misil da al-bisawwiih ma ana laakin hu al-zanib al-gaa’id foogi.
Ana chift kadar da bas al-cheyy al-daayman bigi leyi. Kan nidoor nisawwi al-kheer, illa al-fasaala titaatir leyi.
Fi galbi, ana niriid wasaaya Allah
laakin nihiss fi nafsi cheyy aakhar al-gaa’id fi jismi al-yidoor yamlukni wa hu yidaawis fikri. Wa khalaas, ana bigiit masjuun fi tihit muluk al-zanib al-gaa’id fi jismi.
Haay ! Ana naadum ta’baan marra waahid. Yaatu al-yinajjiini min jismi da al-yiwaddiini fi l-moot ?

Illa Allah yinajjiini be Rabbina Isa al-Masiih wa l-hamdulillah. Wa khalaas, be misil da ana abid le Allah fi agli wa nidoor nitaabi’ muraadtah laakin ana kula abid le l-zanib fi nafsi wa nitaabi’ muraadat al-zanib achaan ana bachar bas.
Wa khalaas, Allah abadan ma yahkim be l-azaab al-naas al-gaa’idiin fi l-Masiih Isa.
Wa derib al-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-yanti al-haya fi l-Masiih Isa harraraani min al-derib al-gadiim al-waddaani fi l-zanib wa l-moot.

Churuut al-Tawraat abadan ma gidro yinajju al-naas achaan du’uf al-naas daharaahum. Wa Allah zaatah sawwa al-cheyy al-churuut al-Tawraat ma gidro sawwooh. Hu rassal Ibnah al-waahid le yabga insaan fi jisim misil ajsaam al-muznibiin achaan yamha al-zanib. Wa wakit hu fi jismah al-bachari da, hu hakam foog al-zanib marra waahid.
Wa Allah sawwa misil da achaan al-Masiih yitimm chart al-Tawraat al-aadil fiina aniina al-aaychiin be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus wa ma be gudrat al-bachar.

Aywa, al-naas al-aaychiin be gudrat al-bachar yukhuttu fikirhum fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-naas laakin al-aaychiin be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus yukhuttu fikirhum fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-Ruuh al-Khudduus.
Al-naadum al-aglah saabit fi fikir al-bachar, hu mayyit. Wa laakin al-naadum al-aglah saabit fi fikir al-Ruuh al-Khudduus indah al-haya wa l-salaam.
Achaan al-naadum al-aglah saabit fi l-fikir al-bachari, hu da aasi Allah wa ma yukhutt nafsah tihit wasaaya Allah. Hu ma yagdar kula.
Al-naas al-aaychiin be gudrat al-bachar ma mumkin yalgo rida min Allah.
Laakin intu ma aaychiin be gudrat al-bachar. Intu naas hana Ruuh Allah achaan Ruuh Allah saakin fiiku. Wa kan naadum ma indah Ruuh al-Masiih, hu ma hana l-Masiih.
Ajsaamku yumuutu be sabab al-zanib laakin kan al-Masiih gaa’id fi guluubku, al-Ruuh al-Khudduus hu hayaatku achaan bigiitu saalihiin.
Kan Ruuh Allah al-ba’as Isa min ust al-maytiin saakin fiiku, akiid Allah al-ba’as al-Masiih min ust al-maytiin kula yanti al-haya le ajsaamku al-yumuutu, be Ruuhah al-saakin fiiku.
Khalaas ya akhwaani, be sabab al-rahma al-kabiire di, fiyah waajib foogna wa l-waajib da ma bukhuss al-tabii’a al-bachariiye. Waajib ma titaabu’u fikir al-bachar.
Kan ti’iichu be gudrat al-bachar, tumuutu. Laakin kan be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus taktulu al-zunuub al-fi ajsaamku, misil da tahyo.
Achaan al-naas al-yikhallu Ruuh Allah yuguudhum, humman bas awlaad Allah.

Wa Allah nazzal foogku Ruuhah ma achaan yisawwiiku abiid aaychiin battaan be l-khoof. La. Al-Ruuh al-nazzalah foogku hu al-Ruuh al-yisawwiiku iyaal Allah wa be sabab al-Ruuh da kullina ninaadu be hiss aali «Abba, Abuuna !».
Al-Ruuh al-Khudduus zaatah yachhad fi nufuusna kadar aniina iyaal Allah.
Wa kan aniina iyaalah, aniina kula wurraasah. Aniina wurraas Allah. Aniina wurraasah ma’a al-Masiih. Achaan kan nat’abo ma’a l-Masiih, nadkhulu ma’a l-Masiih fi majdah kula.
Ta’ab hana wakitna da, nahsibah chiyya wakit nukhutt fikri fi l-majd al-Allah yibayyinah leena ba’adeen.
Yoom waahid, Allah yibayyin majd hana awlaad Allah. Wa kulla cheyy al-Allah khalagah gaa’id yitmanna jayyit al-yoom da bilheen.
Achaan al-khaliige zaatha fachalat achaan hi marbuuta. Wa hi bigat marbuuta ma be niiyitha laakin be niiyit Allah al-rabatha
achaan Allah yidoor yihillaha min al-rubaat al-sabbab leeha al-talaaf wa hi talga al-hurriiye al-majiide ma’a iyaal Allah fi l-yoom al-Allah yibayyin foogah majd iyaalah.
Na’arfu kadar lahaddi l-yoom al-khaliige kullaha gaa’ide tat’ab be ta’ab misil waja’ al-talaga.

Wa l-khaliige ma tat’ab wiheedha. Aniina al-indina al-Ruuh al-Khudduus wa di awwal baraka min al-barakaat al-Allah yidoor yantiina, aniina kula nagnutu min al-ta’ab al-fi guluubna. Wa narjo Allah yafda ajsaamna wa yikammil amalah foogna wa nabgo awlaad Allah marra waahid.
Wa Allah najjaana achaan nalgo al-baraka di wa narjooha be acham. Wa kan naadum buguul hu yarja cheyy waahid wa laakin ligiih, khalaas da ma al-raja. Yaatu al-yarja al-cheyy al-ligiih khalaas ?
Laakin kan narjo cheyy waahid lissaa’ ba’iid chiyya ma binchaaf, narjooh be l-sabur.
Wa misil da, al-Ruuh al-Khudduus kula yi’aawinna achaan aniina da’iifiin. Ma na’arfu kikkeef waajib nisallu laakin al-Ruuh al-Khudduus yisalli leena be gannataan faayit lukhkhaat al-naas.
Wa Allah al-yimtahin guluub al-naas, hu ya’arif niiyit al-Ruuh al-Khudduus achaan al-Ruuh al-Khudduus yilwassat le l-saalihiin hasab muraadat Allah.
Wa na’arfu kadar fi kulla cheyy, Allah yisawwi al-kheer le l-naas al-yihibbuuh wa humman al-naas al-Allah naadaahum fi derbah le yitimmu al-cheyy al-hu nazzamah.
Achaan al-naas al-Allah irifaahum min awwal, hu chaal niiye achaan yisawwiihum yichaabuhu misil Ibnah Isa al-Masiih wa misil da, Ibnah Isa al-Masiih yukuun al-bikir wa ma’aayah akhwaan katiiriin.
Wa l-naas al-Allah ikhtaaraahum, hu naadaahum. Wa l-naas al-naadaahum dool, hu sawwaahum saalihiin. Wa l-sawwaahum saalihiin dool, hu antaahum bakaan ma’aayah fi majdah.
Wa khalaas, ba’ad kulla l-kalaam da, nuguulu chunu ? Kan Allah hu ma’aana, yaatu al-yikhaalifna ?
Allah gaadir yahfad ma’aayah Ibnah al-waahid laakin sallamah le l-moot le faayditna kullina. Wa hu al-antaana Ibnah ma indah niiye yantiina min ni’matah kulla cheyy walla ?
Yaatu al-yatham al-naas al-Allah ikhtaaraahum ? Allah ma yathamhum. Hu bas al-yibaariihum.
Yaatu al-yi’aakhibhum ? Al-Masiih Isa ma yi’aakhibhum. Be l-aks, daahu al-maat fi chaanna wa ziyaada min da, hu ba’as wa gaa’id jamb Allah fi nussah al-zeenaay wa bigi leena wasiit.
Chunu ke al-yagdar yifarrigna min mahabbat al-Masiih leena ? Cheyy ma yagdar ! Wa la l-ta’ab wa la l-diikhe wa la l-azaab wa la l-juu’ wa la l-ire wa la l-khutuura wa la l-seef.
Wa l-achya dool yaju foogna wa maktuub fi l-Kitaab {yikattuluuna kulla yoom achaan aniina naasak wa yahsubuuna misil khanam hana l-dabiiha}.
Laakin kulla l-su’uubaat dool, aniina ninnasru fooghum be ziyaada be l-Masiih al-yihibbina.
Wa nuguul leeku be l-akiid, wa la l-moot wa la l-haya, wa la l-malaa’ika wa la kubaaraat al-chawaatiin, wa la cheyy hana l-zaman da wa la cheyy hana l-zaman al-jaayi, wa la ayyi cheyy al-indah gudra,
wa la cheyy foog wa la cheyy tihit, wa la cheyy waahid min kulla l-achya al-Allah khalagaahum ma yagdaro yifarruguuna min mahabbat Allah leena fi l-Masiih Isa Rabbina.
Nuguul leeku al-hagg be usum al-Masiih wa kalaami ma kidib. Wa galbi yachhad leyi ma’a al-Ruuh al-Khudduus kadar kalaami sahiih.
Ana haznaan bilheen wa galbi daayman booja’ni.
Ana nitmanna Allah yan’alni wa yifarrigni ana zaati min al-Masiih, kan be da naas gabiilti yanjo, achaan humman akhwaani.

Humman bas Bani Israa’iil, al-cha’ab al-Allah ikhtaaraahum. Allah naadaahum le yabgo iyaalah wa jahhaz leehum al-majd wa sawwa ma’aahum al-mu’aahadaat wa nazzal leehum al-Tawraat wa antaahum al-ibaada. Wa leehum humman antaahum al-wu’uud.
Al-juduud al-machhuuriin minhum
Ma tukhuttu fi uguulku kadar kalaam Allah al-gaalah le Bani Israa’iil fachal. Ma fachal achaan ma kulla Bani Israa’iil cha’ab Allah al-ikhtaaraahum.
Wa zamaan kula, Allah ma hasab kulla iyaal Ibraahiim fi zurriiytah laakin gaal {Min Ishaakh bas talga zurriiye al-binaaduuha be usmak}.
Wa min al-kalaam da, na’arfu kadar Allah ma yahsib kulla l-naas al-jo min sulub Ibraahiim iyaal Allah. Illa al-naas al-wildoohum hasab wa’ad Allah, humman bas yahsibhum al-zurriiye.
Achaan Allah waa’ad Ibraahiim fi l-kalaam al-buguul {Fi l-sana al-jaaye fi nafs al-wakit, ana naji wa nalga martak Saara wildat leek wileed}.
Wa be ziyaada min al-kalaam da, fakkuru fi Rifga kula. Hi bigat khalbaane wa iyaalha induhum abu waahid wa hu jiddina Ishaakh.
Laakin gubbaal al-tiimaan ma yaldoohum wa gubbaal humman ma yisawwu cheyy wa la zeen wa la fasil, Allah chaal niiye wa ikhtaar waahid minhum achaan niiyit Allah titimm be l-ikhtiyaar.
Hu yinaadi al-naas hasab niiyitah wa ma hasab al-cheyy al-yisawwuuh. Wa khalaas gaal le Rifga {Al-kabiir yakhdim le l-sakhayyar}.
Wa l-Kitaab zaatah buguul {Ana habbeetah le Yaakhuub wa ma habbeetah le Isuu}.
Wa fi l-kalaam da, nuguulu chunu ? Nuguulu Allah hu zaalim walla ? Abadan, ma ke !
Achaan Allah gaal le Muusa {Ana narham ayyi naadum al-nidoor narhamah wa nihinn ayyi naadum al-nidoor nihinnah}.
Wa be misil da kan Allah ikhtaar naadum, da ma achaan niiyit al-naadum wa ma achaan al-cheyy al-naadum sawwaah. Allah ikhtaarah achaan hu dawwar yarhamah bas.
Wa fi l-Kitaab, Allah buguul le Fir’oon {Ana sawweetak naadum kabiir achaan chilt niiye le niwassif foogak gudurti wa yihajju be usmi fi kulla l-ard}.
Wa min al-kalaam da, na’arfu kadar Allah yarham al-naadum al-yidoor yarhamah wa yigawwi raas al-naadum al-yidoor yigawwi raasah.
Wa tas’alni tuguul «Kan Allah yisawwi misil da, maala hu yuluum ayyi naadum ? Ween al-naadum al-yadhar niiyit Allah ?».
Laakin inta yaatu, ya insaan ? Fi fikrak tagdar tuluum Allah walla ? Kan usta sana’ chokhol waahid, hal al-chokhol al-sana’ah da indah hagg yuguul «Maala sana’tani misil da» walla ?

Al-basiiri ma indah hagg foog al-tiine walla ? Min koom waahid hana tiine yudugg maa’uun le amal khaass wa maa’uun taani le amal aadi. Wa fi l-masal da, al-basiiri hu Allah wa l-mawaa’iin humman al-naas.
Wa tuguul chunu kan Allah dawwar yibayyin khadabah wa gudurtah foog al-mawaa’iin al-hu khadbaan fooghum al-jaahiziin le l-halaak wa laakin tawwal himilaahum be l-sabur ?
Wa himilaahum tawwal achaan dawwar yibayyin kutur kheerah al-majiid le mawaa’iin aakhariin al-yidoor yarhamhum wa jahhazaahum le yadkhulu fi majdah.
Wa dool aniina al-Allah naadaana, ma min ust al-Yahuud bas laakin min kulla l-umam.
Wa da yiwaafig ma’a l-kalaam al-gaalah fi kitaab al-nabi Huucha’. Gaal {Al-naas al-awwal ma naasi, ninaadiihum achaan yabgo naasi. Wa l-cha’ab al-awwal ma habbeethum, nuguul leehum «Ya l-mahbuubiin».
Wa fi l-bakaan al-Allah gaal foogah «intu ma naasi», fi nafs al-bakaan Allah al-Hayy yuguul «Humman awlaadi»}.
Wa laakin foog Bani Israa’iil al-nabi Icha’ya hajja be hiss aali wa gaal {Kan Bani Israa’iil bigo katiiriin misil ramla hana khachum al-bahar kula, chiyya minhum bas yanjo.
Achaan Allah chaal kharaar foog al-ard wa hu yitimmah ajala wa yisawwiih tamaam marra waahid}.
Wa yabga misil Icha’ya gaal yabga. Hu gaal {Kan awwal Allah al-Gaadir ma khalla leena zurriiye, aniina nabgo misil naas hana hillit Saduum al-hiliko wa nabgo ma fiina misil naas hana hillit Gamuura}.
Fi kulla l-kalaam da, nuguulu chunu ? Al-naas al-ma Yahuud ma jaahado achaan yabgo saalihiin wa laakin bigo saalihiin. Wa bigo saalihiin be derib al-iimaan.
Wa Bani Israa’iil taaba’o kalaam al-Tawraat wa jaahado beyah achaan yabgo saalihiin laakin fachalo.
Wa da maala ? Achaan ma taaba’o derib al-iimaan. Wa fi fikirhum humman yabgo saalihiin be sabab al-amal al-yisawwuuh. Wa khalaas, humman antaggo foog {al-hajar al-yarmiihum
Wa achaan da bas al-Kitaab buguul {Asma’o, ana nukhutt fi Sahyuun
Ya akhwaani fi l-Masiih, nitmanna be kulla galbi kadar akhwaani al-Yahuud yanjo wa da al-cheyy al-ana daayman natlubah min Allah.
Ana nachhad leehum kadar humman munkaribiin fi ibaadat Allah laakin fiyah cheyy waahid ma ya’arfuuh.
Humman ma ya’arfu kikkeef Allah yisawwi al-naas saalihiin wa khalaas yidooru yabgo saalihiin be juhudhum wa abo ma yakhbalo al-derib al-Allah fatahah le l-naas al-beyah yabgo saalihiin.
Al-Masiih ja wa tamma churuut al-Tawraat wa be l-Masiih kulla l-naas yabgo saalihiin, kan yi’aamunu beyah.
Wa fi l-Kitaab, Muusa fassar leena kikkeef al-naas yabgo saalihiin be churuut al-Tawraat. Hu gaal {Al-naadum al-yitabbig kulla l-churuut dool yahya beehum}.
Laakin maktuub battaan kadar al-naas yabgo saalihiin be l-iimaan. Buguul {Ma tuguul fi galbak, yaatu al-yatla’ fi l-sama ?} ya’ni achaan yinazzil al-Masiih.
{Wa ma tuguul yaatu al-yanzil fi l-haawiya ?} ya’ni achaan yamrug al-Masiih min ust al-maytiin.
Laakin al-cheyy al-buguulah chunu ? Buguul {Al-kalaam gaa’id gariib leek. Hu fi khachmak wa fi galbak}. Wa l-kalaam da, hu kalaam al-iimaan al-niballukhuuh leeku.
Kan be khachmak tachhad le Isa wa tuguul hu al-Rabb wa fi galbak ti’aamin kadar Allah ba’asah min ust al-maytiin, be misil da tanja khalaas.
Achaan be sabab al-iimaan al-gaa’id fi l-galib, Allah yaj’al al-naadum saalih wa be sabab chahaadat khachmah, Allah yinajjiih.
Al-Kitaab buguul ayyi naadum al-yi’aamin beyah ma yafchul abadan.
Wa da bigi sawa sawa le l-Yahuud wa le l-ma Yahuud achaan al-Rabb al-waahid, hu Rabb kulla l-naas wa hu kariim le ayyi naadum al-yad’i be usmah.
Achaan maktuub {Ayyi naadum al-yad’i be usum al-Rabb yanja}.
Wa kikkeef yad’u be l-Rabb, kan ma aamano beyah ? Wa kikkeef yi’aamunu be l-Rabb, kan awwal ma induhum beyah khabar ? Wa kikkeef yasma’o al-kalaam, kan ma fi naadum al-yiballikh leehum al-bichaara ?
Wa kikkeef yiballukhu leehum al-bichaara, kan ma rassalo leehum murassaliin ? Achaan da, al-Kitaab buguul {Kan al-naas jaayiin be l-bichaara, da halu bilheen}.
Wa laakin ma kulla l-naas khiblo al-bichaara. Achaan da, al-nabi Icha’ya gaal {Ya Allah, ballakhna kalaamak laakin yaatu al-saddakh beyah ?}.
Khalaas, al-naas ma yabgo mu’miniin be l-Masiih illa kan yasma’o al-bichaara wa ma yasma’o al-bichaara illa kan naadum yiballikhha leehum.

Laakin nas’al cheyy waahid. Sahiih, humman lissaa’ ma sim’o al-bichaara di walla ? La, humman sim’ooha. Al-Kitaab buguul {Hiss al-murassaliin ansama’ fi kulla l-ard wa kalaamhum lihig kulla bakaan fi l-dunya}.
Wa battaan nas’al, Bani Israa’iil ma fihmo al-kalaam walla ? Awwal be khachum Muusa, Allah gaal {Nisawwiiku hasuudiin fi l-naas al-ma cha’abi wa niza’’ilku be l-naas al-jaahiliin}.
Wa l-nabi Icha’ya gamma hajja kalaam Allah leehum bala chakak wa gaal {Al-naas al-ligo barakaati, ma al-naas al-jaahado le ya’arfuuni. Wa bayyant gudurti le l-naas al-ma talabo minni cheyy}.
Laakin foog Bani Israa’iil, hu gaal {Kulla ma yoom ana gaa’id nimidd iideeni ninaadi al-cha’ab da laakin humman aasiyiin wa raashum gawi}.
Wa achaan da, ana nas’al su’aal. Allah aba cha’abah Bani Israa’iil marra waahid walla ? La, abadan. Ana zaati min Bani Israa’iil wa min zurriiyit Ibraahiim wa min gabiilit Banyaamiin.
Allah ma aba cha’abah al-ikhtaarah min awwal. Walla nisiitu al-kalaam al-maktuub fi l-Kitaab fi l-nabi Iliyaas ? Fi bakaan waahid, hu hajja le Allah wa chaka min Bani Israa’iil
wa gaal {Ya Allah, humman katalo al-anbiya al-rassaltuhum wa dammaro bakaanaat al-ibaada. Wa ana faddalt wiheedi wa humman yifattuchuuni le yaktuluuni}.
Wa laakin Allah radda leyah kikkeef ? Hu gaal {Ana hafadt minhum sab’a alif naadum le ya’abuduuni wa abadan ma sajado giddaam asnaam Ba’al}.
Wa l-cheyy al-gaa’id yabga hassa’ hu misil al-cheyy al-bigi fi l-wakit daak. Wa faddalo minhum naas chiyya al-yitaabu’u Allah. Wa l-naas al-faddalo gaa’idiin achaan Allah ikhtaaraahum wa di ni’ma.
Wa kan di ni’ma, da ma bigi be sabab ayyi cheyy al-sawwooh. Achaan kan Allah ikhtaar al-naas be sabab al-cheyy al-sawwooh, da yabga leehum ajur wa da ma ni’ma.
Wa kikkeef ? Al-baraka al-Bani Israa’iil talabooha, ma ligooha. Illa al-naas al-Allah ikhtaaraahum min ambeenaathum bas ligooha. Wa l-aakhariin ruuseenhum bigo gawiiyiin wa ma sim’o kalaam Allah.
Achaan da, maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Allah sawwa fikirhum tagiil wa uyuunhum ma yichiifu adiil wa udneehum ma yasma’o adiil lahaddi l-yoom}.
Wa l-nabi Dawuud gaal {Khalli al-bakaan al-yaakulu foogah yabga leehum misil charak al-yakrubhum wa yabga misil chokhol al-yintaggu foogah wa bakaan hana azaab.
Khalli uyuunhum yinsaddo achaan ma yichiifu wa min chiddit al-ta’ab khalliihum ma yarfa’o raashum}.

Wa achaan da nas’al su’aal. Humman waga’o marra waahid lahaddi battaan ma yugummu foog walla ? La, abadan. Humman waga’o wa be khataahum da, najaat Allah lihigat al-naas al-ma Yahuud achaan yisawwi al-Yahuud yihassuduuhum.

Wa kan khata al-Yahuud sabbab baraka kabiire le naas al-dunya wa maskanat al-Yahuud sabbabat baraka kabiire le l-naas al-ma Yahuud, akiid kan al-Yahuud yigabbulu marra waahid fi l-derib, da yabga leena baraka kabiire be ziyaada.
Ya l-naas al-ma Yahuud, ana gaa’id nihajji leeku. Ana al-rasuul al-murassal le l-naas al-ma Yahuud wa ana farhaan bilheen be khidimti
achaan akuun nisawwi akhwaani al-Yahuud yihassuduuku wa akuun be misil da ninajji waahidiin minhum.
Wakit Allah aba al-Yahuud, naas al-dunya ligo salaam ma’a Allah. Wa kan bigi misil ke, yabga kikkeef wakit Allah yakhbal al-Yahuud battaan ? Da yijiib bu’aas al-maytiin.
Kan al-khalla al-nijdat fi l-awwal hi hana Allah, al-ajiin al-bisawwuuh minha kula hana Allah

Wa misil da, zurriiyit Ibraahiim misil chadarat al-zaytuun wa furuu’ waahidiin gata’oohum minha. Wa inta al-ma Yahuudi, inta misil firi’ hana l-zaytuun al-bandar. Wa chaalook wa lassagook fi l-chadara al-fi l-jineene fi badal al-furuu’ al-gata’oohum. Wa misil da, inta kula ti’iich min al-ga’ar al-adiil ma’a al-furuu’ al-faddalo.
Wa be misil da, waajib inta ma tifaachir foog al-furuu’ al-gata’oohum. Wa kan tidoor tifaachir kamaan, fakkir kadar inta ma gaa’id ti’ayyich al-ga’ar laakin al-ga’ar hu gaa’id yi’ayyichak inta.
Akuun tuguul «Al-furuu’ dool gata’oohum achaan siid al-jineene dawwar yilassigni ana fi l-chadara fi badalhum».
Kalaamak da sahiih. Laakin ma tansa gata’oohum achaan humman ma aamano wa inta gaa’id fi bakaanhum be sabab iimaanak bas. Ma tistakbar. Akheer tukhutt baalak.
Kan Allah ma afa furuu’ al-chadara, hu ma ya’afaak inta.

Fakkir fi mahannat Allah wa fakkir fi hukmah al-gawi kula. Hukmah gawi fi l-naas al-marago min al-derib laakin hu hanuun leek bilheen, kan tagood saabit fi mahannatah. Wa kan ma tagood saabit, inta kula yagta’ook.
Wa Bani Israa’iil kula, kan yikhallu minhum kufurhum, Allah yigabbilhum battaan fi bakaanhum al-awwal gaa’idiin foogah achaan Allah gaadir.

Wa nuguulu inta firi’ min al-bandar. Wa Allah gata’ak minnah wa lassagaak fi l-zaytuunaay al-magganaaha. Wa da ma al-bakaan al-waajib leek. Achaan da, yabga hayyin le Allah yigabbil al-furuu’ al-gata’aahum wa yilassighum fi l-bakaan al-waajib leehum.

Ya akhwaani, nidoor ni’ooriiku be sirr waahid al-Allah bayyanah leyi. Ni’ooriiku beyah achaan kan fihimtuuh adiil, ma tistakbaro fi afkaarku. Waahidiin min Bani Israa’iil bigo aasiyiin wa ma yi’aamunu be Isa al-Masiih. Wa isyaanhum da yuduum lahaddi adad al-mu’miniin min al-umam yitimm al-adad al-Allah yidoorah.
Wa be misil da, Israa’iil kulla ke yanja khalaas. Achaan da, maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Al-yinajjiihum yaji min Sahyuun
Wa misil ana gult fi l-mu’aahada al-sawweetha ma’aahum, ana namha minhum zunuubhum}.
Fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss bichaarat al-Masiih, Bani Israa’iil yikhaalufu Allah wa min isyaanhum intu ligiitu faayde. Laakin fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss ikhtiyaar Allah, humman mahbuubiin be sabab juduudhum.
Achaan kan Allah anta naadum atiiye, hu ma yandam leeha. Wa kan naada naadum, ma yibattil munaadaatah.
Intu al-ma Yahuud awwal aasiyiin laakin hassa’ Allah rahamaaku be sabab isyaan Bani Israa’iil.
Wa hassa’ Bani Israa’iil bigo aasiyiin wa be l-rahmat al-Allah rahamaaku beeha, humman kula yalgo rahma.
Achaan fi nizaam Allah kulla l-umam marbuutiin fi isyaanhum achaan fi l-akhiir, Allah yarham kulla l-umam sawa sawa.
Al-hamdulillah al-aliim wa l-hakiim. Hikimtah wa ilmah abadan ma induhum hadd ! Hikmat hukmah nafhamo minha illa chiyya. Wa nizaamah ajiib lahaddi ma yilfassar.
Achaan da, al-Kitaab buguul {Yaatu al-irif afkaar Allah ? Yaatu al-bigi leyah siid choortah !
Yaatu al-indah deen foog Allah, hatta Allah waajib yikaffi leyah cheyy !}.
Kulla cheyy jaayi min Allah wa gaa’id be gudrat Allah wa mawjuud fi chaan Allah. Wa l-hamdulillah ila l-abad. Aamiin.

Ya akhwaani, achaan kulla l-kalaam da wa be sabab kutur rahmat Allah al-ligiituuha, niwassi ayyi waahid minku achaan yigaddim jismah le Allah dahiiye hayye wa mukhaddasa misil Allah yarda beeha. Wa diihi ibaaditku al-waajbe.

Aabo ma titaabu’u fikir hana naas al-dunya laakin khalli Allah yikhayyirku wa yantiiku al-agul al-jadiid al-beyah tagdaro timayyuzu muraadat Allah wa ta’arfu al-cheyy al-adiil wa l-cheyy al-Allah yarda beyah wa l-cheyy al-tamaam.
Wa be l-ni’ma al-Allah antaaha leyi, niwassiiku achaan naadum minku ma yistakbar. Khalli ayyi waahid yahsib nafsah be fikir adiil hasab gudrat al-iimaan al-Allah antaaha leyah.
Chiifu, al-naadum indah fi jismah al-waahid a’da katiiriin wa kulla udu ma yisawwi nafs al-khidme.
Be misil da kula, aniina naas katiiriin laakin bigiina misil jisim waahid fi l-Masiih. Wa ayyi waahid hu udu fi l-jisim da wa bigi akhu le l-aakhariin kulluhum.
Indina ataaya chig chig hasab ni’mat Allah. Wa kan Allah anta le naadum gudra le yihajji kalaam naazil min Allah, khalli yihajji fi huduud al-iimaan.
Wa kan Allah anta le naadum gudra le yakhdim fi ust al-akhwaan, khalli yakhdim. Wa kan Allah anta le naadum gudra le yi’allim al-naas, khalli yi’allimhum.

Wa kan Allah anta le naadum gudra le yichajji’ al-akhwaan, khalli yichajji’hum. Wa kan Allah anta le naadum gudra le yanti, khalli yanti be galib nadiif. Wa kan Allah anta le naadum gudra le yuguud akhwaanah, khalli yukhutt baalah wa yuguudhum adiil ke. Wa kan Allah anta le naadum gudra le yihinn fi l-naas, khalli yihinn fiihum be l-farah.
Hibbu ayyi naadum be mahabba sahiihe. Akraho al-charr marra waahid wa akurbu al-kheer gawi.
Arraayado ambeenaatku misil akhwaan wa khalli ayyi waahid yichiil niiye achaan yihibb akhuuh be l-ihtiraam.
Taabu’u Rabbina be niiye waahide wa bala kasal. Inkarubu fi khidmit al-Rabb.
Afraho achaan induku acham fi Rabbina. Asburu fi l-ta’ab wa sallu daayman bala kasal.
Saa’udu al-muhtaajiin al-ambeen al-saalihiin wa dayyufu be l-farah al-diifaan al-bajuuku.
Saamuhu al-naas al-yita’’ubuuku wa baarukuuhum. Aywa, baarukuuhum wa ma tan’aloohum.
Afraho ma’a l-farhaaniin wa ahzano ma’a l-haznaaniin.
Alwaafago ambeenaatku wa khalli ayyi waahid ma yaj’al nafsah kabiir laakin khalli yaj’al nafsah sakhayyar. Ma tisawwu nufuusku induku irfe katiire.
Kan naadum sawwa foogku chokhol fasil, ma tisawwu leyah chokhol fasil. Fakkuru wa sawwu al-cheyy al-kulla l-naas yardo beyah.
Jaahudu be ayyi daliil achaan ti’iichu be l-salaam ma’a kulla l-naas.
Ya l-mahbuubiin, ma tikaffu al-taar. Khallu khadab Allah yichiil leeku al-taar achaan maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Al-taar hanaayi. Ana bas al-nichiilah. Da bas kalaam Allah}.
Akheer kan titaabu’u al-kalaam al-buguul {Kan aduuk jii’aan, antiih yaakul. Wa kan hu atchaan, antiih yachrab. Kan tisawwi misil ke da, tusubb eeb misil jamur fi raasah}.
Ma tikhallu al-charr yansur foogku laakin ansuru foog al-charr be l-kheer.
Khalli ayyi naadum yasma’ kalaam al-hakuuma achaan ma fi hakuuma illa be izin Allah wa ayyi hakuuma al-gaa’ide Allah assasaaha.
Achaan da, ayyi naadum al-yikhaalif al-hakuuma, yikhaalif al-cheyy al-Allah assasah. Wa l-yikhaalif da, hukum Allah yanzil foogah.
Achaan al-naadum al-haalah adiile ma yakhaaf min al-kubaaraat illa al-naadum al-haalah fasle hu yakhaaf minhum. Kan tidoor ma takhaaf min al-haakim, khalaas sawwi al-kheer wa l-haakim yachkurak.

Al-haakim hu khaddaam Allah achaan yisawwi leek al-kheer. Laakin kan inta mujrim laabudda takhaaf minnah achaan al-haakim indah al-seef wa ma yichiilah saakit. Hu khaddaam Allah achaan yinazzil khadab Allah fi l-mujrim.
Achaan da, waajib tasma’o kalaam al-hakuuma. Wa da ma achaan takhaafo min al-khadab bas laakin kula achaan tidooru ti’iichu be niiye mukhlisa.
Wa achaan da, waajib tikaffu al-miiri kula. Al-kubaaraat humman khaddaamiin Allah wa yichtakhalo be l-khidme al-antaaha leehum di.

Antu ayyi naadum al-cheyy al-waajib leyah. Wa l-naadum al-waajib leyah tikaffu al-miiri, kaffuuh leyah. Wa l-naadum al-waajib leyah tikaffu jamaarik, kaffuuh leyah. Wa l-naadum al-waajib leyah ihtiraam, ihtarumuuh. Wa l-naadum al-waajib leyah al-ikraam, karrumuuh.
Ma tikhallu al-deen yagood foogku. Deen waahid bas gaa’id foogku wa hu al-mahabba ambeenaatku. Wa l-naadum al-yihibb akhuuh, hu tabbag wasaaya Allah khalaas.
Achaan al-wasaaya misil ma tazna wa ma taktul wa ma tasrig wa ma tatma’ wa kulla l-wasaaya al-aakhariin deel, zibdithum hi al-wasiiye al-tuguul {Hibb akhuuk misil tihibb nafsak}.
Al-naadum al-yihibb akhuuh abadan ma yisawwi leyah cheyy fasil. Wa be misil da, al-naadum al-yihibb al-naas yitabbig al-wasaaya be l-sahiih.
Wa khalaas, ta’arfu kadar aniina gaa’idiin fi wakit al-weenu. Al-wakit tamma khalaas. Chiddu heelku, yoom al-naja gariib leena hassa’ wa ma ba’iid minnina misil wakit awwal aamanna.
Al-leel gariib yikammil wa l-nahaar jaayi gariib. Waajib nikhallu minnina kulla fi’il hana l-dalaam wa nijahhuzu nufuusna achaan ni’iichu fi l-nuur.
Khalli haalna tukuun haal hana iyaal al-nuur. Wa khalli ma namchu fi l-safaaha wa l-sakar, wa la fi l-zina wa l-fasaad, wa la fi l-duwaas wa l-husud.
Wa fi badal al-zunuub dool, arbutu sulubku wa khuttu fi uguulku intu khaddaamiin le Rabbina Isa al-Masiih wa aabo ma tichtakhalo be chahwaat al-insaan.
Akhbalo al-mu’min al-da’iif fi iimaanah wa ma tikhaalutuuh fi fikrah.
Hasab iimaan naas waahidiin, kulla nafar al-akil halaal. Wa laakin al-naas al-iimaanhum da’iif abadan ma yaakulu ayyi laham.

Al-naadum al-yaakul ayyi nafar al-akil waajib ma yahgir al-mu’min al-ma yaakul al-laham. Wa l-ma yaakul al-laham waajib ma yuluum al-naadum al-yaakul kulla cheyy achaan akhuuk da Allah khiblah khalaas.
Inta yaatu al-tuluum al-khaddaam al-inta ma sayyidah ? Sayyidah bas yuguul kan hu saabit walla ma saabit. Wa akiid hu yagood saabit achaan Rabbina yagdar yisabbitah.
Wa fi fikir naas waahidiin, fiyah yoom waahid muhimm ziyaada min al-ayyaam al-aakhariin. Wa fi fikir naas aakhariin, kulla l-ayyaam sawa sawa. Khalli ayyi naadum yabga mu’akkid fi nafsah.

Al-naadum al-yikhassis yoom waahid yikhassisah achaan yikarrim Allah. Wa l-naadum al-yaakul kulla nafar al-akil yachkur Allah fi chaanah wa be da yikarrim Allah. Wa l-naadum al-ma yaakul al-laham yaaba ma yaakulah achaan hu yidoor yikarrim al-Rabb wa hu kula yachkur Allah.
Ma fi naadum minnina yi’iich le nafsah bas wa ma fi naadum minnina yumuut le nafsah bas.
Kan ni’iichu, ni’iichu le Rabbina wa kan numuutu, numuutu le Rabbina. Wa misil da, kan aniina hayyiin walla maytiin, aniina hana Rabbina.
Fi l-sabab da bas, al-Masiih maat wa ba’as achaan yabga Rabb al-hayyiin wa Rabb al-maytiin.
Wa inta, maala gaa’id tuluum akhuuk ? Wa inta, maala gaa’id tahgir akhuuk ? Ayyi waahid minnina yagiif giddaam kursi Allah fi yoom al-Hisaab.
Achaan da, maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Akiid ana hayy wa kulla rukba tabruk giddaami wa ayyi lisaan yachhad ana Allah al-Majiid. Da bas kalaam Allah}.
Wa be misil da, fi yoom al-Hisaab, kulla naadum minnina mas’uul giddaam Allah fi l-cheyy al-sawwaah.
Achaan da, khalliina ma nuluumu akhwaanna. Akheer nichiilu niiye achaan abadan ma nisawwu al-cheyy al-akhuuna yichakkik foogah lahaddi yamurgah min al-derib.
Ana na’arfah achaan al-Rabb Isa akkadah leyi kadar kulla nafar al-akil halaal fi zaatah. Laakin al-akil yabga haraam le l-naadum al-fi fikrah al-akil da haraam.
Kan al-akil al-taakulah yisabbib le akhuuk muchkila, inta ma maachi fi derib al-mahabba. Ma tikhalli akilak yisabbib halaak le akhuuk al-Isa al-Masiih maat fi chaanah.
Ma tikhallu al-chokhol al-sameh leeku yisabbib kalaam cheen.
Achaan al-muhimm fi Mamlakat Allah ma al-akil wa l-charaab laakin hu al-adaala wa l-salaama wa l-farha fi l-Ruuh al-Khudduus.
Al-naadum al-yitaabi’ al-Masiih misil da, Allah yarda beyah wa l-naas kula yikarrumuuh.
Be misil da, khalli nijaahudu achaan nisawwu al-cheyy al-yisabbit al-salaam ambeenaatna wa l-yigawwiina kullina.
Ma titallif amal Allah be sabab al-akil. Sahiih, kulla nafar al-akil halaal fi zaatah. Laakin ayyi akil al-taakulah al-yisabbib le akhuuk chakak, da haraam leek.
Kan ma taakul al-laham wa ma tachrab al-khamar wa kan taaba ayyi cheyy al-yiwaddir akhuuk, misil da tisawwi al-cheyy al-adiil.
Al-cheyy al-ti’aamin beyah fi l-kalaam da, khalli yabga beenak wa been Allah. Mabruuk le l-naadum al-gaa’id yisawwi al-cheyy al-nafsah tarda beyah wa ma yuluum nafsah be sababah.
Wa ayyi naadum al-yichakkik fi galbah fi l-cheyy al-gaa’id yaakulah, Allah yuluumah achaan ma gaa’id yitaabi’ iimaanah. Ayyi cheyy al-nisawwuuh al-ma hasab al-iimaan, hu zanib.
Laakin aniina al-gawiiyiin fi l-iimaan waajib nahmalo akhwaanna al-ma gawiiyiin fi l-iimaan. Waajib ma nisawwu al-cheyy al-ya’ajibna aniina bas.
Khalli ayyi naadum minnina yisawwi al-cheyy al-ya’ajib akhuuh le faayditah achaan yigawwiih.
Achaan al-Masiih zaatah ma chaal al-derib al-ya’ajib nafsah laakin maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Al-mu’yaar al-gaa’idiin yi’ayyuruuk beyah, ja foogi ana kula}.
Kulla cheyy al-katabooh fi l-zaman al-faat ankatab le yi’allimna achaan be l-sabur wa l-chajaa’a al-allamnaahum min al-kutub, namchu giddaam achmaaniin foog Rabbina.
Khalli Allah Rabb al-sabur wa l-chajaa’a yantiiku fikir waahid ambeenaatku fi derib al-Masiih Isa
lahaddi kulluku timajjudu Allah abu Rabbina Isa al-Masiih be niiye waahide wa be hiss waahid.
Akhbalo kulla mu’min be l-Masiih misil al-Masiih khiblaaku. Wa be misil da, timajjudu Allah.
Ni’ooriiku kadar al-Masiih ja wa bigi khaddaam le l-Yahuud achaan yiwassif kadar Allah saadikh wa achaan yitimm al-cheyy al-Allah waa’ad beyah juduudhum.
Wa ja achaan al-naas al-ma Yahuud kula yachkuru Allah fi chaan rahmatah. Maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Achaan da, nachkurak fi ust al-umam wa nimajjid usmak be tasbiih}.
Wa kula buguul {Ya l-umam, afraho ma’a cha’ab Allah}.
Wa kula buguul {Ya jamii’ al-umam, achkuru Allah. Khalli kulla naas al-ard yachkuruuh}.
Wa l-nabi Icha’ya buguul {Min zurriiyit Yassa
Wa Allah al-khatteetu achamku foogah yantiiku be ziyaada al-farha wa l-salaama fi l-iimaan lahaddi achamku foogah yiziid be ziyaada be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus.
Ya akhwaani, ana fi nafsi mu’akkid kadar intu malaaniin be l-kheer wa be l-ilim wa gaadriin tichchaaja’o ambeenaatku.
Laakin fi achya waahidiin katabt leeku be kalaam gawi chiyya achaan dawwart nizakkirku beyah. Wa gidirt katabt misil da be sabab al-ni’ma al-Allah antaaha leyi

le nabga khaddaam le l-Masiih Isa. Wa khidimti hi ballikhiin bichaarat Allah le l-umam. Raajil al-diin bigaddim le Allah al-dahiiye al-Allah radyaan beeha wa ana kula fi khidimti nigaddim le Allah al-naas al-bigo khaassiin le Allah be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus.
Wa achaan da, nilfachchar be kulla l-khidme al-sawweetha le Allah fi l-Masiih Isa.
Wa abadan ma nidoor nihajji be ayyi khidme illa l-khidme al-Isa al-Masiih sawwaaha beyi achaan al-umam yitaabu’u kalaam Allah. Hu khadam be kalaam wa be fi’il
wa be gudrat al-ajaayib fi ust al-naas wa be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus. Wa misil da, ana ballakht bichaarat al-Masiih le l-naas fi kulla bakaan min Madiinat al-Khudus lahaddi balad Al-Lirikuun.
Wa indi niiye achaan niballikh al-bichaara fi ayyi bakaan al-usum hana l-Masiih lissaa’ ma wisil foogah. Ma nidoor nibachchir fi ayyi bakaan al-naadum aakhar bachchar foogah.
Nidoor nitaabi’ al-kalaam al-maktuub al-buguul {Al-naas al-ma ooroohum beyah yichiifuuh. Wa l-ma sim’o khabarah yafhamooh}.
Wa iddat marraat, haawalt najiiku wa ma gidirt achaan khidimti di daharatni.
Laakin hassa’ ma faddal leyi bakaan nibachchir foogah fi l-buldaan dool. Wa min siniin katiiriin nidoor najiiku.
Wa khalaas, nagdar nakhchaaku wakit namchi Isbaaniya. In cha Allah, najiiku wa nagood ma’aaku ayyaam wa da yabga leyi halu. Wa ba’ad da, tisaa’uduuni achaan nisaafir giddaam.
Laakin hassa’ da, ana maachi Madiinat al-Khudus achaan nakhdim le l-saalihiin.
Akhwaanna al-fi Magiduuniya wa l-Yuunaan chaalo niiye ambeenaathum achaan yirassulu musaa’ada le l-masaakiin al-been al-saalihiin fi Madiinat al-Khudus.

Wa chaalo al-niiye di be farah. Wa da waajib leehum kula achaan awwal al-Yahuud gassamo barakaathum al-ligoohum min Allah ma’a l-ma Yahuud. Wa hassa’ al-ma Yahuud waajib leehum yisaa’udu al-Yahuud min al-barakaat al-ligoohum fi l-dunya.
Wa wakit al-khidme di tikammil wa ana anteethum kulla cheyy al-lammooh leehum, nichiil derib hana Isbaaniya wa nakhchaaku fi Rooma.
Wa na’arif kadar wakit nalhag bakaanku da, najiiku malaan be barakat al-Masiih.
Wa hassa’ ya akhwaani, natlub minku be usum Rabbina Isa al-Masiih wa be mahabbat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus achaan intu tas’alo Allah ma’aayi be chidde.
As’alo leyi Allah achaan yinajjiini min al-naas al-ma mu’miniin al-fi daar al-Yahuudiiya wa achaan al-saalihiin al-fi Madiinat al-Khudus yardo be l-musaa’ada al-nijiibha leehum.
Wa misil da, in cha Allah, najiiku be farah wa ninjamma ma’aaku chiyya.
Allah Rabb al-salaam yukuun ma’aaku kulluku. Aamiin.
Nigaddim leeku akhutna Fiiba
Akhbalooha be usum al-Rabb wa dayyufuuha be l-diife al-waajbe le l-naas al-saalihiin. Saa’uduuha fi ayyi cheyy al-hi tidoorah minku achaan hi zaatha saa’adat naas katiiriin wa saa’adatni ana kula.
Wa sallumu Firiska
Wa humman dakhalo fi khutuura chadiide achaan yinajjuuni min al-moot. Wa kulla jamaa’aat al-Masiihiyiin al-gaa’idiin fi ust al-naas al-ma Yahuud gaa’idiin yachkuruuhum ma’aayi.
Wa sallumu al-jamaa’a al-bulummu fi beethum. Wa sallumu habiibi Abinaatus. Hu awwal naadum al-aaman be l-Masiih fi balad Aasiya.
Wa sallumu Mariyam al-khadamat leeku katiir.
Wa sallumu ahali Andaruuniki wa Yuuniya al-ga’adna sawa ma’aahum fi l-sijin. Kulla l-rusul ya’arfuuhum wa yikarrumuuhum. Humman mu’miniin be l-Masiih gubbaali ana.
Wa sallumu habiibi al-Masiihi Amfilaawus.
Wa sallumu Urbaan al-bakhdim misilna le l-Masiih wa habiibi Istakhi.
Wa sallumu Afaliis al-wassaf sabaatah fi l-Masiih. Wa sallumu al-akhwaan fi beet Aristubuul.
Wa sallumu akhuui Hiruudiyun. Wa sallumu naas Rabbina al-gaa’idiin fi beet Narkiis.
Wa sallumu al-akhwaat Tarfiina wa Tarfuusa al-yakhdiman katiir le l-Rabb. Wa sallumu akhti al-niriidha Farsiiya al-khadamat katiir bilheen le l-Rabb.
Wa sallumu Ruufus. Hu Masiihi ajiib. Wa sallumu ammah. Hi bigat misil ammi.
Wa sallumu Sinkiraat wa Filikhuun wa Harmiis wa Batruub wa Harmaas wa kulla l-akhwaan al-ma’aahum.
Wa sallumu Filuluukh wa Juuliya wa Niiri wa akhtah wa Uluumba wa kulla l-saalihiin al-gaa’idiin ma’aahum.
Wa assaalamo ambeenaatku be salaam al-saalihiin. Kulla jamaa’aat al-mu’miniin yisallumuuku.

Ya l-akhwaan, niwassiiku be cheyy waahid. Angar’u min al-naas al-yi’allumuuku be ta’liim chig min al-ta’liim al-simi’tuuh awwal. Al-naas dool yifarrugu al-mu’miniin be kalaamhum wa yitallufu iimaanhum. Kussu minhum ba’iid.

Al-naas al-misil dool ma yakhdumu le Rabbina al-Masiih laakin yakhdumu le faaydithum humman bas. Yihajju le l-naas be kalaam halu wa yachkuruuhum katiir achaan yukhuchchu al-naas al-induhum ilim chiyya bas.
Wa leeku intu, kulla l-naas ba’arfu intu simi’tu bichaarat al-Masiih wa taaba’tuuha. Wa fi chaanku ana farhaan laakin nidoor intu tabgo faahimiin fi l-kheer wa bari’iin min al-charr.
Wa Allah Rabb al-salaam ma yi’akhkhir rahakaan Ibliis tihit rijileenku. Aleekum ni’mat Rabbina Isa.
Wa akhuui Timuutaawus al-bakhdim ma’aayi sawa yisallimku. Wa ahali Luukiyus wa Yaasuun wa Suubaatar kula yisallumuuku.
Wa ana Tartiiyus al-gaa’id naktib kalaam Buulus fi l-jawaab da, nisallimku be usum al-Rabb.
Wa Khaayus yisallimku. Hu siid al-beet al-ana mudayyif foogah. Wa beetah hu al-bakaan al-yilimmu foogah al-mu’miniin. Wa Rastus wakiil sanduug hana maal al-hille wa akhuuna Kawaartus yisallumuuku.
Aleekum kulluku ni’mat Rabbina Isa al-Masiih. Aamiin.
Wa khalaas nachkuru Allah al-yagdar yigawwiiku fi l-iimaan hasab bichaarat al-Masiih al-niballikhha wa hi bichaarat Isa al-Masiih. Al-kalaam da, hu min sirr Allah al-ma bayyanah fi l-zaman al-faat
wa laakin hassa’ bayyanah khalaas be kutub al-anbiya. Al-bichaara di yiballukhuuha le kulla l-umam be amur Allah al-Hayy ila l-abad
achaan yi’aamunu wa yitaabu’u kalaam Allah. Wa l-hamad waajib le Allah al-Waahid wa l-Hakiim be usum Isa al-Masiih ila l-abad. Aamiin.
Jawaab minni ana Buulus al-Allah naadaani achaan nabga be iznah rasuul hana Isa al-Masiih. Wa daahu naktib leeku ma’a akhuuna Suustaan.

Wa nisallumuuku intu ummat al-Masiih al-Allah ikhtaaraaku al-gaa’idiin fi hillit Kuruntus, intu al-bigiitu naas khaassiin le Allah be alaakhitku ma’a l-Masiih Isa. Allah naadaaku fi derbah achaan tabgo saalihiin sawa ma’a kulla l-naas al-yad’u fi ayyi bakaan be usum Rabbina Isa al-Masiih wa hu Rabbuhum wa Rabbina.
Aleekum al-salaam wa l-rahma min Allah Abuuna wa Rabbina Isa al-Masiih.
Nachkur Allah daayman fi chaanku wa fi chaan al-ni’ma al-hu antaaku be alaakhitku ma’a l-Masiih Isa.
Wa be alaakhitku ma’aayah, Allah baarakaaku wa sawwaaku khaniyiin be l-kalaam wa kulla l-ilim.
Wa misil da, Allah sabbat ambeenaatku chahaaditna al-chihidna beeha le l-Masiih.
Wa fi chaan da bas, ma fi ayyi baraka min barakaat hana l-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-gassarat leeku intu al-gaa’idiin tarjo al-yoom al-Allah yibayyin foogah Rabbina Isa al-Masiih.
Al-Masiih yahfadku lahaddi al-aakhira. Achaan da, fi yoom hana jayyit Rabbina Isa al-Masiih tukuunu bala eeb.
Allah hu saadikh wa yisawwi leeku kulla cheyy al-hu gaalah. Wa hu bas al-naadaaku achaan tadkhulu fi l-alaakha al-induku ma’a Ibnah Isa al-Masiih Rabbina.
Ya akhwaani, ana niwassiiku be usum Rabbina Isa al-Masiih achaan kalaamku yabga waahid lahaddi furga ke ambeenaatku ma tabga. Khalli galibku yabga waahid wa fikirku yabga waahid.
Ya akhwaani, ana gult al-kalaam da achaan naas waahidiin min beet akhutku Khuluwa oorooni kadar intu gaa’idiin tilkhaalato ambeenaatku.
Wa ayyi naadum minku gaa’id yuguul «Ana naadum hana Buulus» aw «Ana hana Abuluus» aw «Ana hana Butrus» aw «Ana hana l-Masiih».
Haay ! Al-Masiih da waahid walla mufarrag ? Buulus da maat fi l-saliib fi chaanku walla ? Wa khattasooku be usum Buulus walla ? Akiid, la.
Wa ana ma khattast ayyi naadum minku illa Kiriisbus wa Khaayus wa achaan da nuguul al-hamdulillah.
Wa be da, ma fi naadum al-yagdar yuguul hu khattasooh be usmi ana.
Aywa, ana khattast naas beet Istifaan kula. Laakin ma na’arif kan fi naadum aakhar ambeenaatku ana khattastah.

Wa l-Masiih rassalaani ma achaan nikhattis al-naas laakin achaan niballikh leehum bichaartah. Wa ma niballikhha misil al-ulama al-yiballukhu fikirhum be kalaam halu. Niballikh moot al-Masiih fi l-saliib achaan al-saliib kula indah gudra al-khaassa beyah.
Sahiih, al-naas al-muwaddiriin yuguulu kadar kalaamna fi l-saliib kalaam baatil. Laakin leena aniina al-Allah gaa’id yinajjiina, kalaam hana l-saliib indah gudrat Allah.
Wa fakkuru fi l-kalaam al-Allah gaalah fi l-Kitaab {Ilim al-ulama nibattilah wa fihim al-faahimiin niwaddirah}.
Wa hassa’ da, ween al-faahim ? Ween al-aalim ? Ween al-mutakallim al-yiriiduuh naas al-dunya ? Akiid, Allah wassaf kadar fikir naas al-dunya baatil.

Allah sawwa kulla cheyy hasab fikrah hu wa ma anta izin le naas al-dunya achaan yalgo alaakha ma’aayah be fikir insaani. Wa Allah chaal niiye achaan yirassilna niballukhu al-kalaam al-yuguulu kadar hu kalaam baatil wa yinajji al-naas al-yi’aamunu beyah.
Aywa, al-Yahuud yidooru yichiifu al-alaama al-tabga leehum daliil wa l-Yuunaaniyiin yifattuchu al-hagg be ilim al-dunya
laakin aniina niballukhu le kulla l-naas be l-Masiih al-katalooh fi l-saliib. Wa l-kalaam da yiza’’il al-Yahuud wa hu kalaam baatil le l-Yuunaaniyiin.
Laakin le kulla l-naas al-Allah naadaahum fi derbah, kan min al-Yahuud walla min al-Yuunaaniyiin kula, al-Masiih hu gudrat Allah wa fikir Allah.
Wa l-naas buguulu fikir Allah baatil, laakin fikir Allah gawi min fikirhum marra waahid. Wa l-naas buguulu al-cheyy al-Allah sawwaah ma indah gudra, laakin Allah daayman gaadir minhum bilheen.

Wa be kalaam aakhar, ya akhwaani, fakkuru fi kikkeef haalitku gubbaal Allah ma naadaaku fi derbah. Awwal da, fi fikir al-naas, chiyya minku naas induhum fikir wa chiyya minku induhum gudra wa chiyya minku iyaal al-kubaaraat.

Laakin al-naas al-jaahiliin hasab naas al-dunya, humman dool bas Allah ikhtaaraahum achaan yijiib al-eeb fi l-ulama. Wa l-naas al-ma induhum gudra hasab naas al-dunya, humman dool bas Allah ikhtaaraahum achaan yijiib al-eeb fi l-gaadriin.
Aywa, Allah ikhtaar al-naas al-masaakiin wa l-mahguuriin wa l-ma induhum faayde le naas al-dunya achaan yibattil faaydit al-naas al-buguulu humman bas induhum faayde.
Wa khalaas, ma fi insaan indah hagg yisawwi nafsah kabiir giddaam Allah.
Wa Allah bas al-antaaku al-alaakha al-induku ma’a l-Masiih Isa. Wa be l-Masiih bas nalgo fikir Allah. Wa be l-Masiih bas Allah ja’alaana saalihiin wa sawwaana cha’abah al-khaass wa fadaana.
Wa achaan da, khalli nitaabu’u al-kalaam al-maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Khalli naadum ma yisawwi nafsah kabiir. Akheer yuguul Allah bas al-kabiir}.
Ya akhwaani, wakit ana macheet leeku, ballakht leeku kalaam Allah al-awwal al-naas ma irifooh. Laakin ma ballakhtah be kalaam sa’ab ziyaada wa ma hajjeet leeku misil aalim kabiir.
Wa chilt niiye achaan nikallim leeku misil ma na’arif cheyy illa Isa al-Masiih wa mootah fi l-saliib.
Wa ana faagid al-gudra wakit ana gaa’id ma’aaku wa khaayif bilheen.
Wa kallamt leeku be kalaam hayyin wa ma jibtuku fi l-derib be kalaam al-biraddi guluubku wa la be fikir insaani. Fi badal al-kalaam da, khalleet al-Ruuh al-Khudduus yiwassifku gudurtah.
Wa misil da, tabgo mu’miniin ma be sabab fikir insaani laakin be gudrat Allah.

Wa laakin kan aniina gaa’idiin ma’a mu’miniin kubaar fi l-iimaan, nikallumu leehum be fikir adiil. Wa l-fikir da ma yichaabih fikir naas al-dunya wa la fikir kubaaraat naas al-dunya al-laabudda yabgo ma fiihum.
Wa ni’arrufu al-naas sirr Allah al-hu fikir Allah al-ma irifooh. Wa gubbaal bidaayit al-dunya, Allah kharrar be l-fikir da yiwaddiina fi majdah.
Wa ma fi naadum min kubaaraat al-zaman da fihim niiyit Allah di. Kan awwal fihmooha, ma yaktulu Rabbina al-majiid fi l-saliib.

Wa khalaas, da muwaafig ma’a l-kalaam al-maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Le l-naas al-yihibbu Allah, hu jahhaz leehum cheyy ajiib bilheen. Wa l-naas abadan ma chaafo cheyy mislah wa la sim’o foogah khabar. Wa raay fi cheyy misil da abadan ma dakhal fi galib insaani}.
Wa l-cheyy al-Allah jahhazah da, hu wassafah leena be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus. Achaan al-Ruuh al-Khudduus yichiif kulla cheyy wa ya’arif fikir Allah wa asraarah.
Akiid, al-naas ma ya’arfu afkaar naadum illa l-naadum zaatah ya’arif afkaarah. Wa misil da, ma fi naadum ya’arif afkaar Allah illa Ruuh Allah ya’arif afkaar Allah.
Wa Allah antaana al-Ruuh al-Khudduus wa l-Ruuh al-Khudduus da ma jaayi min al-dunya. Hu Ruuh Allah al-naazil leena fi chaan yi’arrifna al-barakaat al-Allah antaahum leena.

Wa aniina nikallumu be l-barakaat deel le l-naas. Wa ma nihajju beehum be l-kalaam al-allamnaah min al-ilim al-insaani. La. Nihajju be l-kalaam al-allamah leena al-Ruuh al-Khudduus. Wa nifassuru ta’aaliim al-Ruuh al-Khudduus le l-naas al-induhum al-Ruuh al-Khudduus.
Wa naadum aadi ma yakhbal kalaam hana l-Ruuh al-Khudduus. Fi fikrah, kalaam al-Ruuh al-Khudduus baatil wa hu ma yafhamah. Achaan naadum ma yafhamah illa be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus.
Wa l-naadum al-indah al-Ruuh al-Khudduus hu yakchif kulla cheyy laakin ma fi naadum al-indah hagg yakchifah hu.
Achaan maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Yaatu al-indah hagg yi’allim Allah ? Yaatu al-irif fikrah ?}. Wa laakin aniina fikirna wa fikir al-Masiih waahid.
Ya akhwaani, wakit ana ma’aaku ma gidirt nihajji leeku misil intu naas al-induhum al-Ruuh al-Khudduus. Intu gaa’idiin titaabu’u fikir al-bachar. Fi derib al-Masiih intu misil atfaal dugaag.
Achaan da bas, ana allamtuku be ta’liim hayyin misil ridaa’at al-laban wa ma be ta’liim gawi misil madikhiin al-asab achaan intu ma gidirtu takhbalo ta’liim gawi. Ya hassa’ intu ma tagdaro.

Intu gaa’idiin titaabu’u fikir al-bachar wa ma fikir Allah. Intu gaa’idiin tilhaasado wa tilkhaalato ambeenaatku. Hal da ma yisabbit kadar fikirku fikir al-bachar wa haalku misil haal naas al-dunya walla ?
Naadum waahid buguul «Ana hana Buulus» wa naadum aakhar buguul «Ana hana Abuluus». Wa kan tihajju misil ke khalaas, intu misil naas al-dunya.
Wa Abuluus hu yaatu ? Wa ana Buulus kula yaatu ? Aniina khaddaamiin bas wa be sabab kalaamna intu aamantu. Ayyi waahid minnina sawwa al-khidme al-Rabbina kallafah beeha.
Intu misil jineene wa ana teerabt foogha kalaam Allah wa Abuluus zagaaha laakin Allah bas gawwam al-bizre.
Wa be da, al-yiteerib ma kabiir wa l-yazgi ma kabiir illa Allah al-yigawwim al-bizre bas kabiir.
Wa l-yiteerib wa l-yazgi humman sawa sawa wa ayyi waahid yalga ujurtah hasab khidimtah.
Wa khalaas, aniina akhwaan fi khidmit Allah wa intu bigiitu jineene hana Allah, aw be masal aakhar, intu al-beet al-Allah gaa’id yabniih.
Wa ana misil bannaay al-ba’arif khidimtah wa be l-ni’ma al-Allah antaani ana khatteet asaas al-beet wa naadum aakhar ja bana foogah. Wa ayyi naadum al-yabni foogah waajib yukhutt baalah fi khidimtah.
Naadum ma yagdar yukhutt asaas aakhar min al-asaas al-gaa’id wa l-asaas da Isa al-Masiih.
Wa hassa’ ayyi naadum yabni foog al-asaas da. Wa waahidiin yabnu foogah be dahab walla be fudda walla be hajar lu’lu wa waahidiin yabnu be hatab walla be gechch walla be ageeg.

Wa l-khidme al-ayyi naadum khadamha tin’arif achaan yoom al-Hisaab yiwassifha achaan al-yoom da yaji be naar wa l-naar tijarrib khidimtah wa tiwassif khidme hana ayyi naadum kan adiile walla ma adiile.
Wa kan naadum bana foog al-asaas wa l-naar ma akalat khidimtah, al-naadum da yalga ujra.

Wa kan naadum bana foog al-asaas wa l-naar akalat khidimtah, khalaas khidimtah tala’at khasaara laakin hu zaatah yanja. Wa hu yanja misil al-naadum al-faza’ooh min ust al-naar al-ma faddal leyah cheyy.
Intu nisiitu walla ? Intu zaatku Beet Allah. Ruuh Allah saakin foogku.
Kan naadum tallaf Beet Allah, al-naadum da Allah yitallifah. Achaan Beet Allah hu mukhaddas. Wa intu bas al-beet da.
Khalli naadum ma yukhuchch nafsah. Ayyi naadum minku al-yuguul hu indah fikir adiil wa fikrah fikir hana naas al-dunya, khalli yabga jaahil achaan yalga al-fikir al-sahiih.
Achaan fikir naas al-dunya baatil giddaam Allah. Wa maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Allah yakrub al-ulama fi najaadithum}
wa battaan {Allah ya’arif kadar afkaar al-ulama ma induhum faayde}.
Achaan da, ma tisawwu nufuusku kubaar fi ayyi insaan. Achaan kulla cheyy hanaaku.
Aywa, Buulus wa Abuluus wa Butrus kulluhum hineeku intu. Wa l-dunya wa l-haya wa l-moot wa l-wakit al-haali wa l-wakit al-jaayi kulluhum hineeku.
Wa intu hana l-Masiih wa l-Masiih hu hana Allah.
Wa leyi ana wa akhwaani, waajib tahsubuuna khaddaamiin al-Masiih mas’uuliin min ballikhiin kalaam Allah al-awwal ma irifooh al-naas.
Wa l-cheyy al-waajib le ayyi naadum al-mas’uul, hu al-sidakh.
Wa leyi ana, ma lammaani kan intu tisawwu leyi taftiich fi khidimti walla kan ayyi insaan yisawwi leyi taftiich. Ana kula ma nisawwi taftiich fi nafsi.
Galbi gaa’id yuguul ana ma indi eeb, laakin da wiheedah ma yisabbit kadar ana bari. Al-gaa’id yakchifni, hu Rabbina Isa.

Be misil da, ma tisawwu taftiich fi khidmit ayyi naadum gubbaal yoom al-Hisaab. Fi l-yoom da, Rabbina yaji wa yibayyin kulla cheyy al-mulabbad fi l-dalaam wa yizahhir niiyit al-naas al-gaa’ide fi guluubhum. Wa ayyi naadum yalga rida ma min al-naas laakin min Allah.

Ya akhwaani, ana tabbagt kalaami da fi l-cheyy al-bukhussini ana wa Abuluus achaan intu talgo minnah faayde. Wa be da, nidoor intu ta’arfu ma’ana al-masal al-ma’ruuf al-buguul «Khalli naadum ma yamrug min derib al-Kitaab». Ma tistakbaro battaan fi l-naadum al-waahid wa tahguru al-aakhar.
Wa nuguul le ayyi waahid, maala tuguul inta akheer min akhuuk ? Al-cheyy al-indak da, hu min Allah. Wa kan Allah bas antaah leek, maala tisawwu nufuusku kubaar beyah misil hu ma antaak ?

Wa khalaas, tuguulu intu chab’aaniin wa bigiitu khaniyiin be l-iimaan wa khalleetuuna wara wa ga’adtu khalaas fi karaasiiku achaan tamluku. Nitmanna kadar intu tamluku achaan nichaaruku ma’aaku fi l-muluk.

Wa gult al-kalaam da achaan fi fikri, Allah khattaana aniina rusul al-Masiih fi l-bakaan al-wara marra waahid. Aniina bigiina misil al-masaajiin al-hakamo leehum be l-moot wa maragoohum giddaam al-naas. Aniina gaa’idiin nat’abo wa kulla l-dunya wa kulla naasha wa kulla l-malaa’ika gaa’idiin yichiifu ta’abna.
Aniina sawweena nufuusna jaahiliin fi chaan al-Masiih wa laakin intu tuguulu intu ulama fi l-Masiih. Aniina faagdiin al-gudra laakin intu gawiiyiin. Intu mukarramiin laakin aniina mahguuriin.
Ya hassa’ aniina jii’aaniin wa atchaaniin. Ma indina khulgaan. Yudugguuna wa yaturduuna min ayyi bakaan.
Wa nakhdumu be duraa’na achaan ni’iichu. Al-naas gaa’idiin yi’ayyuruuna wa aniina nibaarukuuhum. Yita’’ubuuna wa aniina nasburu.
Yihajju leena kalaam murr wa nuruddu leehum be nafas baarid. Wa bigiina misil cheyy al-kulla naas al-dunya yakrahooh wa yidaffuguuh barra.
Ana ma katabt al-kalaam da achaan ni’ayyibku. Intu iyaali al-nihibbuku wa katabtah achaan nihazzirku.

Akuun induku naas katiiriin al-yidooru yirabbuuku fi derib al-Masiih laakin abbahaat katiiriin ma induku. Aywa, ana wiheedi bigiit abuuku achaan ana ballakht leeku bichaarat al-Masiih wa beyi ana bas, intu dakhaltu fi alaakhitku ma’a l-Masiih Isa.
Achaan da nihannisku. Taabu’u derbi ana.

Wa fi chaan da bas, ana rassalt leeku Timuutaawus. Ta’arfu kadar be ni’mat Rabbina hu bigi wileedi al-amiin al-niriidah bilheen. Hu yifakkirku be haali ana fi derib al-Masiih wa di bas al-haal al-ni’allimha le l-mu’miniin fi ayyi bakaan.
Waahidiin minku bigo mustakbiriin. Akuun fi fikirhum ana abadan ma namchi leeku.
Laakin kan Rabbina gaal aamiin, namchi leeku gariib. Wa fi l-yoom da, na’arif al-mustakbiriin dool. Ma nidoor nasma’ kalaamhum. Gudrithum bas nidoor nichiifha.
Achaan mamlakat Allah ma mabniiye be kalaam al-naas. Hi mabniiye be gudrat Allah.
Wa tidooru chunu ? Tidooru najiiku be asa walla najiiku be mahabba wa nafas baarid ?
Simi’t kalaam ajiib bilheen foogku. Buguulu naadum minku gaa’id yisawwi zina al-naas al-ma ba’arfu Allah kula ma yisawwuuh. Buguulu naadum waahid gaa’id yazna marit abuuh.
Kikkeef bigiitu mustakbiriin ? Akheer tahzano hizin chadiid. Wa l-naadum al-sawwa al-zanib da, waajib taturduuh min usutku.
Wa kan leyi ana, sahiih ana gaa’id fi bakaan ba’iid minku laakin ana ma’aaku be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus. Wa ana haakamt al-naadum da khalaas misil ana be nafsi gaa’id fi usutku.
Wa wakit intu laammiin be usum Rabbina Isa wa hasseetu kadar ana gaa’id ma’aaku wa gudrat Rabbina Isa ma’aaku,
waajib tisallumu al-naadum da le l-Cheetaan achaan chahwatah al-bachariiye tiddammar wa hu zaatah yanja fi yoom jayyit Rabbina Isa.
Sawweetu nufuusku kubaar wa da ma indah faayde. Hal nisiitu kadar tawwaara chiyya bas tigawwim al-ajiin kulla ke ?

Amurgu minku al-naadum al-gaa’id yaznib da achaan tabgo battaan misil ajiin jadiid bala tawwaara. Achaan Allah sawwaaku naas judaad. Wa aniina naas judaad achaan al-Masiih maat fi chaanna khalaas, misil al-kharuuf al-dabahooh zamaan fi l-Fisha al-awwalaaniiye

Achaan da, khalliina nabgo misil al-naas al-yi’ayyudu Iid al-Fisha al-baakulu al-khubza al-jadiide. Wa l-khubza al-gadiime tiwassif al-fasaala wa l-zunuub. Wa l-khubza al-jadiide tiwassif al-niiye al-mukhlisa wa l-hagg.
Wa fakkuru fi l-kalaam al-katabtah leeku fi jawaabi al-gibeel. Ana gult angar’u min al-zannaayiin wa kussu minhum ba’iid.

Wa ma’ana al-kalaam da ma bukhuss al-naas al-zannaayiin al-ma mu’miniin wa la l-tammaa’iin wa la l-sarraagiin wa la aabdiin al-asnaam. Achaan ma tagdaro tukussu min al-naas dool illa kan tamurgu min al-dunya marra waahid.

La. Fi gaddah, ana katabt leeku achaan tukussu min ayyi naadum al-buguul hu akhuuku mu’min wa laakin hu zannaay walla tammaa’ walla aabid al-asnaam walla nammaam walla sakkaari walla sarraag. Aywa, al-naadum al-misil da ma taakulu ma’aayah kula.
Ana ma indi hagg nihaasib al-naas al-barra min ummat al-Masiih. Wa laakin akhwaanku al-mu’miniin al-fi usutku waajib intu tihaasubuuhum.
Al-naas al-barra dool, Allah yihaasibhum. Wa laakin kan leeku intu, maktuub {Aturdu min usutku al-naadum al-fasil}.
Wa kan naadum minku mazluum fi akhuuh al-mu’min, maala yiwaddiih le l-muznibiin achaan yagta’o leyah al-charii’a ? Akheer kan yikhalli al-saalihiin yagta’o leyah al-charii’a wa yihaasubu al-zaalim.
Nisiitu kadar al-saalihiin yahkumu fi l-dunya walla ? Kan ba’adeen intu tahkumu fi l-dunya, kikkeef ma tagdaro tahkumu fi muchkila sakhayre kula ?
Nisiitu kadar nahkumu fi l-malaa’ika walla ? Wa kan misil da, akiid nagdaro nahkumu fi machaakil akhwaanna fi l-dunya kula.
Wa kan induku machaakil ambeenaatku, maala tigaddumuuhum le l-naas al-ma muhimmiin le ummat al-Masiih ?
Wa da eeb foogku. Ma fi naadum minku indah hikma achaan yahkim ambeenaat akhwaanah walla ?
Laakin intu gaa’idiin tikhallu al-mu’min yachki akhuuh fi l-hukkaam hatta kan al-hukkaam dool ma mu’miniin kula.
Kan waddeetu akhuuku fi l-mahkama, intu fachaltu khalaas. Akheer takhbalo al-zulum wa tasburu foogah. Akheer tikhallu naadum yasrig minku.
Laakin intu zaatku gaa’idiin tazlumu akhwaanku wa tasurgu khumaamhum be l-khachch !
Nisiitu kadar al-muznibiin ma yawrusu Mamlakat Allah walla ? Ma tukhuchchu nafisku. Kan naadum faasikh walla aabid asnaam walla zannaay walla chamrookha walla luuti
walla sarraag walla tammaa’ walla sakkaari walla nammaam walla nahhaab ma indah warasa fi Mamlakat Allah.

Wa naas waahidiin minku awwal gaa’idiin yisawwu al-zunuub dool. Laakin Allah khassalaaku wa sawwaaku khaassiin leyah wa ja’alaaku saalihiin be usum Rabbina Isa al-Masiih wa be gudrat Ruuh Allah Ilaahna.
Intu gultu «Kulla cheyy halaal leyi» wa laakin ana nuguul ma kulla cheyy indah faayde. Gultu «Kulla cheyy halaal leyi» wa laakin ana nuguul abadan ma nikhassid kadar ayyi cheyy yi’abbidni.

Wa gultu «Al-batun gaa’ide le l-akil wa l-akil gaa’id le l-batun». Aywa, wa fi l-akhiir, Allah yidammir al-akil wa l-batun sawa sawa. Wa laakin al-jisim ma gaa’id le l-zina. Al-jisim gaa’id fi chaan Rabbina Isa wa Rabbina ba’as fi chaan al-jisim.
Wa Allah ba’as Rabbina wa be nafs al-gudra yab’asna aniina kula.
Ma iriftu kadar hassa’ jisim al-mu’min udu min jisim al-Masiih walla ? Wa kan misil da, hal niwaddi jismi al-hassa’ udu min jisim al-Masiih wa nantiih le mara charmuuta ? Abadan.
Ma iriftu kadar al-naadum al-yilimm ma’a charmuuta yabga ma’aaha jisim waahid ? Maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Al-naaseen yabgo jisim waahid}.
Wa laakin al-yilimm ma’a Rabbina al-Masiih yabga ma’aayah ruuh waahide.
Khalaas, angar’u min al-zina. Kulla l-zunuub al-aakhariin al-yisawwiihum al-insaan ma yilammusu al-jisim, laakin al-zannaay hu bas yudurr jismah.
Ma iriftu kadar al-Ruuh al-Khudduus gaa’id fiiku walla ? Wa be da al-jisim hu beet Allah. Intu ma hana nufuusku. Intu hana Allah.
Hu kaffa al-taman fi chaanku. Achaan da, khalli kulla cheyy al-tisawwu be jisimku yimajjid Allah.
Wa hassa’ da, nurudd leeku fi l-kalaam al-sa’altuuni minnah. Wa katabtu gultu «Akheer le l-raajil kan abadan ma yargud ma’a mara».
Laakin muchkilat al-zina gaa’ide wa tidoor takrubku. Achaan da, akheer ayyi raajil indah martah halaalah wa ayyi mara indaha raajilha halaalha.
Waajib al-raajil al-maakhid yanti nafsah le martah wa l-mara al-maakhde tanti nafisha le raajilha.
Al-mara ma indaha huguug fi jisimha, illa raajilha bas indah hagg. Wa sawa misil da, al-raajil ma indah huguug fi jismah, illa martah bas indaha hagg.

Khalli al-raajil ma yaaba martah wa l-mara ma taaba raajilha. Laakin kan tidooru tiwaggufu al-alaakha al-jinsiiya ambeenaatku le mudda muhaddada, masalan wakit tinkarubu fi l-sala, awwalan ke istafugu foogah. Wa wakit al-mudda di kammalat, lummu battaan. Wa gult al-kalaam da achaan kan ma tagdaro talzamo chahwaatku, akuun Ibliis yilizzuku fi l-zanib.
Al-waggafaan al-misil da, ma amartuku beyah laakin kan tidooru tisawwuuh, ma indah eeb.
Sahiih, fi fikri akheer kan kulli naadum yukuun misli ana al-ma maakhid. Laakin ayyi naadum indah al-baraka al-Allah antaaha leyah. Wa le l-waahid baraka waahide wa le l-aakhar baraka chig.
Wa fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-rujaal al-hassa’ ma induhum awiin wa l-awiin al-rujaalhin maytiin, nuguul akheer kan yagoodu bala akhiide misli ana.
Laakin kan ma yagdaro yalzamo chahwaathum, akheer yaakhudu. Kan yaakhudu, da akheer min al-chahwa taakulhum misil al-naar.
Wa kan le l-naas al-maakhdiin, nantiihum wasiiye. Wa l-wasiiye di ma minni ana laakin min Rabbina Isa. Waajib al-mara al-maakhde ma titallig raajilha.
Wa kan hi tallagatah, waajib tagood bala akhiide aw tisaalih raajilha. Wa khalli al-raajil al-maakhid ma yitallig martah.
Wa le l-aakhariin, indi wasiiye. Wa l-wasiiye di ma min Rabbina, hi minni ana. Kan ayyi mu’min indah mara ma mu’mine wa martah tikhassid tagood ma’aayah, waajib hu ma yitalligha.
Wa kan mara minku indaha raajil ma mu’min wa raajilha yikhassid yagood ma’aaha, waajib hi ma titalligah.

Achaan al-raajil al-ma mu’min bigi taahir be sabab iimaan martah wa l-mara al-ma mu’mine bigat taahre be sabab raajilha. Wa kan ma ke, iyaalku yukuunu ma taahiriin wa laakin be l-sahiih humman taahiriin.
Wa laakin kan al-naadum al-ma mu’min yidoor al-talaag, khalli yisawwiih. Kan sawwaah, al-mu’min kan raajil walla mara kula, ma marbuut. Laakin intu Allah naadaaku achaan ti’iichu be l-salaam.
Intu ma ta’arfu al-cheyy al-yabga. Ya l-mara, akuun raajilki yanja be sababki. Ya l-raajil, akuun martak tanja be sababak.

Wa l-kalaam al-muhimm daahu, khalli ayyi mu’min yagood fi l-haala al-Rabbina ja’alaaha leyah. Wa di l-haala al-hu gaa’id foogha wakit Allah naadaah fi l-iimaan. Di bas al-wasiiye al-ni’allimha le l-mu’miniin fi ayyi bakaan.
Masalan, kan naadum mutahhar min gubbaal Allah ma naadaah fi derbah, khalli ma yisawwi cheyy le yibattil al-tahuura. Wa l-naadum al-ma mutahhar gubbaal Allah ma naadaah, khalli ma yitahhuruuh.
Kan naadum mutahhar walla ma mutahhar, da ma bisawwi cheyy. Al-cheyy al-waajib hu yitaabi’ wasaaya Allah.
Khalli ayyi naadum yagood fi l-haala al-hu gaa’id foogha wakit Allah naadaah.
Kan inta abid wakit Allah naadaak, ma tikhalli al-ubuudiiye tiza’’ilak. Laakin kan yantuuk fursa tabga hurr, khassid tawwaali.

Wa gult leek ma taz’al achaan al-abid al-Allah naadaah fi derib Rabbina bigi khaddaam muharrar hana Rabbina. Wa nafs al-cheyy le l-naadum al-awwal hurr gubbaal Allah ma naadaah. Hu bigi abid al-Masiih.
Allah kaffa al-taman fi chaanku wa achaan da, ma tabgo abiid le l-naas.
Ya akhwaani, zibdit al-kalaam, hi khalli ayyi naadum yagood fi l-haala al-gaa’id foogha wakit Allah naadaah wa khalli yagood foogha fi alaakha ma’a Allah.
Wa fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-naas al-lissaa’ ma akhado, ma indi wasiiye min Rabbina. Laakin Allah rahamaani wa ja’alaani naadum saadikh wa achaan da nuguul leeku fikri.
Hassa’ haaliiyan intu gaa’idiin fi ta’ab chadiid. Achaan da, fi fikri akheer kan ayyi naadum ma yikhayyir haaltah.
Kan naadum indah mara, khalli ma yitalligha. Kan naadum ma indah mara, khalli ma yaakhud.
Wa kan sabi yaakhud, da ma khata. Wa kan bineeye taakhud, da ma khata. Laakin fi l-dunya di, al-maakhdiin yat’abo ziyaada wa leeku intu nidoor ninajjiiku min al-ta’ab da.
Wa gult al-kalaam da achaan al-zaman al-aniina gaa’idiin foogah da, Allah haddadah. Wa min hassa’ le giddaam, khalli al-raajil al-indah mara ma yinkarib ziyaada fi martah.
Wa khalli al-haznaaniin ma yinkarubu fi hizinhum bas. Wa khalli al-farhaaniin ma yinkarubu fi farhithum bas. Wa khalli al-naas al-yachru ma yinkarubu fi khumaamhum.
Wa khalli al-naas al-induhum mu’aamala ma’a naas al-dunya ma yichtakhalo beeha. Akiid, nizaam al-dunya al-haali da gaa’id yikammil.
Wa nidoor al-hamm ma yakrubku. Al-mu’min al-ma indah mara gaa’id yinkarib fi khidmit Rabbina wa fi rida Rabbina.
Laakin al-mu’min al-indah mara gaa’id yinkarib fi khidmit al-dunya di, ma’anaatah hu yidoor yiraddi martah,

wa misil da hu indah khidme itneen. Wa l-mara aw al-bineeye al-mu’mine al-ma maakhde gaa’ide tinkarib fi khidmit Rabbina achaan tabga saalhe be fi’ilha wa fikirha. Laakin al-mu’mine al-maakhde tinkarib fi khidmit al-dunya di, ma’anaatah hi tidoor tiraddi raajilha.
Wa gult al-kalaam da le faayditku. Ma nidoor nukhutt leeku huduud. Gult al-kalaam da achaan niwassifku kikkeef titaabu’u derib Rabbina be niiye waahide wa takhdumu leyah be galib waahid.

Kan ayyi naadum minku karab raas bineeye wa akhkhar maw’id al-cheeliin wa hu fakkar kadar al-ta’khiir da bigi gaasi le l-bineeye aw yidoor yichiilha achaan chahwatah bigat chadiide, khalaas khalli yichiilha. Khalli yil’aakhado. Da ma khata.
Laakin al-raajil al-indah niiye saabte fi galbah wa ma jabarooh wa lazam chahwaatah tamaam wa chaal kharaar fi galbah achaan yi’akhkhir maw’id al-cheeliin da, hu sawwa cheyy adiil.
Wa be misil da, al-yichiil al-bineeye al-karab raasha yisawwi cheyy adiil wa l-ma yichiilha yisawwi akheer.
Wa l-mu’mine al-maakhde marbuuta ma’a raajilha lahaddi mootah. Wa kan raajilha maat, hi indaha hagg achaan taakhud ayyi naadum al-tiriidah kan hu kula yitaabi’ derib Rabbina Isa.
Laakin leyi ana, yabga leeha akheer kan ma taakhud battaan. Wa fi fikri ana, Ruuh Allah gaa’id foogi wa fi kalaami.

Wa ana nurudd leeku fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-laham al-gaddamo dahiiye le l-asnaam. Al-kalaam al-intu gultu «aniina al-mu’miniin kullina indina ilim», da ma’ruuf. Laakin nuguul leeku al-ilim yisabbib al-istikbaar wa l-mahabba bas tigawwi al-ukhuuwa.
Kan naadum buguul hu aarif, hu lissaa’ ma irif misil hu waajib ya’arif.
Laakin kan naadum yihibb Allah, al-naadum da Allah aarfah.

Wa fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss akil al-laham al-dabahooh dahiiye le l-asnaam, akiid aniina na’arfu kadar «Al-sanam hu yimassil cheyy al-abadan ma mawjuud». Wa na’arfu kadar «Ma fi ilaah illa Allah al-Waahid».
Wa akiid, al-naas buguulu fi ilaahaat fi l-samaawaat wa l-ard. Wa be l-sahiih, al-naas buguulu fi ilaahaat wa arbaab katiiriin.

Wa laakin leena aniina al-mu’miniin, Allah waahid bas gaa’id wa hu Abuuna al-khalag kulla cheyy wa aniina mawjuudiin leyah hu. Wa Rabb waahid bas gaa’id wa hu Isa al-Masiih wa beyah hu kulla cheyy gaa’id wa beyah hu aniina hayyiin.

Laakin naas waahidiin ma karabo al-ilim da adiil. Wa akhwaan waahidiin fi aadithum gubbaal ma aamano gaa’idiin ya’abudu al-asnaam. Wa fi fikirhum, kan yaakulu al-laham da, yichaaruku battaan fi l-ibaada di. Wa kan akalo, al-eeb yisawwiihum achaan fikirhum fi l-iimaan lissaa’ ma gawi.
Wa sahiih, al-akil ma yiziid leena rida Allah. Kan ma naakuluuh, ma nakhsuru cheyy giddaam Allah. Wa kan naakuluuh kamaan, ma nalgo minnah faayde giddaam Allah.
Laakin aw’u baalku achaan al-hurriiye al-tiriiduuha di ma tamurgah min al-derib le l-mu’min al-iimaanah ma gawi.
Achaan inta tuguul inta naadum aalim wa kan naadum iimaanah ma gawi yichiifak inta gaa’id taakul fi beet al-asnaam, akuun hu kula yaakul al-laham al-gaddamooh le l-asnaam wa khalaas al-eeb yakurbah.
Wa misil da, inta taaba’t ilmak wa tallaft beyah akhuuk al-Rabbina al-Masiih maat fi chaanah.
Wa be da, intu khitiitu fi akhwaanku wa jibtu al-eeb fi l-akhwaan al-iimaanhum ma gawi wa khalaas khitiitu fi l-Masiih.
Achaan da, kan al-laham al-naakulah yamrug akhuui min al-derib, ana abadan ma naakul al-laham battaan achaan ma nidoor akhuui yamrug min al-derib be sababi ana.
Ana ma naadum hurr walla ? Ana ma rasuul al-Masiih walla ? Ana ma chift Isa Rabbina walla ? Wa ta’arfu kadar be khidimti ana bas, intu aamantu be Rabbina.
Kan fi fikir naas aakhariin ana ma rasuul kula, akiid leeku intu ana rasuul achaan al-alaakha al-induku ma’a Rabbina hi zaatha al-daliil al-yisabbit kadar ana rasuul be l-sahiih.
Wa misil da bas, ana gaa’id nidaafi’ le nafsi giddaam al-naas al-yukhuttu foogi kalaam.
Ma indina hagg nichiilu minku ma’iichitna walla ?
Ma indina hagg naakhudu mu’mine wa hi tiraafigna fi ruwaakhitna walla ? Da bas al-cheyy al-gaa’idiin yisawwuuh al-rusul al-aakhariin wa akhwaanah le Rabbina Isa wa Butrus kula.
Ana wa Barnaaba ni’iichu min khidmit duraa’na. Hal aniina wiheedna bas ma indina hagg nichiilu ma’iichitna min al-mu’miniin walla ?
Ween al-askari al-yikaffi nafsah ? Ween al-naadum al-yimaggin jineene hana inab wa ma yaakul minha cheyy ? Ween al-raa’i al-yasrah be khanam wa ma yachrab laban ?
Wa l-kalaam da ma hasab aadaat al-naas bas. Al-Tawraat kula buguul nafs al-cheyy.
Masalan, maktuub fi Tawraat Muusa {Wakit al-toor gaa’id yifajjikh leek al-khalla fi l-madagg, ma tarbut khachmah. Khalli yaakul}. Hal al-toor bas Allah yihimm beyah ?

Akiid, Allah gaal al-kalaam da fi chaanna aniina. Aywa, al-kalaam da maktuub le faayditna lahaddi al-harraati al-yahrit fi l-zere’ wa l-naadum al-yudugg al-khalla fi l-madagg yakhdumu be acham achaan yalgo cheyy min al-khalla.
Kan teerabna foogku cheyy jaayi min Allah wa natlubu minku cheyy hana l-dunya, hal natlubu minku ziyaada min al-waajib walla ? Abadan.

Wa kan fi naas aakhariin induhum hagg yichiilu minku, aniina kula indina be ziyaada. Laakin aniina ma chilna al-cheyy al-indina foogah hagg. La. Be sabur ti’ibna katiir achaan al-ta’ab akheer leena min nisawwu ayyi cheyy al-yisidd al-derib le ballikhiin bichaarat al-Masiih.
Akiid, ta’arfu kadar al-naas al-yakhdumu fi beet al-ibaada yalgo ma’iichithum min beet al-ibaada wa l-naas al-khidmithum dabihiin al-bahaayim wa gaddimiinhum dahiiye le Allah yaakulu min al-laham.
Wa misil da, Rabbina Isa amar wa gaal kadar al-naas al-khidmithum ballikhiin bichaarat al-Masiih yalgo minha ma’iichithum.

Laakin al-cheyy al-indi foogah hagg le nichiilah, ana abadan ma chiltah. Wa hassa’ da, ana ma gaa’id naktib al-kalaam da achaan nidoor nalga minku cheyy. Akheer leyi numuut. Achaan al-cheyy al-narfa’ beyah raasi giddaam ayyi naadum, ma nikhalli naadum yichiilah minni.

Sahiih, ana gaa’id niballikh bichaarat al-Masiih laakin da ma yantiini sabab achaan nisawwi nafsi kabiir beyah. Al-ballikhiin da Allah amaraani beyah. Kan ana ma niballikh al-bichaara, da eeb kabiir marra waahid.
Kan nisawwi al-khidme di achaan ana nidoorha bas, al-ujra waajbe leyi. Laakin ana ma azzalt al-khidme di be niiyiti. Allah bas kallafaani beeha.

Wa be misil da, ujurti chunu ? Kan al-naas al-niballikh leehum al-bichaara ma yikaffu cheyy achaan ana abeet ma nichiil al-waajib leyi min ballikhiin al-bichaara, khalaas ana farhaan bilheen. Wa di bas ujurti.
Sahiih, ana hurr wa ana ma abid hana ayyi naadum laakin ana ja’alt nafsi misil abid hana kulla l-naas achaan nijiib naas ziyaada fi derib al-naja.

Kan ana gaa’id fi ust al-Yahuud, ana nitaabi’ aadaat al-Yahuud achaan nijiibhum fi l-derib. Aywa, kan ana gaa’id ambeenaat al-naas al-yitaabu’u churuut al-Tawraat, ana kula nabga misil naadum yitaabi’ churuut al-Tawraat. Wa be l-sahiih, ana ma tihit churuut al-Tawraat laakin nidoor nijiibhum fi l-derib le l-naas al-gaa’idiin tihit churuut al-Tawraat.

Wa kan ana gaa’id ma’a al-naas al-ma Yahuud, ma’anaatah al-ma tihit churuut al-Tawraat, ana nisawwi nafsi misilhum ma tihit churuut al-Tawraat achaan nijiibhum fi l-derib le l-naas al-ma tihit churuut al-Tawraat. Wa be l-sahiih, ana ma abeet churuut Allah achaan ana gaa’id nitaabi’ churuut al-Masiih.

Wa kan ana gaa’id ma’a l-naas al-ma induhum gudra, ana nabga naadum ma indah gudra achaan nijiib al-ma induhum gudra fi l-derib. Ana nisawwi nafsi misil ayyi naadum fi ayyi haal achaan be ayyi daliil ninajji waahidiin minhum.
Wa khalaas, da kulla ke nisawwiih fi chaan ballikhiin bichaarat al-Masiih achaan nichaarik fi barakaatha.
Ta’arfu kadar fi l-sabag, kulla l-naas yajru laakin waahid minhum bas yalga al-jaa’iza. Chiilu al-masal da wa jaahudu fi derib al-iimaan achaan talgo al-jaa’iza.

Wa na’arfu kan naadum riyaadi, hu yisabbit nafsah fi ayyi haal wa yijaahid. Wa l-jaa’iza al-hu yidoor yalgaaha di, hi tatlaf ajala. Laakin aniina nijaahudu achaan nalgo al-jaa’iza al-abadan ma tatlaf.
Achaan da, fi derib al-iimaan ana jaari giddaam be niiye waahide. Nisawwi nafsi misil al-musaari’ al-chadiid.
Aywa, ana niwallif jismi be chidde wa nisabbitah marra waahid. Achaan kan ma nisabbit nafsi, akuun ninaadi al-naas fi derib al-naja laakin fi l-akhiir ana zaati yadharooni min al-jaa’iza.
Ya akhwaani, nidoor intu ta’arfu ma’ana al-cheyy al-bigi fi zaman Muusa
Wa kulluhum bigo cha’ab Muusa be khattisiin fi l-sahaabaay wa l-bahar.
Wa kulluhum akalo al-akil al-waahid al-Allah antaah leehum.
Wa kulluhum chirbo al-charaab al-waahid al-Allah antaahum. Wa min al-hajar al-Allah antaahum, humman chirbo almi. Wa l-hajar da macha ma’aahum wa hu al-Masiih.
Wa laakin na’arfu kadar fi l-akhiir Allah ma ridi be katiiriin minhum. Wa achaan da, katiiriin minhum maato fi l-sahara.
Wa da kulla ke bigi leehum achaan yabga leena masal. Humman habbo al-charr wa khalli ma nabgo misilhum.
Waahidiin minhum bigo aabdiin asnaam wa waajib ma tabgo misilhum. Wa maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Al-cha’ab ga’ado achaan yaakulu wa yachrabo wa gammo achaan yal’abo ma’a l-awiin}
Waajib aniina ma nazno. Waahidiin minhum zano wa fi yoom waahid bas, maato talaata wa ichriin alif.
Waajib ma nijarrubu al-Masiih misilhum. Waahidiin minhum jarrabooh wa l-dabiib jo dammaroohum.
Waajib ma nachku le Allah. Waahidiin minhum bigo chakkaayiin wa khalaas, malak al-moot ja dammaraahum.
Wa da kulla ke ja fooghum achaan yabga leena masal wa ankatab achaan yi’allimna aniina al-aaychiin fi l-zaman al-akhiir.
Wa fi chaan da, khalli kulli naadum al-yuguul hu saabit fi l-iimaan yukhutt baalah achaan ma yamrug min al-derib.
Ma fi tajriba jaat foogku al-ma jaat foog kulla l-naas. Wa Allah hu saadikh wa be l-tajriba di, hu yaftah leeku derib achaan tamurgu beyah wa yantiiku al-gudra achaan tasburu fi l-tajriba di.
Ya akhwaani al-nihibbuku, fakkuru fi kulla l-kalaam da wa angar’u min ibaadat al-asnaam.
Ana gaa’id nihajji kalaam adiil le naas aagliin. Fakkuru fi kalaami wa mayyuzuuh.

Fakkuru fi Acha al-Masiih wa fi kaas hana asiir al-inab al-nacharbo minnah be chukur, chaakiriin Allah. Wa wakit nacharbo minnah, aniina ma muchtarikiin fi damm al-Masiih walla ? Wa fakkuru fi l-khubza al-naksuruuha. Wakit naakulu minha, aniina ma muchtarikiin fi jisim al-Masiih walla ?
Aywa, achaan al-khubza di waahide wa aniina al-katiiriin kula bigiina jisim waahid be akilna le l-khubza al-waahide di.
Fakkuru fi ibaada hana Bani Israa’iil. Al-naas al-yaakulu min laham al-dahiiye al-gaddamooha le Allah muchtarikiin fi l-dahiiye di.
Wa maala ana gult leeku al-kalaam da ? Hal ana gult al-laham al-naas hillitku yigaddumuuh le asnaamhum dool indah gudra walla ? Hal ana gult al-sanam hu yimassil ayyi cheyy al-gaa’id be l-sahiih ?
La, abadan. Laakin nidoor nuguul leeku kadar al-naas al-ma ba’arfu Allah yigaddumu dahiiye le l-chawaatiin wa ma le Allah wa ana ma nidoor intu tabgo muchtarikiin ma’a l-chawaatiin.
Ma waajib tacharbo min kaas al-Masiih wa battaan min kaas al-chawaatiin. Ma waajib tichtaruku fi Acha al-Masiih wa battaan fi acha al-chawaatiin.
Nidooru niza’’ulu Rabbina walla ? Aniina gaadriin minnah hu walla ?
Intu gultu «Kulla cheyy halaal». Wa laakin nuguul ma kulla cheyy indah faayde. «Kulla cheyy halaal» laakin ma kulla cheyy yigawwi al-iimaan.
Khalli ayyi waahid yukhutt baalah fi l-cheyy al-yijiib faayde le akhuuh wa ma fi l-cheyy al-yijiib faayde leyah hu wiheedah bas.
Al-laham al-yibii’uuh fi l-suug da, aakuluuh bala chakkak.
Achaan maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Al-ard hint Allah wa kulla cheyy al-gaa’id foogha hanaayah}.
Kan naadum ma mu’min ya’azimku achaan ti’achchu ma’aayah wa kan induku niiye, amchu wa achchu ma’aayah. Aakulu kulla cheyy al-yigaddumuuh leeku bala chakkak.

Laakin kan naadum waahid yuguul leeku «Al-laham da hana l-dahiiye al-gaddamooh le l-asnaam» fi l-bakaan da bas, ma taakuluuh. Fakkuru fi l-naadum al-ooraak beyah wa fi l-muchkila al-indah fi l-laham da.
Ana ma nuguul induku muchkila laakin al-naadum al-ooraaku, hu indah muchkila. Wa ana ma gaa’id nigassir al-hurriiye al-indi fi chaan muchkila hana naadum aakhar.
Ana chakart Allah fi chaan al-akil al-naakulah wa khalaas ma nidoor yuluumuuni fi l-akil al-chakart Allah fi chaanah.
Wa khalaas, majjudu Allah fi kulla cheyy al-taakuluuh wa l-tacharbooh wa fi ayyi cheyy al-tisawwuuh.
Ma tisawwu muchkila le ayyi naadum, wa la min al-Yahuud wa la min al-Yuunaaniyiin wa la min ummat al-Masiih al-Allah ikhtaaraahum.

Sawwu misli ana. Ana nidoor daayman nisawwi al-cheyy al-kulla l-naas yardo beyah. Wa ma nukhutt baali fi l-cheyy al-yijiib leyi ana bas faayde laakin nukhutt baali fi l-cheyy al-yijiib faayde le kulla l-naas achaan nidoor humman yanjo.
Taabu’u derbi achaan ana gaa’id nitaabi’ derib al-Masiih.
Wa ana farhaan minku achaan intu gaa’idiin tifakkuru foogi wa titaabu’u adiil al-aadaat al-allamtuhum leeku.
Wa laakin fi cheyy nidoor intu tafhamooh wa da hu. Ra’iis hana raajil hu al-Masiih wa ra’iis al-mara hu al-raajil wa ra’iis al-Masiih hu Allah.
Wa ayyi raajil al-yisalli walla yikallim kalaam naazil min Allah wa yikhatti raasah, yijiib eeb fi l-Masiih al-hu ra’iisah.
Wa ayyi mara al-tisalli walla tikallim kalaam naazil min Allah wa ma tikhatti raasha, hi tijiib eeb fi raajilha al-hu ra’iisha. Wa da eeb kabiir leeha misil zayyano suuf raasha.
Wa kan mara taaba ma tikhatti raasha, khalli tuguss cha’arha. Wa kan gassiin al-cha’ar wa zayyiniin al-raas tichiifah eeb le l-mara, khalaas khalli tikhatti raasha.
Wa ma waajib le l-raajil yikhatti raasah achaan Allah khalagah fi suurtah achaan yiwassif azamtah laakin al-mara tiwassif azamat al-raajil.
Achaan al-raajil ma min mara laakin al-mara min al-raajil
wa Allah ma khalag al-raajil min al-mara laakin khalag al-mara min al-raajil.
Wa achaan da bas, waajib le l-mara tukhutt cheyy fi raasha al-yiwassif hi fi tihit al-sulta. Wa battaan da muhimm le l-malaa’ika.
Wa da kulla ke sahiih laakin fi nizaam Rabbina, bala al-raajil al-mara ma fiiha wa bala al-mara al-raajil ma fiih.
Achaan awwal al-mara jaat min al-raajil wa hassa’ ayyi raajil ja min mara wa kulla cheyy ja min Allah.
Wa leeku intu, nuguul fakkuru adiil wa mayyuzu al-kalaam da. Kan mara tisalli le Allah wa raasha ma mukhatta, da muwaafig walla ?
Wa na’arfu min tabii’at al-haal cha’ar tuwaal eeb le l-raajil.
Wa laakin kan mara indaha cha’ar tuwaal, da sameh wa da charafha. Wa Allah antaaha cha’ar tuwaal achaan yabga leeha khattaay.
Wa kan ayyi naadum yidoor yinaakhich fi l-kalaam da, khalli ya’arif aniina ma nikhassudu be l-aade al-hu yidoorha wa battaan ummat al-Masiih al-Allah ikhtaaraahum ma yikhassudu beeha fi ayyi bakaan.
Wa laakin fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-kalaam al-hassa’ nihajji foogah, ana ma farhaan beeku marra waahid achaan wakit tulummu fi malammat al-mu’miniin, al-fasaala katiire min al-kheer.

Wa gult al-kalaam da achaan al-khabar al-simi’tah foogku. Awwal cheyy, buguulu wakit tulummu fi malammat al-mu’miniin, intu mufarragiin wa ambeenaatku tilkhaalafo. Wa fi fikri, al-kalaam da ma kulla ke kidib.
Aywa, laabudda intu mufarragiin achaan kan al-khilaaf ambeenaatku ma fiih, kikkeef al-naas al-iimaanhum saabit yin’arfu ?
Wa wakit tulummu sawa, al-acha al-taakuluuh da ma acha Rabbina.
Achaan fi saa’at al-acha, waahidiin yaakulu ajala gubbaal al-aakhariin. Wa be da, naas waahidiin akalo wa sikiro kula wa naas aakhariin jii’aaniin.

Wa da kikkeef ? Ma taakulu wa tacharbo fi buyuutku walla ? Aw tahguru ummat al-Masiih al-Allah ikhtaarha wa tidooru ti’ayyubu al-naas al-ma induhum cheyy ? Wa nuguul leeku chunu ? Wa be da, nachkurku walla ? La, abadan.
Asma’o, da bas al-kalaam al-ligiitah min Rabbina wa allamtuku leyah. Fi l-leele al-yukhuunu foogha Rabbina Isa, hu chaal khubza waahide
wa chakar Allah wa kasarha wa gaal «Da jismi al-hu fi chaanku. Da bas sawwuuh achaan tizzakkarooni beyah».

Wa ba’ad al-acha, hu sawwa nafs al-cheyy be l-kaas. Hu chaalah wa gaal «Al-kaas da yiwassif al-mu’aahada al-jadiide ma’a Allah al-nisawwiiha be dammi. Da bas sawwuuh wa ayyi wakit al-tacharbo minnah, tizakkuruuni».
Wa khalaas, ayyi wakit taakulu al-khubza di wa tacharbo min al-kaas da, tiballukhu moot Rabbina Isa lahaddi yaji battaan.
Wa achaan da battaan, ayyi naadum al-yaakul khubzat Rabbina wa yachrab min kaasah wa niiyitah ma mukhlisa, hu yudurr jisim Rabbina wa dammah.
Khalli ayyi naadum yimtahin nafsah gubbaal ma yaakul al-khubza wa yachrab min al-kaas.
Achaan ayyi naadum al-yaakul wa yachrab acha al-Masiih bala fikir fi jisim al-Masiih, hu yinaadi al-azaab yanzil fi nafsah.
Wa achaan da bas, katiiriin minku ayyaaniin wa mardaaniin wa waahidiin maato kula.
Wa kan awwal na’amalo fi nufuusna hisaab adiil, khalaas al-azaab ma yanzil foogna.
Wa laakin kan Rabbina yihaasibna kula, hu yi’addibna achaan al-azaab al-yanzil foog naas al-dunya ma yaji foogna.
Achaan da ya akhwaani, wakit tulummu achaan taakulu acha al-Masiih, khalli ayyi naadum yarja akhwaanah.
Kan naadum jii’aan wa ma yagdar yarja al-aakhariin, akheer yaakul fi beetah. Ma tikhallu malammitku tinaadi al-azaab yanzil foogku.
