Wa khalaas, fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-su’aalaat al-aakhariin, nantiiku wasaaya wakit najiiku.
Ya akhwaani, fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss barakaat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus, nidoor intu tafhamo adiil.
Ta’arfu kadar awwal intu ma iriftu Allah wa intu khachchooku wa waddooku lahaddi abadtu al-asnaam al-ma buguulu cheyy.
Achaan da, nidoor intu tafhamo adiil kadar al-naadum al-yihajji be gudrat Ruuh Allah abadan ma yuguul «Isa man’uul». Wa ma fi naadum yuguul «Isa hu al-Rabb» illa be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus.
Khalaas, al-ataaya al-Allah yantiihum chig chig laakin al-Ruuh al-Khudduus waahid.
Wa l-khidme al-nakhdumuuha chig chig laakin Rabbina waahid.
Wa l-amal al-nisawwuuh chig chig laakin Allah al-Waahid bas yantiina al-gudra achaan ayyi naadum yisawwi ayyi cheyy.
Wa Allah yinazzil le ayyi naadum atiiye be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus achaan kullina nalgo minha faayde.
Hu yanti le naadum waahid gudra be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus achaan yikallim be l-hikma wa le naadum aakhar yantiih gudra achaan yikallim beeha al-ilim wa da be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-waahid bas.
Wa yanti le naadum aakhar be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-waahid iimaan gawi marra waahid wa yanti le naadum aakhar gudra achaan yidaawi beeha al-mardaaniin wa da kula be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-waahid bas.

Wa le naadum waahid yanti gudra achaan yisawwi ajaayib wa le naadum waahid kalaam naazil min Allah wa le naadum waahid gudra achaan yimayyiz gudrat Ibliis min gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus. Wa le naadum waahid yanti lukhkhaat chig chig min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus wa le naadum aakhar gudra achaan yifassir al-lukhkhaat dool.
Wa l-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-waahid, hu bas al-yijiib kulla l-barakaat dool wa yigassimhum le ayyi naadum misil hu yidoorah.
Wa ta’arfu kadar jisim hana naadum hu waahid wa battaan al-jisim da indah a’da katiiriin. Wa a’da al-jisim katiiriin laakin humman jisim waahid bas. Wa ummat al-Masiih kula misil al-jisim da.

Achaan Allah khattasaana kullina be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-waahid achaan nabgo jisim waahid wa da jisim al-Masiih. Wa sawwa nafs al-cheyy leena kullina kan aniina Yahuud walla ma Yahuud, wa kan aniina abiid walla hurriin. Wa Allah sawwa al-Ruuh al-Khudduus bigi leena misil al-charaab al-waahid al-kullina ke chiribna minnah.
Achaan al-jisim abadan ma udu waahid bas. Hu a’da katiiriin.
Masalan, al-rijil udu min al-jisim. Wa kan hi tuguul «Ana ma iid wa achaan da ana ma udu min al-jisim», al-kalaam da ma yamrugha min al-jisim.
Wa kan al-adaan tuguul «Ana ma een wa achaan da ana ma udu min al-jisim», al-kalaam da ma yamrugha min al-jisim.
Wa battaan kan kulla l-jisim bigi een, kikkeef yasma’ ? Wa kan kulla l-jisim bigi adaan, kikkeef yuchumm ?
Laakin Allah nazzam kulla l-a’da fi l-jisim achaan ayyi udu gaa’id fi l-bakaan al-hu dawwarah.
Kan kulla l-jisim bigi udu waahid, ween al-jisim ?
Wa khalaas, al-a’da katiiriin wa battaan humman jisim waahid.
Wa waajib al-een ma tuguul le l-iid «Ana ma nidoorki» walla l-raas yuguul le l-rijileen «Ana ma nidoorku».
La, da ma yabga achaan a’da waahidiin gaa’idiin fi lubb al-jisim ma gawiiyiin wa laakin na’arfu kadar balaahum al-jisim ma yanfa’.
Wa nantu lubaas le l-a’da al-ma nikarrumuuhum wa misil da nicharrufuuhum ziyaada min al-a’da al-aakhariin. Wa l-a’da al-waajib ma binchaafo be sabab al-eeb, nirayyusuuhum be ikraam ziyaada.
Wa l-rayyisiin da ma waajib le a’daa’na al-binchaafo. Wa Allah nazzam al-jisim wa hu anta ikraam ziyaada le l-udu al-indah eeb
achaan a’da al-jisim ma yinfarugu abadan wa ayyi udu waajib yirayyis kulla akhwaanah be niiye waahide.
Wa kan waahid minhum ta’baan, kulluhum ta’baaniin sawa sawa. Wa kan waahid yalga ikraam, kulluhum farhaaniin sawa sawa.
Wa khalaas intu kulluku jisim al-Masiih wa ayyi naadum udu minnah.

Wa Allah nazzam ummat al-Masiih wa ja’al leeha khaddaamiin. Awwal ke al-rusul wa taani al-anbiya wa taalit al-mu’allimiin. Wa battaan hu anta gudra achaan naas waahidiin yisawwu ajaayib wa yidaawu al-mardaaniin wa yisaa’udu akhwaanhum wa yuguuduuhum wa yihajju lukhkhaat chig chig min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus.
Kulla l-mu’miniin rusul walla ? Kulluhum anbiya walla ? Kulluhum mu’allimiin walla ? Kulluhum yisawwu ajaayib walla ?
Kulluhum induhum gudra achaan yidaawu al-mardaaniin walla ? Kulluhum yikallumu be lukhkhaat min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus walla ? Kulluhum yifassuru al-lukhkhaat dool ? Akiid la.
Wa laakin nuguul leeku itmannu be niiye waahide achaan talgo barakaat hana l-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-kubaar. Wa awwal ke, niwassifku al-derib al-adiil marra waahid.
Kan nikallim be lukhkhaat al-naas wa be lukhkhaat al-malaa’ika wa ma indi al-mahabba, kalaami ma indah faayde. Be da kalaami bigi misil daggiin al-nahaas walla baki hana jaras.

Wa kan nikallim kalaam naazil min Allah wa nafham kulla l-asraar wa kulla cheyy hana l-ilim wa kan indi iimaan gawi marra waahid lahaddi narfa’ al-jibaal min bakaanaathum kula wa kan ma indi al-mahabba, ana ma cheyy.
Wa kan nanti kulla cheyy al-indi le l-masaakiin wa nisallim jismi le l-khidme achaan fi l-yoom al-akhiir narfa’ raasi foog
Al-naadum al-indah mahabba sabuur wa zeen. Al-indah mahabba ma hasuud. Al-indah mahabba ma fachchaar wa ma mustakbir.
Hu ma yisawwi cheyy hana eeb. Hu ma yifakkir fi nafsah bas. Wa ma yaz’al ajala. Hu ma yifakkir fi l-khata al-akhwaanah sawwooh.
Hu abadan ma yafrah be l-zulum laakin yafrah daayman be l-hagg.
Al-indah mahabba hu yahmal ayyi cheyy. Hu yi’aamin fi kulli haal wa achamah saabit fi kulli haal wa hu saabir fi kulli haal.
Al-mahabba abadan ma tikammil. Wakit hana l-kalaam al-naazil min Allah yikammil. Wa wakit hana l-lukhkhaat al-min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus yintahi. Wa wakit hana l-ilim yikammil.
Achaan al-ilim al-indina muhaddad wa niballukhu kalaam naazil min Allah laakin ballikhiinah muhaddad.
Laakin yoom al-aakhira yaji wa fi l-yoom da, al-muhaddad yikammil khalaas.

Masalan, wakit ana wileed sakhayyar ana hajjeet hana hije iyaal dugaag wa fikri kula hana iyaal dugaag wa agli kula hana iyaal dugaag. Wa wakit ana kibirt khalaas wa bigiit raajil, khalleet minni al-iyaaliiye.

Achaan hassa’ fi zamanna da, nichiifu al-hagg misil nichiifuuh fi amchawwaafa al-waskhaane wa fi l-aakhira nichiifuuh tamaam. Hassa’ da, ana irift chiyya wa ba’adeen na’arif tamaam misil Allah irifni.
Wa khalaas, al-talaata al-yagoodu daayman humman al-iimaan wa l-acham wa l-mahabba. Wa l-akbar minhum al-mahabba.

Achaan da, inkarubu fi l-mahabba wa battaan itmannu be niiye waahide achaan talgo barakaat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus. Wa min al-barakaat dool, itmannu ziyaada achaan tikallumu al-kalaam al-naazil min Allah.

Achaan kan naadum yikallim be lukhkhaat min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus, hu yihajji le Allah wa ma yihajji le l-naas achaan ma fi naadum yafham kalaamah. Hu gaa’id yihajji be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus kalaam ma ma’ruuf.
Laakin kan naadum yikallim kalaam naazil min Allah, hu yihajji le l-naas wa yigawwi iimaanhum wa yichajji’hum wa yisabbirhum.
Al-yikallim be lukhkhaat yigawwi nafsah laakin al-yikallim kalaam naazil min Allah yigawwi jamaa’at al-mu’miniin.

Wa ana nidoor kulluku tihajju be lukhkhaat laakin nidoor ziyaada kadar tikallumu kalaam naazil min Allah. Al-yikallim le l-naas kalaam naazil min Allah akheer min al-yikallim le l-naas be lukhkhaat. Achaan al-yikallim be lukhkhaat ma yigawwi al-mu’miniin illa kan naadum waahid yifassir kalaamah leehum.

Ya akhwaani, kan najiiku wa nikallim leeku kalaam be lukhkhaat, ma talgo faayde min kalaami. Laakin talgo faayde muhimma kan nikallim leeku ru’ya al-chiftaha aw kalaam hana l-ilim aw kalaam naazil min Allah aw kalaam hana ta’liim.
Chiilu masal hana aalaat al-musiikha misil al-suffaara walla l-jigindiye. Humman ma induhum ruuh kula laakin nidooru hissuhum yabga waadih. Wa kan ma waadih, al-musiikha ma tin’arif.
Kan al-burunji ma yinaadi al-askar be hiss waadih, yaatu al-yijahhiz nafsah le l-duwaas ?
Wa leeku intu kula nafs al-cheyy. Kan lisaanku ma yihajji kalaam waadih, kikkeef ayyi naadum yafham al-kalaam al-tuguuluuh ? Kalaamku macha fi l-riih saakit.
Bala chakk, fiyah lukhkhaat katiiriin fi l-dunya wa ayyi waahide tinfahim.
Laakin kan naadum yihajji leyi be lukhkha al-ma na’arifha, ana ma nafham kalaamah. Nabga misil ajnabi le l-naadum al-yihajji beeha wa hu ajnabi leyi ana.
Wa leeku intu kula nafs al-cheyy. Intu munkaribiin fi gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus ambeenaatku wa da adiil laakin inkarubu ziyaada fi l-barakaat al-yigawwu jamaa’at al-mu’miniin.
Achaan da, waajib ayyi naadum al-yikallim be lukhkhaat yatlub min Allah gudra achaan yifassir kalaamah.
Kan nisalli be lukhkhaat min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus, galbi yisalli laakin al-kalaam al-nuguulah ma jaayi min fikri.
Wa l-waajib al-nisawwiih, nisalli be lukhkhaat min al-Ruuh wa battaan nisalli be kalaam jaayi min fikri. Nachkur Allah be madih be lukhkhaat min al-Ruuh wa nachkurah be madih jaayi min fikri kula.
Wa kan inta chakart Allah be kalaam be lukhkhaat min al-Ruuh, al-naadum al-ma fihim kalaamak da bigi leek misil ajnabi. Hu ma fihim al-kalaam al-inta gultah wa achaan da, ma yagdar yuguul «Aamiin».
Akuun chakart Allah adiil laakin akhuuk da, inta ma gawweet iimaanah.
Wa l-hamdulillah, ana zaati nihajji be lukhkhaat min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus ziyaada minku kulluku.
Laakin fi malammat al-mu’miniin, kan ni’allim al-naas be khamsa kalimaat min lukhkha al-tinfahim, da akheer min nikallim be lukhkhaat achara alif kilme al-ma tinfahim.

Ya akhwaani, khalli fikirku ma yabga misil fikir hana l-iyaal al-dugaag. Khalli ayyi naadum yabga bari misil al-tifil fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-charr. Laakin khalli fikirku yabga fikir hana l-naadum al-aagil.

Wa maktuub fi Kitaab Allah {Nikallim le l-cha’ab dool be l-naas al-lukhkhaathum ma ma’ruufa wa be khuchuum al-ajaanib laakin fi l-bakaan da kula, al-cha’ab dool yaabo ma yasma’o kalaami. Da bas kalaam Allah}.
Wa be misil da, kalaam be lukhkhaat ma yabga alaama le l-mu’miniin laakin le l-ma mu’miniin. Wa l-kalaam al-naazil min Allah ma yabga alaama le l-ma mu’miniin wa laakin le l-mu’miniin.
Masalan, kan kulluku taju fi malammat al-mu’miniin wa kulluku tihajju be lukhkhaat wa diifaan aw naas ma mu’miniin yindasso, humman yuguulu intu muchootiniin.
Laakin kan kulluku tikallumu al-kalaam al-naazil min Allah wa naadum ma mu’min aw deef yindassa fi l-bakaan da, kalaamku yindassa foogah wa hu yinfadih giddaam Allah.
Wa l-zunuub al-labbadaahum fi galbah yinkachfu wa achaan da, ajala ke yasjud wa ya’abud Allah. Wa yachhad wa yuguul «Be l-sahiih Allah gaa’id fi usutku».

Wa be misil da ya akhwaani, chunu al-waajib ? Wakit tulummu, khalli ayyi naadum yijiib al-cheyy al-indah. Naadum waahid indah madih wa naadum aakhar indah ta’liim wa aakhar indah al-cheyy al-Allah wassafah leyah fi ru’ya wa aakhar indah kalaam be lukhkhaat walla tafsiir. Wa kulla cheyy al-tisawwuuh waajib yigawwi al-akhwaan.
Kan naas yikallumu be lukhkhaat min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus, khalli itneen walla talaata bas yikallumu waahid ba’ad waahid. Wa khalli naadum yifassir kalaamhum.
Wa laakin kan ma fi naadum al-yagdar yifassir kalaamhum, khalli yagoodu saakit ma yikallumu fi malammat al-mu’miniin. Khalliihum yihajju le Allah be hiss tihit bas.
Wa khalli itneen walla talaata naas yikallumu kalaam naazil min Allah wa khalli al-aakhariin yimayyuzu kalaamhum.
Wa kan naadum aakhar gaa’id yasma’ wa kalaam Allah yanzil leyah, khalli al-naadum al-gaa’id yikallim yaskut.
Achaan kulluku induku fursa tikallumu kalaam naazil min Allah waahid ba’ad waahid. Wa misil da, ayyi naadum yil’allam min al-aakhariin wa kulluku talgo chajaa’a.
Wa l-naadum al-yikallim al-kalaam al-naazil min Allah indah gudra foog al-kalaam al-yuguulah
achaan Allah ma yarda be l-barjaal. Hu yarda be l-salaam. Wa yabga misil da fi kulla jamaa’aat al-saalihiin.
Wa fi malammat al-mu’miniin waajib al-awiin yaskutan. Ma indihin izin yi’awwan. Waajib yabgan daluulaat misil maktuub fi l-Tawraat kula.
Wa kan indihin su’aal fi l-ta’aaliim, khalli yas’alan rujaalhin fi buyuuthin. Kan mara tihajji fi malammat al-mu’miniin, da eeb marra waahid.
Wa kikkeef ? Fi fikirku ballikhiin kalaam Allah awwal bada fi usutku walla ? Aw intu wiheedku bas simi’tu kalaam Allah walla ?
Kan naadum yuguul hu nabi walla naadum hana l-Ruuh al-Khudduus, khalli yi’tarif kadar al-kalaam al-gaa’id naktibah leeku da amur min Rabbina.
Wa kan ayyi naadum yankur al-kalaam da, Rabbina yankurah.
Wa ya akhwaani, da bas zibdit al-kalaam. Itmannu be niiye waahide achaan tikallumu kalaam naazil min Allah wa ma tadharo kalaam be lukhkhaat min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus.
Wa sawwu kulla cheyy fi malammat al-kaniisa be adab wa nizaam.
Ya akhwaani, nidoor nifakkirku be l-bichaara al-Masiih al-ballakhtaha leeku. Al-bichaara di intu khibiltuuha wa be sababha bas intu mu’miniin.
Wa be l-bichaara di tanjo kan takurbu gawi al-kalaam al-ballakhtah leeku. Wa kan al-kalaam da ma sahiih, iimaanku baatil.
Wa l-kalaam al-muhimm gubbaal kulla cheyy al-ana allamtah leeku al-ana kula allamooni leyah, daahu. Al-Masiih maat fi chaan zunuubna misil maktuub fi l-Kitaab laabudda yabga.
Wa hu dafanooh wa Allah ba’asah fi l-yoom al-taalit misil maktuub fi l-Kitaab laabudda yabga.
Wa hu baan le Butrus wa ba’ad da baan le l-rusul al-atnaachar.
Wa yoom aakhar, hu baan fi bakaan waahid le khumsumiya naas min al-mu’miniin. Wa l-naas dool waahidiin minhum maato laakin katiiriin minhum lissaa’hum hayyiin.
Wa ba’ad da, baan le Yaakhuub wa le kulla l-rusul.
Wa ba’ad al-Masiih baan le kulla l-naas dool, fi l-akhiir baan leyi ana al-misil al-sakhiir al-wildooh fi wakit ma waktah.
Wa min kulla l-rusul, ana bas sakhayyarhum lahaddi ma waajib yinaaduuni rasuul kula achaan awwal ana ta’’abt ummat al-Masiih al-Allah ikhtaarha.

Laakin hassa’ ana rasuul achaan Allah antaani ni’ma wa ni’matah al-gaa’ide foogi di abadan ma fachalat. Wa akiid ma fachalat fi chaan ana khadamt khidme ziyaada minhum kulluhum. Wa be l-sahiih, al-khadam adiil ma ana laakin ni’mat Allah al-gaa’ide foogi hi bas al-khadamat.
Wa kan simi’tu al-bichaara minni ana walla min al-rusul al-aakhariin, ma fi farig. Kullina niballukhu nafs al-kalaam wa khalaas, be sababah intu aamantu.
Wa kan kullina niballukhu kadar Allah ba’as al-Masiih min ust al-maytiin, kikkeef waahidiin minku buguulu al-maytiin ma yab’aso ?
Kan bu’aas al-maytiin ma yabga, al-Masiih kula ma ba’as.
Wa kan al-Masiih ma ba’as, ballakhna kalaam ma indah faayde wa iimaanku baatil.
Wa fi l-bakaan da, aniina gaa’idiin nakdubu fi Allah achaan chihidna gulna Allah ba’as al-Masiih. Wa da ma yabga sahiih kan al-maytiin ma yab’aso.
Achaan kan al-maytiin ma yab’aso, khalaas al-Masiih kula ma ba’as.
Wa kan al-Masiih ma ba’as, iimaanku baatil wa intu gaa’idiin be zunuubku.
Wa be da, al-mu’miniin be l-Masiih al-maato waddaro saakit.
Wa kan al-giyaama ma fiiha wa khatteena achamna fi l-Masiih fi chaan al-dunya bas, haalitna gaasiye marra waahid min kulla l-naas.
Laakin be l-sahiih, Allah ba’as al-Masiih wa l-Masiih bas Bikir al-Maytiin, ma’anaatah hu awwal naadum al-ba’as min ust al-maytiin.
Wa misil al-moot ja foog al-naas be sabab naadum waahid, al-bu’aas kula ja be sabab naadum waahid.
Kulla iyaal Adam yumuutu wa kulla naas al-Masiih yab’aso.
Laakin ayyi naadum yab’as hasab bakaanah fi nizaam Allah. Awwal, al-Bikir ba’as wa hu al-Masiih. Wa ba’adeen, fi yoom jaytah, kulla naas hana l-Masiih yab’aso.
Wa da bas al-wakit al-akhiir. Wa l-Masiih yidammir gudra hana ayyi ra’iis wa sultaan wa haakim wa khalaas yisallim al-mamlaka le Abuuh Allah.
Wa laabudda al-Masiih yamluk lahaddi Allah yukhutt kulla udwaanah tihit rijileenah.
Wa aakhir adu al-yidammirah, hu al-moot.
Achaan maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Allah khatta kulla cheyy tihit rijileenah}. Wa na’arfu kadar Allah ma khatta nafsah tihit rijileen al-Masiih, achaan Allah bas al-khatta tihit al-Masiih kulla cheyy.

Wa wakit kulla cheyy yukuun tihit rijileen Ibn Allah, khalaas fi l-wakit daak, Ibn Allah zaatah yukhutt nafsah tihit Allah al-khatta tihtah kulla cheyy. Wa khalaas, Allah wiheedah bas yabga foog kulla cheyy.

Wa kan bu’aas ma fiih, al-naas al-yikhattusuuhum fi chaan akhwaanhum al-maytiin gaa’idiin yisawwu chunu ? Kan al-maytiin abadan ma yab’aso, maala naas waahidiin yikhattusuuhum fi chaan akhwaanhum al-maytiin ?
Wa aniina kamaan, maala gaa’idiin fi l-khutuura ayyi wakit ?
Ya akhwaani al-be sababku raasi foog giddaam al-Masiih Isa Rabbina, nachhad kadar kulla ma yoom ana gaa’id fi ust al-moot.

Hini fi hillit Afasus ana ti’ibt marra waahid misil naadum gaa’id yidaawis al-haywaanaat al-khatariyiin. Wa kan bu’aas ma fiih, ween al-faayde le l-insaan min al-ta’ab al-misil da ? Kan misil da, akheer nitaabu’u kalaam hana muznibiin al-zamaan al-gaalo {Khalli naakulu wa nacharbo wa nafraho achaan ambaakir numuutu bas}.
Ma tukhuchchu nufuusku. Haal al-saalihiin tatlaf fi ust al-muznibiin.
Gabbulu fi l-derib al-adiil al-ta’arfuuh wa khallu minku al-zunuub. Gult al-kalaam da achaan naas waahidiin minku ma ba’arfu Allah. Wa da eeb leeku.
Wa laakin akuun naadum yas’al wa yuguul «Al-maytiin yab’aso kikkeef ? Jisimhum yabga kikkeef ?».
Inta al-matmuus ! Al-teeraab al-titeeribah fi l-ard ma yugumm hayy illa kan awwal ma dafantah misil cheyy mayyit.
Wa l-teeraab al-tadfinah da ma al-nabaat al-kaamil al-yugumm minnah ba’adeen. La. Hu habba yaabse bas, kan hana gameh walla nabaat aakhar.
Laakin ayyi teeraab, Allah yantiih al-jisim al-hu ja’alah leyah wa yanti le ayyi nafar hana teeraab al-jisim al-waajib leyah.
Achaan kulla l-achya al-hayyiin ma sawa sawa wa lahamhum ma waahid. Laham waahid hu hana l-naas wa laham aakhar hana l-haywaanaat wa fi aakhar hana l-tuyuur wa aakhar hana l-huut.
Wa fiyah ajsaam samaawiiye wa ajsaam ardiiye. Wa l-jisim al-samaawi indah jamaal haggah wa l-jisim al-ardi indah jamaal chig.
Wa l-harraay indaha jamaal wa jamaalha chig min jamaal al-gamar wa jamaal al-nujuum. Wa ayyi najma jamaalha chig min al-nujuum al-aakhariin.
Wa bu’aas al-maytiin kula yabga misil da. Al-jisim al-yadfunuuh fi l-ard yatlaf laakin al-jisim al-ba’as abadan ma yatlaf.
Wa l-jisim al-yadfunuuh misil cheyy mazguul ke laakin wakit yab’as indah ikraam. Wa l-jisim al-yadfunuuh ma indah gudra wa laakin wakit yab’as, indah gudra katiire.
Wa l-yadfunuuh hu jisim aadi wa l-yab’as hu jisim hana l-ruuh. Wa akiid kan jisim aadi gaa’id, jisim hana l-ruuh kula gaa’id.
Wa achaan da, maktuub fi l-Kitaab, Adam al-insaan al-awwal ligi al-haya. Wa Adam al-akhiir hu al-Masiih wa hu bigi siid al-Ruuh wa hu yanti al-haya.
Wa insaan hana l-Ruuh ma ja awwal. Al-insaan al-aadi hu ja awwal wa ba’adeen ja insaan hana l-Ruuh.
Wa l-insaan al-awwal hu bas hana l-ard wa hana l-turaab. Wa l-insaan al-taani hu bas hana l-sama.
Wa Adam hu insaan hana l-turaab wa iyaal hana Adam humman naas hana l-turaab mislah hu. Wa l-Masiih hu insaan hana l-sama wa naas hana l-Masiih kula naas hana l-sama mislah hu.
Wa misil awwal suuritna tichaabih suurat insaan al-turaab, ba’adeen suuritna tichaabih suurat insaan al-sama.
Ya akhwaani, asma’o kalaami. Ayyi jisim al-indah damm wa laham ma yawris Mamlakat Allah. Wa l-yatlaf abadan ma yawris al-ma yatlaf.
Asma’o wa ni’ooriiku be sirr waahid Allah bas wassafaana. Ma kullina numuutu laakin akiid kullina nilkhayyaro.
Wa da yabga ajala ke, misil ramchit een. Wa yabga fi daribiin al-burunji al-akhiir. Achaan hiss al-burunji yinsami’ wa l-maytiin yab’aso be l-jisim al-ma yatlaf wa kullina ke nilkhayyaro.
Achaan al-jisim al-yatlaf da waajib yalbas al-jisim al-abadan ma yatlaf. Wa l-jisim al-yumuut waajib yalbas al-ma yumuut.
Wa wakit al-yatlaf libis al-ma yatlaf wa l-yumuut libis al-ma yumuut, fi l-bakaan da bas al-kalaam al-maktuub da yitimm {Khalaas, al-nasur battal al-moot marra waahid}.
{Ya l-moot, nasrak ween ? Ya l-moot, gudurtak ween ?}.
Wa l-moot indah gudra foogna be sabab al-zunuub wa l-zunuub induhum gudra foogna be sabab churuut Allah.
Chukran le Allah al-antaana al-nasur be Rabbina Isa al-Masiih.
Ya akhwaani al-nihibbuku, fakkuru fi kulla l-kalaam da wa agoodu saabtiin wa gawiiyiin. Inkarubu daayman fi khidmit Rabbina achaan ta’arfu kadar al-khidme al-takhdumuuha le Rabbina abadan ma baatle.
Wa fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-musaa’ada al-tirassuluuha le l-saalihiin al-fi daar al-Yahuudiiya

Kulla yoom al-ahad, khalli ayyi naadum minku yifakkir fi kikkeef Allah razakhah wa yamrug cheyy min maalah le l-musaa’ada. Khalli yukhuttah jaahiz lahaddi najiiku. Wa be misil da, wakit ana naji ma waajib tugummu tutcukku.

Ikhtaaru min ambeenaatku al-akhwaan al-tidooru yiwaddu musaa’aditku. Wa wakit najiiku, nirassilhum be makaatiib hana chahaada fi Madiinat al-Khudus. Wa khalaas humman yiwaddu al-musaa’ada al-anteetuuha.
Wa fi l-bakaan da kan bigi leyi, ana kula nisaafir wa humman yiraafuguuni.
Wa wakit nuchugg balad Magiduuniya khalaas, namchi leeku ziyaara achaan awwal ke nuruukh fi Magiduuniya.
Wa akuun nagood ma’aaku ayyaam. Akuun tuul al-chite kula, achaan fi l-akhiir tantuuni zaad le l-safar wakit na’arif al-bakaan al-namchi foogah.
Achaan ma nidoor nugumm hassa’ wa nakhchaaku bas laakin kan Rabbina gaal aamiin, nitawwil chiyya ma’aaku.
Wa nagood hini fi hillit Afasus lahaddi Iid al-Khamsiin
achaan Allah fatah leyi al-baab wa indi fursa nisawwi khidme adiile bilheen. Wa l-yikhaalufu kalaam Allah kula katiiriin.
Wa wakit Timuutaawus yajiiku, akurbuuh gawi wa khalli yagood ma’aaku be l-salaam achaan hu gaa’id yakhdim khidmit Allah misli ana.
Achaan da, ma tikhallu ayyi naadum yahgirah. Antuuh zaad wa khallu yaji leyi be l-salaama achaan ana gaa’id narjaah, hu wa l-akhwaan al-ma’aayah.
Wa akhuuna Abuluus al-niriiduuh hu gaa’id hini. Ana hannastah achaan yamchi leeku ma’a l-akhwaan laakin hassa’ haaliiyan da, ma yidoor yamchi. Akiid hu yamchi leeku wakit indah fursa.
Agoodu waa’iyiin wa saabtiin fi l-iimaan. Ma takhaafo min cheyy. Abgo gawiiyiin.
Sawwu kulla cheyy be l-mahabba.
Ya akhwaani, ta’arfu naas beet Istifaan wa ta’arfu kadar fi balad al-Yuunaan humman awwal naas al-aamano be l-Masiih wa ta’arfu humman munkaribiin fi l-khidme fi chaan al-saalihiin.
Wa niwassiiku achaan tasma’o adiil kalaam hana l-naas al-misilhum wa hana ayyi naadum al-yakhdim ma’aahum be niiye waahide.
Wa ana firiht bilheen be jayyit akhwaanku Istifaan wa Furtuuna wa Akhaayik achaan ana garmaan leeku wa humman jo fi gadduku.
Wa barrado galbi misil barrado guluubku intu kula. Karrumu al-naas al-misil dool.
Wa jamaa’aat al-mu’miniin al-fi balad Aasiya yisallumuuku. Wa Akiila wa Firiska wa l-mu’miniin al-yilimmu fi beethum yisallumuuku katiir fi Rabbina al-Masiih.
Wa l-akhwaan kulluhum yisallumuuku. Assaalamo ambeenaatku be l-salaam al-saalihiin.
Wa khalaas ana zaati chilt al-galam wa katabt be iidi «Ana Buulus nisallimku».
Kan ayyi naadum ma yihibb Rabbina Isa, khalli Allah yan’alah. Ya Rabbina ta’aal!
Wa aleekum ni’mat Rabbina Isa.
Nirassil leeku kulluku mahabbiti fi l-Masiih Isa.

Jawaab minni ana Buulus rasuul hana Isa al-Masiih be izin Allah. Wa daahu naktib leeku ma’a akhuuna Timuutaawus. Wa aniina nisallumuuku intu ummat al-Masiih al-Allah ikhtaaraaku al-gaa’idiin fi hillit Kuruntus wa le kulla l-saalihiin al-gaa’idiin fi ayyi bakaan min balad al-Yuunaan.
Aleekum al-salaam wa l-rahma min Allah Abuuna wa min Rabbina Isa al-Masiih.
Khalli nachkuru Allah abu Rabbina Isa al-Masiih. Hu Abuuna al-rahiim wa kulla chajaa’a jaaye minnah hu.
Wa Allah yichajji’na fi kulla diige achaan aniina kula be l-chajaa’a di nichajju’u al-aakhariin al-gaa’idiin fi ayyi diige.
Wa sahiih, gaa’idiin nichaaruku katiir fi ta’ab al-Masiih wa laakin be alaakhitna ma’aayah, kula nalgo chajaa’a ziyaada.

Kan aniina gaa’idiin fi l-diige, da bigi achaan intu talgo al-chajaa’a wa l-naja. Wa kan Allah antaana al-chajaa’a, da bigi achaan intu kula talgo al-chajaa’a wa tagdaro tahmalo al-ta’ab be sabur misilna.
Achamna foogku gawi bilheen achaan na’arfu kadar tichaaruku fi l-chajaa’a misil awwal gaa’idiin tichaaruku ma’aana fi l-ta’ab.
Ya akhwaanna, nidooru ni’arrufuuku be l-diige al-jaat foogna fi balad Aasiya. Wa l-diige di chadiide bilheen wa faatat gudritna lahaddi gulna mutna khalaas.
Wa fi l-bakaan da, bigiina misil naas al-hakamo leehum be l-moot. Wa da bigi achaan ma nintakulu ale nufuusna laakin nintakulu ale Allah al-yab’as al-maytiin.
Wa akiid Allah al-faza’aana min al-moot da, hu yafza’na battaan. Khatteena achamna foogah hu bas wa akiid hu yafza’na battaan.
Wa intu kula waajib ti’aawunuuna be du’aaku. Wa Allah yakhbal du’aaku al-katiir wa be sabab du’aaku da, hu yibaarikna wa khalaas naas katiiriin yachkuru Allah fi chaanna.

Wa aniina farhaaniin achaan guluubna gaa’idiin yi’akkudu leena kadar ichna ma’a kulla naas al-dunya wa khaassatan ma’aaku intu be galib abyad wa be l-niiye al-mukhlisa al-Allah yarda beeha. Ma ichna hasab fikir naas al-dunya laakin ichna be ni’mat Allah.
Wa abadan ma naktubu leeku illa l-kalaam al-waadih al-tagruuh wa tawwaali tafhamooh. Wa ana nitmanna kadar tafhamo niiyitna tamaam.
Wa gult al-kalaam da achaan intu lissaa’ku ma fihimtu niiyitna tamaam. Wa kan fihimtu niiyitna khalaas, fi yoom jayyit Rabbina Isa, intu tabgo farhaaniin beena misil aniina nabgo farhaaniin beeku.
Wa akiid, achami foogku bigi gawi. Wa achaan da, dawwart namchi leeku tawwaali wa nisallimku marrateen wa talgo minni baraka marrateen.
Wa dawwart nakhchaaku awwal marra wakit ana maachi fi Magiduuniya wa battaan wakit ana mugabbil minha. Wa dawwart tisaa’uduuni fi safari le daar al-Yahuudiiya.
Wa kan dawwart namchi leeku misil da, hal tuguulu ana chilt niiye bala fikir walla ? Hal tuguulu ana nichiil niiye misil al-naadum al-ma mu’min al-buguul fi nafs al-wakit «aywa» wa «la» ?
Allah saadikh ! Kalaamna leeku abadan ma yabga «aywa» wa «la» fi nafs al-wakit.
Wa Ibn Allah Isa al-Masiih al-ana wa akhwaani Siila wa Timuutaawus ballakhnaaku beyah, abadan ma yikhalbit «aywa» wa «la». Kalaamah kulla ke daayman «aywa».
Achaan kulla cheyy al-Allah gaal yisawwiih, hu tammah fi l-Masiih. Wa be l-Masiih, Allah yuguul «aywa». Wa be l-sabab da bas, nuguulu aamiin be usmah wa nimajjudu Allah.
Wa Allah bas sabbataana ma’aaku fi alaakha ma’a l-Masiih. Wa hu bas al-ikhtaaraana le khidimtah.
Wa hu khatta foogna khitmah wa nazzal fi guluubna al-Ruuh al-Khudduus achaan yabga al-alaama al-tiwassifna kadar Allah yisawwi kulla cheyy al-gaalah.
Wa Allah chaahid leyi kadar ana ma dawwart yabga leeku gaasi. Wa achaan da bas, ana ma macheet battaan fi Kuruntus.
Wa ma na’asuruuku fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-iimaan achaan na’arfu kadar intu saabtiin fi l-iimaan. Akheer leena nakhdumu ma’aaku achaan farhitku tiziid.
Wa ana chilt niiye achaan ma nuzuurku battaan le nisabbib leeku muchkila.
Achaan kan ana bigiit leeku sabab hana muchkila, yaatu al-yifarrihni balaaku ? Illa intu al-ana sabbabt leeku al-muchkila.

Wa l-kalaam al-katabtah yoom daak fi l-jawaab, katabtah achaan wakit najiiku al-naas al-waajib yifarruhuuni ma yabgo leyi sabab muchkila. Achaan ana mu’akkid kadar kan ana nabga farhaan, intu kula tabgo farhaaniin.
Wa katabtah leeku be galib haznaan chadiid wa mudayyig wa ana gaa’id nabki katiir. Wa ma dawwart nisabbib leeku muchkila laakin dawwart niwassifku kadar nihibbuku.
Ana ma nidoor nikabbir al-kalaam. Al-naadum sabbab al-muchkila di ma leyi ana laakin hu sabbab muchkila leeku intu kulluku.
Katiiriin minku harajooh wa khalaas, da yakfi leyah.
Wa hassa’ da, waajib tisaamuhuuh wa tichajju’uuh achaan tikhaffufu leyah nadaamtah al-chadiide.
Wa achaan da, niwassiiku. Wassufu leyah battaan mahabbitku.
Wa awwal kula, ana katabt leeku jawaab achaan nijarribku wa achaan na’arif kan titaabu’u kalaam Allah fi kulla cheyy.
Wa ayyi naadum al-intu tisaamuhuuh, ana kula nisaamihah. Wa ayyi khata al-ana saamahtah le ayyi naadum, kan sahiih khata fi wa waajib leyah al-musaamaha, ana saamahtah fi chaanku giddaam al-Masiih.
Wa saamahtah achaan al-Cheetaan ma yinnasir foogna. Achaan aniina na’arfu niiyit al-Cheetaan.
Wa macheet fi hillit Turuwaas achaan niballikh bichaarat al-Masiih. Wa wakit wisilt, Rabbina fatah leyi al-baab achaan nibachchir.
Laakin galbi mu’allag bilheen achaan akhuui Tiitus al-waajib yaji giddaami min bakaanku ana ma ligiitah. Wa achaan da bas, gammeet min al-akhwaan al-fi Turuwaas wa macheet fi Magiduuniya.

Wa l-hamdulillah. Allah gaa’id daayman yuguudna giddaam be l-Masiih. Wa l-Masiih misil malik kabiir al-annasar foog udwaanah wa jaayi mugabbil min al-harb be farha. Wa fi ayyi bakaan hu yiwazzi’ beena irfat Allah al-misil riihe halwa.
Wa aniina misil al-bakhuur al-gaa’id yigaddimah al-Masiih le Allah. Wa l-naas al-gaa’idiin yanjo yuchummu riihtah wa l-naas al-gaa’idiin yahlako kula yuchummu riihtah.
Wa le l-naas al-yahlako, hi riihit al-moot al-tiwaddiihum le l-moot. Wa le l-naas al-yanjo, hi riihit al-haya al-tiwaddiihum fi l-haya. Wa ma fi insaan yagdar le l-khidme al-misil di.

Naas katiiriin gaa’idiin yikhalbutu kalaam Allah wa yitaajuru beyah wa aniina ma misilhum. Aniina nikallumu be niiye mukhlisa. Aniina naas al-Masiih wa Allah rassalaana wa giddaam Allah nikallumu le l-naas.
Akuun tuguulu aniina badeena battaan nifaachuru. La, ma ke. Akiid, naas waahidiin waajib leehum jawaab al-yachhad leehum, kan jawaab leeku aw jawaab minku. Wa laakin da ma waajib leena.
Intu zaatku jawaabna. Intu maktuubiin foog guluubna. Wa kulla l-naas ya’arfuuh wa yagruuh.

Aywa, intu bas jawaab al-Masiih wa hu rassalah be iidna wa da waadih le ayyi naadum. Wa l-jawaab da ma maktuub be galam laakin be Ruuh Allah al-Hayy. Wa hu ma maktuub fi looh hana hajar laakin maktuub fi guluub al-naas.
Wa gulna al-kalaam da achaan achamna fi Allah gawi be l-Masiih.
Aniina be nufuusna ma indina al-gudra al-waajbe achaan nisawwu al-khidme di. Nagdaro nisawwu al-khidme di achaan Allah bas antaana al-gudra al-waajbe.

Wa hu antaana al-gudra al-waajbe achaan nabgo khaddaamiin wa nakhdumu le Allah fi l-mu’aahada al-jadiide. Wa l-mu’aahada al-jadiide di ma hana churuut maktuubiin wa laakin hana Ruuh Allah. Achaan mu’aahadat al-churuut al-maktuubiin tijiib al-moot wa laakin Ruuh Allah yijiib al-haya.

Churuut al-Tawraat kataboohum fi liihaan hana hajar wa nuur hana Allah al-majiid baan wakit hu nazzalaahum. Wa l-nuur al-majiid da chadiid lahaddi Bani Israa’iil ma gidro yahmalo choofiin al-nuur al-gaa’id fi wijih Muusa
akiid kalaam Allah al-yanti leena al-Ruuh al-Khudduus yaji be nuur majiid ziyaada.

Na’arfu kadar khidmit al-mu’aahada al-ja’alat al-naas khaatiyiin giddaam Allah indaha nuur majiid. Wa misil da, na’arfu kadar khidmit al-mu’aahada al-taj’al al-naas saalihiin indaha nuur majiid ziyaada marra waahid.
Wa sahiih, awwal fi nuur majiid wa haaliiyan ja nuur majiid aakhar ziyaada minnah wa waddarah.
Wa kan al-cheyy al-ma tawwal ja be nuur majiid, akiid al-yagood ila l-abad yaji be nuur chadiid minnah ziyaada.
Wa be misil da, indina acham gawi wa achaan da nakhdumu be chajaa’a chadiide.
Aniina ma nisawwu misil Muusa. Hu khatta wijhah be khattaay achaan Bani Israa’iil ma yichiifu nihaayat al-nuur al-ma tawwal.

Laakin humman dool fikirhum antamas. Wa lahaddi l-yoom kan kalaam al-Tawraat yagruuh leehum, nafs al-khattaay gaa’ide foog fikirhum wa ma yafhamo al-kalaam adiil. Wa l-khattaay di ma tinrafi’ minhum illa kan yi’aamunu be l-Masiih.
Aywa, lahaddi l-yoom kan kalaam Muusa yagruuh leehum, al-khattaay gaa’ide foog guluubhum.
Laakin kan naadum yichiil derib al-Rabb, al-khattaay tinrafi’ wa yafham adiil.
Wa fi l-kalaam da, al-Rabb hu al-Ruuh al-Khudduus. Wa ayyi bakaan al-Ruuh al-Khudduus gaa’id foogah, al-hurriiye gaa’ide fi l-bakaan da.

Wa aniina ma indina al-khattaay fi wujuuhna wa kullina gaa’idiin nichiifu nuur Allah al-majiid misil fi amchawwaafa. Wa l-nuur al-majiid da al-yaji min Ruuh Allah gaa’id yikhayyirna ziyaada lahaddi suuritna tabga misil suurat Allah al-majiide.
Wa khalaas Allah bas rahamna be l-khidme di wa achaan da, abadan ma naksalo minha.

Wa aniina abeena ma taaba’na al-haal al-tijiib al-eeb wa la l-zunuub al-yisawwuuhum al-naas be achiir. Naabo ma nisawwu cheyy be najaada wa abadan ma nibaddulu kalaam Allah. La. Laakin nikallumu al-hagg be kalaam waadih wa nikhallu galib hana ayyi naadum yachhad le haalna al-adiile giddaam Allah.
Wa kan al-bichaara al-niballukhuuha ma tinfahim, hi ma tinfahim illa le l-muwaddiriin.
Al-naas al-ma mu’miniin dool guluubhum masduudiin achaan Ibliis
Wa l-kalaam al-niballukhuuh ma bukhuss nufuusna. Niballukhu be Isa al-Masiih wa nuguulu hu bas al-Rabb. Wa aniina khaddaamiin bas wa nakhdumu leeku fi chaanah.
Achaan Allah bas al-gaal {Khalli al-nuur yidaawi fi ust al-dalaam} wa hu nawwar guluubna achaan na’arfu nuur Allah al-majiid al-gaa’id fi wijih Isa al-Masiih.
Wa l-baraka al-indina di misil dahab saafi al-gaa’id fi maa’uun hana tiine. Wa da yiwassif kadar al-gudra al-ajiibe al-nakhdumu beeha min Allah bas wa ma minnina aniina.
Aniina yidaayuguuna fi ayyi bakaan laakin ma yiwaggufuuna. Wa aniina mulhayyiriin laakin ma waddarna al-acham.
Wa l-naas yita’’ubuuna laakin Allah ma yikhalliina. Yarmuuna laakin ma yidammuruuna.
Al-Masiih ti’ib wa maat. Wa fi ayyi bakaan aniina kula nat’abo mislah achaan hayaat Isa tinchaaf fi jisimna.
Aniina hayyiin wa laakin daayman yisallumuuna le l-moot fi chaan khidmitna le Isa. Wa da yabga leena achaan hayaat Isa tinchaaf fi jisimna al-yumuut.
Wa khalaas, aniina ni’iichu fi ust al-moot achaan intu talgo al-haya al-abadiiye.
Maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Ana aamant wa achaan da kallamt}. Wa aniina kula indina iimaan misil al-iimaan da. Aniina mu’miniin wa achaan da nikallumu.
Wa na’arfu kadar Allah al-ba’as Rabbina Isa min ust al-maytiin yab’asna aniina kula ma’a Isa wa yiwaddiina ma’aaku fi hadaratah.
Wa kulla khidmitna di le faayditku. Wa nakhdumu achaan barakat Allah talhag kulla l-naas wa humman yachkuru Allah ziyaada wa khalaas kulluhum yimajjudu Allah.
Achaan da abadan ma naksalo. Sahiih, jisimna gaa’id yumuut wa laakin al-haya al-jadiide gaa’ide tiziid fi guluubna kulli yoom.
Wa l-ta’ab al-indina hassa’ da, hu khafiif wa ma yitawwil. Laakin al-ta’ab da yijahhizna le l-majd al-aziim al-abadan ma yikammil.
Wa ma nukhuttu baalna fi l-binchaaf. Nukhuttu baalna fi l-ma binchaaf. Achaan al-binchaaf yikammil wa laakin al-ma binchaaf ma yikammil abadan.

Wa l-jisim al-indina wakit gaa’idiin fi l-ard, hu misil kheema bas. Wa na’arfu kadar wakit jisimna da yumuut, indina jisim aakhar al-gaa’id fi l-samaawaat. Wa l-jisim da misil beet gawi al-Allah bas banaah. Wa yagood ila l-abad wa ma misil beet al-banooh al-naas.
Wa wakit aniina gaa’idiin fi l-kheema di, nagnutu achaan garmaaniin bilheen le beetna al-samaawi al-Allah yantiih leena le ni’iichu foogah.
Wa misil da, kan libisna al-jisim al-jadiid da, battaan ma nabgo aryaaniin bala jisim.

Wa wakit aniina gaa’idiin fi l-kheema al-ardiiye di, nagnutu min al-himil al-tagiil. Wa l-cheyy al-nidooruuh hu ma nabgo aryaaniin min al-jisim al-ardi laakin nidooru nalbaso al-jisim al-jadiid. Wa fi l-bakaan da, al-haya al-abadiiye di taakul marra waahid al-jisim al-yumuut.
Allah zaatah jahhazaana le l-haya di wa hu nazzal foogna al-Ruuh al-Khudduus achaan yabga al-alaama al-tiwassif kadar Allah yisawwi kulla cheyy al-jahhazah leena.
Wa achaan da, achamna daayman gawi. Sahiih na’arfu kadar wakit aniina saakniin fi l-jisim al-ardi, aniina lissaa’ ma saakniin fi beetna al-sahiih al-gaa’id ma’a Rabbina al-Masiih.
Laakin ni’iichu hasab al-cheyy al-aniina mu’miniin beyah wa ma hasab al-nichiifuuh be eenna.
Aywa, achamna gawi wa akheer leena nikhallu al-jisim al-ardi da achaan naskunu ma’a Rabbina.
Wa khalaas, ziyaada min kulla cheyy aakhar, nidooru nisawwu al-cheyy al-yarda beyah Rabbina, kan aniina naskunu fi l-jisim al-ardi walla nikhalluuh.

Achaan laabudda ayyi waahid minnina yagiif giddaam kursi al-Masiih fi yoom al-Hisaab. Wa fi l-bakaan da, ayyi naadum yalga al-cheyy al-waajib leyah hasab al-amal al-sawwaah wakit hu aayich be l-jisim al-ardi, kan amalah hana al-kheer walla l-charr.
Wa na’arfu Rabbina yihaasibna fi khidmitna wa achaan da, nidooru nijiibu al-naas fi l-derib. Allah ya’arif haalna marra waahid wa nitmanna kadar intu kula ta’arfuuha fi guluubku.

Wa battaan ma nidooru nifaachuru. Aniina nidooru nantuuku fursa achaan tihajju beena raasku marfuu’ wa turuddu le l-naas al-gaa’idiin yarfa’o ruuseenhum be l-cheyy al-binchaaf bas wa ma be l-cheyy al-gaa’id fi l-galib.
Kan sahiih agulna laffa, da fi chaan Allah. Wa kan agulna aafe, da le faayditku.
Wa mahabbit al-Masiih leena tajburna achaan aniina mul’akkidiin kadar hu al-waahid al-maat fi chaan kulla l-naas wa beyah hu bas, kulluhum maato.
Wa hu maat le kulla l-naas achaan al-naas al-hayyiin ma yi’iichu battaan le nufuushum laakin yi’iichu le l-Masiih al-maat wa ba’as fi chaanhum.
Achaan da, min hassa’ wa giddaam ma nifakkuru fi ayyi naadum misil al-naas yifakkuru foogah. Awwal fakkarna fi l-Masiih misil al-naas. Laakin abadan ma nifakkuru foogah battaan misil da.
Wa kan ayyi naadum gaa’id fi alaakha ma’a l-Masiih, hu bigi khaliige jadiide. Hayaatah al-gadiime faatat wa hayaatah al-jadiide badat khalaas.
Wa da kulla ke min Allah. Hu bas sawwa al-suluh ma’aana be l-Masiih achaan nadkhulu fi alaakha jadiide ma’aayah. Wa l-khidme al-Allah kallafaana beeha hi ballikhiin khabar hana l-suluh.

Wa ma’anaatah Allah ja be l-Masiih wa sawwa al-suluh achaan kulla naas al-dunya yadkhulu fi alaakha jadiide ma’aayah. Wa hu chaal niiye achaan ma yihaasibhum hasab khataayaahum. Wa kallafaana be ballikhiin bichaarat al-suluh.
Wa be misil da, ana wa akhwaani bigiina safiir le l-Masiih wa Allah gaa’id yinaadiiku be lisaanna. Wa khalaas, natlubu minku be usum al-Masiih, assaalaho ma’a Allah.
Wa l-Masiih al-abadan ma aznab, Allah ja’alah dahiiye fi chaan zunuubna achaan aniina nabgo beyah cha’ab Allah al-saalihiin.
Wa khalaas aniina nakhdumu ma’a Allah wa achaan da niwassuuku. Akiid khibiltu ni’mat Allah wa hassa’ da, akurbuuha gawi achaan talgo minha al-faayde al-kaamile.
Achaan fi l-Kitaab, Allah gaal {Fi l-wakit al-ana ridiit beyah, ana khibilt du’aak. Aywa, fi yoom al-naja, ana faza’tak}. Asma’o, da bas al-wakit al-Allah yarda beyah. Da bas yoom al-naja.
Wa abadan ma nisiddu le ayyi naadum al-derib al-yiwaddiih le Allah achaan ma nidooru nijiibu loom fi khidmitna.
Wa be haalna wassafna fi kulla cheyy kadar aniina khaddaamiin Allah. Sabarna sabur gawi fi ta’ab chadiid wa diige wa su’uubaat.
Farachoona wa sajjanoona wa asbahna fi ust al-barjala. Khadamna be duraa’na. Fagadna al-noom wa l-akil.
Wa wassafna kadar aniina khaddaamiin Allah be haalna al-samhe wa ilimna wa saburna wa galibna al-abyad wa l-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-gaa’id foogna wa mahabbitna al-mukhlisa.
Kalaamna kalaam al-hagg wa nakhdumu be gudrat Allah. Al-haal al-saalhe bas silaahna fi iidna al-zeene wa fi iidna al-isra.
Wa nakhdumu le Allah kan yikarrumuuna walla yahguruuna, kan yi’ayyuruuna walla yachkuruuna. Buguulu aniina kaddaabiin wa laakin aniina saadikhiin.
Buguulu aniina naas ma ma’ruufiin wa laakin Allah chaahid leena. Buguulu mutna wa chiifu aniina hayyiin. Aniina azzaboona chadiid laakin ma kataloona.
Indina hizin wa laakin nafraho daayman. Aniina masaakiin wa laakin nijiibu le katiir min al-naas baraka katiire. Ma indina cheyy wa laakin kulla cheyy hanaana.
Ya akhwaanna fi Kuruntus, kallamna leeku be kalaam waadih. Fatahna leeku guluubna.
Aniina ma saddeena leeku derib wa laakin intu bas saddeetu leena deribku.
Nihajji leeku misil intu iyaali. Sawwu leena al-sawweena leeku. Aftaho leena guluubku.
Ma tadkhulu fi alaakha ma’a l-naas al-ma mu’miniin achaan intu ma sawa. Kikkeef haal al-saalihiin wa haal al-aasiyiin yabgo waahid ? Kikkeef al-nuur wa l-dalaam yilimmu ?
Kikkeef al-Masiih wa Ibliis yittafugu ? Hal fi cheyy al-yarbut al-mu’min ma’a l-ma mu’min ?

Wa ween al-alaakha been beet ibaadit Allah wa beet ibaadit al-asnaam ? Wa aniina bas Beet Allah al-Hayy. Wa fi l-Kitaab, Allah gaal {Naskun fooghum wa nuruukh ambeenaathum wa nabga Rabbuhum wa humman yabgo cha’abi.
Achaan da, amurgu min usuthum wa anfasulu minhum. Da bas kalaam Allah. Ma talmaso cheyy nijis wa ana nakhbalku
wa nabga Abuuku wa intu tabgo awlaadi wa banaati. Ana Allah al-Gaadir wa ana bas gultah}.
Ya akhwaani al-nihibbuku, khalli nifakkuru fi l-kalaam al-Allah gaalah da wa nitahhuru jisimna wa guluubna min ayyi cheyy al-yinajjisna lahaddi ni’iichu be haal saalhe wa be takhwa tamaam.
Aftaho guluubku leena. Aniina ma zalamna naadum wa ma azeena naadum wa ma khachcheena naadum.
Wa ma gult al-kalaam da achaan nidoor nuluumku. Misil awwal gultah, intu gaa’idiin fi guluubna wa achaan da, ni’iichu sawa wa numuutu sawa.
Nihajji beeku daayman be farha. Ana farhaan minku bilheen. Chajja’tuuni chajaa’a chadiide bilheen. Wa khalaas, fi usut kulla su’uubaatna, indi farah ziyaada.
Wa wakit jiina fi Magiduuniya kula, ma ligiina raaha. Ti’ibna wa fi ayyi bakaan ligiina machaakil wa l-khoof gaa’id fi guluubna.
Laakin Allah al-yichajji’ al-ta’baaniin chajja’aana be jayyit akhuuna Tiitus.

Wa chajaa’itna di ma be sabab jaytah bas. La. Al-khabar al-jaabah minku chajja’aana ziyaada. Hu ooraana be kikkeef intu chajja’tuuh. Wa gaal intu garmaaniin leyi wa haznaaniin le l-muchkila al-bigat wa induku hamiisa leyi fi guluubku. Wa achaan da, ana farhaan farha kabiire.
Kan jawaabi jaab hizin fi guluubku kula, ana ma nadmaan leyah. Sahiih, awwal nidimt leyah. Laakin hassa’ na’arif jawaabi da jaab hizin fi guluubku laakin al-hizin da ma tawwal.
Wa hassa’ da, ana farhaan. Ana ma farhaan be hizinku. Ana farhaan achaan al-hizin waddaaku le l-tooba. Al-hizin da ja min Allah wa achaan da, ma khassarnaaku cheyy.
Achaan al-hizin al-yaji min Allah yisabbib al-tooba al-tiwaddiina le l-naja wa ma yijiib al-nadaama. Laakin al-hizin al-naas al-dunya yisabbubuuh, yiwaddiihum le l-moot.

Fakkuru fi l-cheyy al-sabbab leeku al-hizin al-ja min Allah da. Intu waajahtu al-muchkila be niiye waahide. Wa ajala ke daafa’tu le nufuusku wa zi’iltu min al-khaati. Wa khuftu khoof chadiid wa bigiitu garmaaniin leyi ziyaada. Wa galibku gamma wa addabtu al-muznib. Wa khalaas, be ayyi daliil intu wassaftu kadar intu bari’iin min kulla l-kalaam da.
Sahiih, ana katabt leeku jawaab yoom daak laakin ma katabtah fi chaan al-zaalim wa la fi chaan al-mazluum. Ana katabtah fi chaan hamiisitku leena tibiin leeku giddaam Allah.
Wa da chajja’aana bilheen. Firihna be sabab al-chajaa’a al-ligiinaaha di. Wa firihna ziyaada be farhat Tiitus achaan awwal galbah mu’allag wa intu raggadtu galbah marra waahid.
Achaan awwal raasi marfuu’ wakit ana ooreetah beeku wa khalaas kalaami da ma khajjalaani. Misil kulla l-kalaam al-gulna leeku sahiih, al-kalaam al-gultah fiiku le Tiitus, da kula bigi sahiih.
Wa hu gaa’id yifakkir fiiku wa fi kikkeef intu kulluku simi’tu kalaamah wa karabtuuh adiil wa karramtuuh be ihtiraam tamaam wa khalaas, hu yihibbuku katiir.
Wa ana nafrah achaan achami foogku saabit.
Ya akhwaani, nidoor ni’ooriiku be l-ni’ma al-Allah antaaha le l-mu’miniin al-gaa’idiin hini fi balad Magiduuniya.
Su’uuba chadiide gaa’ide tijarrib iimaanhum laakin humman farhaaniin farha chadiide. Wa wakit humman fagraaniin fagur chadiid, anto be juud.
Wa nachhad leehum kadar humman anto hasab gudrithum wa anto ziyaada min gudrithum kula be niiyithum.
Wa talabo minnina be chidde achaan nantuuhum fursa le yichaaruku fi l-musaa’ada le l-akhwaan al-saalihiin.
Wa humman sawwo ziyaada min al-dawwarnaah minhum. Chaalo niiye achaan yitaabu’u muraadat Rabbina wa battaan chaalo niiye achaan yitaabu’u adiil kalaamna misil Allah yidoorah.
Achaan da, talabna min Tiitus hu yikammil ma’aaku khidmit al-ni’ma di al-hu awwal badaaha ambeenaatku.

Akiid intu bigiitu chudaad fi kulla cheyy. Intu chudaad fi l-iimaan wa l-kalaam wa l-ilim wa niiyitku chadiide wa mahabbitku al-ligiituuha minnina chadiide. Wa hassa’ abgo chudaad fi khidmit al-ni’ma di kula.

Wa fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-musaa’ada, ma naamurku beyah. Ana gaa’id ni’ooriiku be khabar al-niiye al-chadiide hana al-akhwaan al-aakhariin achaan nijarribku. Nantiiku fursa achaan tiwassufu kadar mahabbitku mukhlisa.
Achaan ni’mat Rabbina Isa al-Masiih ta’arfuuha. Awwal hu khani. Wa fi chaanku intu, hu bigi fagri achaan be fagrah intu tabgo khaniyiin be barakat Allah.

Wa fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-kalaam da, ni’ooriiku be fikri. Akheer tikammulu hassa’ al-khidme al-badeetuuha al-sana al-faatat achaan intu bas al-awwalaaniyiin fi l-khidme di. Wa ziyaada min da, intu al-awwalaaniyiin al-induku niiye achaan tisawwu al-khidme di.
Wa khalaas kammuluuha. Wa kammuluuha be nafs al-niiye al-chadiide al-badeetuuha beeha. Waajib tantu hasab gudritku.
Kan niiyitku adiile, Allah yarda be l-cheyy al-tantuuh. Al-ma fiih ma binlagi. Hu yidoor intu tantu min al-maal al-induku bas.
Ma tifakkuru ana nidoor kadar yabga gaasi leeku wa hayyin le naas aakhariin. Nidoor yabga leena kullina sawa sawa.

Fi l-wakit al-haali, intu induku katiir wa humman hawjaaniin wa khalaas saa’uduuhum. Wa ba’adeen, kan humman induhum katiir wa intu hawjaaniin, humman kula yisaa’uduuku wa yabga leena kullina sawa sawa.
Wa da yifakkirna be l-kalaam al-maktuub fi l-Kitaab al-buguul {Al-chaal katiir kula, ma faddal leyah. Wa l-chaal chiyya kula ma gassar leyah}.
Wa nuguul al-hamdulillah achaan Allah anta le Tiitus niiye chadiide misil niiyiti ana achaan yi’aawinku.
Wa Tiitus ma khibil talabna bas. Awwal kula, hu be nafsah dawwar yamchi leeku be niiye chadiide.
Wa l-naadum al-nirassuluuh ma’aayah ma’ruuf. Al-mu’miniin fi ayyi bakaan yachkuruuh be sabab khidimtah fi ballikhiin bichaarat al-Masiih.

Wa ziyaada min da, hu waahid min al-akhwaan al-ikhtaaroohum al-mu’miniin le yisaafuru ma’aana wakit aniina mas’uuliin fi cheeliin al-atiiye di. Wa nisawwu al-khidme di achaan nimajjudu beeha Rabbina Isa wa niwassufu niiyitna al-mukhlisa.
Wa khatteena baalna achaan nikammulu adiil mas’uuliitna fi l-atiiye al-kabiire di, fi chaan ma nijiibu foogna chakak min ayyi naadum.
Wa chilna niiye achaan nisawwu al-cheyy al-waajib ma giddaam Allah bas, laakin giddaam al-naas kula.

Wa ma’a l-akhwaan al-itneen dool nirassulu leeku akhu aakhar. Wa hu naadum jarrabnaah be khidme katiire. Na’arfu hu indah niiye le l-khidme. Wa hassa’ niiyitah zaadat bilheen achaan indah acham gawi foogku intu.

Wa Tiitus da, hu rafiigi wa yakhdim ma’aayi achaan yi’aawinku. Wa akhwaanna al-ma’aayah dool, humman mumassiliin hana jamaa’aat al-mu’miniin. Wa haalhum adiile lahaddi al-naas yimajjudu al-Masiih be sababhum.
Khalaas, wassufuuhum mahabbitku achaan al-mu’miniin fi ayyi bakaan ya’arfuuha wa ya’arfu maala hajjeena beeku be raas marfuu’.
Wa be l-sahiih, ma waajib leyi naktib leeku fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-musaa’ada al-nidooru niwadduuha le l-akhwaan al-saalihiin al-fi Madiinat al-Khudus.

Ana na’arif niiyitku chadiide. Wa ana hajjeet beeha raasi marfuu’ le akhwaanna al-hini fi Magiduuniya wa gult leehum kadar intu al-fi l-Yuunaan jaahiziin min al-sana al-faatat. Wa khabar hana hamiisitku chajja’ katiiriin minhum achaan yantu.
Wa hassa’ rassalt al-akhwaan al-talaata dool be l-jawaab da, achaan ni’akkid kadar al-kalaam al-gultah fi niiyitku ma yabga kidib. Nidoor intu tabgo jaahiziin misil ana awwal gultah.
Kan najiiku ma’a akhwaan waahidiin min Magiduuniya wa intu ma jaahiziin, al-akhwaan yichiifu kadar intu ma jaahiziin. Wa l-eeb yisawwiina achaan achamna foogku fachal. Wa l-eeb yisawwiiku ziyaada.

Achaan da, fi fikri ana waajib niwassi al-akhwaan dool yamchu leeku giddaami wa yinazzumu ma’aaku atiiyitku al-gultu tantuuha be juud. Wa misil da, wakit naju al-atiiye tukuun jaahize wa tantuuha leena be niiyitku wa ma misil jabarnaaku jabaraan.
Wa ma tanso kadar al-naadum al-yiteerib chiyya yilimm chiyya wa l-yiteerib katiir yagta’ katiir.
Khalli ayyi naadum minku yanti hasab al-niiye al-chaalaaha fi galbah. Khalli ma yanti cheyy bala niiyitah wa ma misil naadum asarooh asaraan achaan Allah yihibb al-naadum al-yanti be farah.
Wa Allah yagdar yantiiku ni’ma be ziyaada lahaddi fi ayyi wakit induku al-yakfi leeku achaan tichaaruku ziyaada fi ayyi amal hana l-kheer.
Wa yabga misil al-kalaam al-maktuub fi l-Kitaab al-buguul fi l-naadum al-saalih {Hu yanti be juud le l-masaakiin wa kheerah ma binnasi abadan}.
Wa Allah al-yanti al-teeraab le l-harraati wa ma’aach le l-naas, hu yikattir leeku teeraabku achaan talgo katiir wa tantu ziyaada wa yiziidku baraka.
Wa Allah yiziid leeku kulla cheyy achaan anteetu be juud wa wakit niwaddu atiiyitku le Madiinat al-Khudus, al-naas yachkuru Allah.
Achaan al-khidme al-tisawwuuha le Allah di ma tisaa’id al-saalihiin al-hawjaaniin bas. Hi tikattir chukur al-naas al-yigaddumuuh le Allah kula.

Wa naas katiiriin yimajjudu Allah achaan al-khidme al-tisawwuuha le Allah di tabga al-daliil al-yiwassif kadar intu mu’miniin be bichaarat al-Masiih wa titaabu’uuh adiil. Wa yimajjudu Allah achaan anteetuuhum wa anteetu le naas aakhariin be juud.
Wa yas’alo Allah leeku wa yiriiduuku be mahabba chadiide be sabab ni’mat Allah al-aziime al-antaaha leeku.
Wa l-hamdulillah, al-atiiye al-hu antaaha ma tilwassaf.

Ana Buulus al-buguulu foogi ana nimaskin nafsi wakit ana gaa’id ma’aaku wa laakin kalaami haarr wakit ana khaayib minku. Wa ana nihannisku be usum al-Masiih al-maskan nafsah wa kalaamah daayman baarid.
Nitmanna achaan wakit najiiku ma tiluzzuuni lahaddi nihajji leeku be kalaam haarr. Ma nidoor nihajji leeku misil nihajji le l-naas al-waahidiin al-buguulu foogna aniina nitaabu’u haal naas al-dunya.
Sahiih, aniina aaychiin fi l-dunya laakin ma nihaarubu misil naas al-dunya.
Wa l-silaah al-nihaarubu beyah ma silaah hana al-naas. Gudrat silaahna min Allah wa beyah nidammuru khidmit Ibliis al-gawiiye. Nifachchulu munaakhachaat al-naas
wa ayyi kalaam hana l-istikbaar al-yisidd al-derib al-beyah al-naas ya’arfu Allah. Wa nakurbu ayyi fikra wa nisawwuuha titaabi’ kalaam al-Masiih.
Wa nidooru intu titaabu’u kalaam al-Masiih tamaam. Wa fi l-wakit daak, aniina jaahiziin achaan ni’addubu ayyi naadum be sabab amalah hana l-isyaan.
Intu gaa’idiin tifakkuru fi l-cheyy al-gaa’id waadih giddaamku bas. Ayyi naadum kan hu mu’akkid hu hana l-Masiih, khalli yifakkir. Kan hu hana l-Masiih, aniina kula hana l-Masiih.
Wa kan nilfachchar chiyya be l-sulta al-Rabbina antaani foogku, da ma eeb leyi. Hu antaani al-sulta di achaan nigawwiiku fi l-iimaan wa ma achaan nikharribku.
Wa ma indi niiye nikhawwifku be jawaabaati.
Hatta kan naas waahidiin yahguruuni wa yuguulu foogi «Kalaam Buulus fi jawaabaatah haarr wa gawi. Laakin wakit hu zaatah haadir ma’aana, hu ma indah gudra wa kalaamah ma indah faayde».
Wa khalli al-naas al-buguulu al-kalaam da ya’arfu kadar al-cheyy al-katabnaah wakit aniina khaaybiin minhum, nisawwuuh wakit aniina haadiriin ma’aahum.

Aniina abadan ma nukhuttu nufuusna fi nafs al-saff ma’a naas waahidiin al-yisawwu nufuushum kubaar. Ma nidooru nigaaduru nufuusna ma’aahum. Humman gaa’idiin yigaaduru nufuushum be nufuushum wa yigaaduru nufuushum ambeenaathum. Wa be da, yiwassufu kadar humman mataamiis.

Laakin aniina ma nilfachcharo ziyaada. Na’arfu huduudna. Nihajju be l-khidme al-sawweenaaha fi l-turaab al-gaa’id fi l-huduud al-Allah ja’alaahum leena. Wa akiid intu kula gaa’idiin fi bakaan al-khidme al-Allah ja’alaaha leena.
Wa ma futna khaadi min huduudna wakit macheena lahaddi hillitku. Wa aniina bigiina al-awwalaaniyiin al-ballakho leeku bichaarat al-Masiih.

Wa aniina ma nufuutu khaadi min huduudna fi l-kalaam al-nuguuluuh fi l-khidme, ya’ni ma nisawwu nufuusna kubaar fi l-khidme al-sawwooha naas aakhariin. Laakin nitmannu kadar iimaanku yiziid wa khidmitna ambeenaatku kula tiziid marra waahid.

Wa khalaas, namchu fi l-buldaan al-khaadi minku wa niballukhu fooghum al-bichaara. Wa ma nakhdumu fi ayyi bakaan al-naadum aakhar ballakh foogah al-bichaara gabulna. Wa misil da, abadan ma nisawwu nufuusna kubaar be l-khidme al-sawwaaha naadum aakhar fi l-bakaan al-Allah antaah leyah.
Wa l-Kitaab buguul {Khalli naadum ma yisawwi nafsah kabiir. Akheer yuguul Allah bas al-kabiir}.
Achaan al-naadum al-Allah yachhad leyah, hu bas al-Allah khiblah wa ma yakhbal al-naadum al-yachhad le nafsah.
Chiilu sabur achaan hassa’ nidoor nihajji leeku chiyya misil naadum ma indah fikir. Chiilu sabur bas.

Ana za’laan fi chaanku wa za’ali da jaayi min Allah. Ana misil abu hana bineeye lissaa’ ma chaafat raajil wa intu bas al-bineeye. Wa ana sawweet maw’id achaan al-bineeye di taakhud raajil waahid wa hu al-Masiih. Wa nidoor nigaddimku leyah misil bineeye al-ma indaha eeb.
Laakin na’arfu kadar al-daabi khachcha Hawwa be najaadtah wa hassa’ ana khaayif leeku. Akuun naadum yitallif fikirku wa ma titaabu’u al-Masiih be mahabba sahiihe wa mukhlisa.

Ana khaayif achaan kan naadum yamchi leeku wa yiballikh leeku Isa aakhar chig min Isa al-aniina ballakhnaaku beyah, intu takhbalooh. Wa intu jaahiziin achaan takhbalo ruuh chig min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-awwal khibiltuuh. Wa kan naadum yiballikh leeku bichaara chig min al-bichaara al-awwal khibiltuuha, intu titaabu’uuh ajala. Wa tasburu le l-naadum al-misil da.
Wa l-rusul al-intu tuguulu humman kubaar dool, ana nuguul ana ma sakhayyar minhum be cheyy.
Sahiih, ana ma nikallim kalaam sa’ab misil kalaam al-ulama laakin ilmi chadiid bilheen. Wa da waddahnaah leeku kulluku fi kulla cheyy.
Wa ta’arfu kadar ma talabt minku gurus wakit ballakht leeku bichaarat Allah. Wa be misil da, ana sawweet nafsi sakhayyar achaan intu tabgo kubaar. Wa hassa’ tuguulu da khata minni ana walla ?
Haay ! Ana chilt musaa’ada min mu’miniin balaaku achaan nakhdim leeku. Wa da misil ana sirigt minhum fi chaanku.

Wa wakit ana ma’aaku wa bigiit hawjaan, ana ma kallaft ayyi naadum minku. Al-akhwaan al-jo min Magiduuniya bas saa’adooni fi l-cheyy al-gassar leyi. Wa ana abeet ma kallaftuku be ayyi cheyy al-dawwartah wa abadan ma nikallifku.
Wa be l-kalaam al-sahiih hana l-Masiih al-gaa’id foogi, nuguul leeku naadum waahid ma yadharni min al-farha di fi ayyi bakaan fi l-Yuunaan.
Wa maala ma nikallifku ? Achaan ma nihibbuku walla ? Allah ya’arif kadar ana nihibbuku bilheen.
Wa ana nakhdim daayman misil ana khadamt min awwal. Wa misil da, al-naas al-yifaachuru be khidmithum ma yalgo fursa yuguulu humman rusul sawa sawa ma’aayi.
Al-fachchaariin dool humman ma rusul be l-sahiih. Humman khaddaamiin khachchaachiin wa yisawwu nufuushum yichaabuhu rusul al-Masiih.
Wa waajib ma ti’ajjubu min al-kalaam da, achaan Ibliis zaatah yisawwi nafsah yichaabih malaa’ikat al-nuur.
Wa kan khaddaamiin Ibliis kula yisawwu nufuushum yichaabuhu khaddaamiin Allah al-saalihiin, ma ni’ajjubu minhum. Wa fi l-akhiir, yalgo al-waajib leehum hasab khidmithum.
Wa nuguul battaan ma tahsubuuni ana naadum ma indah fikir. Laakin kan fi fikirku ana naadum ma indi fikir kula, akhbalooni bas. Wa be da, ana nagdar nilfachchar chiyya.
Wa l-kalaam al-nuguulah be fachaar da ma misil Rabbina yidoorah laakin misil kalaam hana naadum ma indah fikir.
Akiid naas katiiriin yilfachcharo be l-cheyy al-bukhuss al-bachar wa ana kula nilfachchar misilhum.
Achaan ana chift kadar intu al-tuguulu fikirku gawi tahmalo be farah al-naas al-ma induhum fikir.
Wa intu tahmalo al-naadum al-yisawwiiku abiidah walla yaakul maalku walla yasrig minku be l-khachch walla yistakbar giddaamku walla yudugguku amkaff.
Wa kan da bas al-cheyy al-yisawwuuh al-rusul al-gawiiyiin, sahiih aniina ma gawiiyiin wa da eeb leena.
Wa laakin kan naadum yidoor yilfachchar be ayyi cheyy, ana nilfachchar mislah. Chiftu ? Ana nihajji misil ma indi fikir.
Buguulu humman Yahuud walla ? Ana kula Yahuudi. Humman min Bani Israa’iil walla ? Ana kula min Bani Israa’iil. Humman min zurriiyit Ibraahiim walla ? Ana kula min zurriiyit Ibraahiim.

Humman khaddaamiin al-Masiih walla ? Chiftu ? Hassa’ nihajji misil raasi laffa marra waahid ! Ana khaddaam akheer minhum. Khadamt be chidde ziyaada minhum. Karabooni fi l-sijin ziyaada minhum. Farachooni ziyaada minhum. Wa ga’adt fi ust al-moot katiir.
Al-Yahuud jaladooni khamsa marraat wa fi ayyi jalde tis’a wa talaatiin darba

Al-Roomaaniyiin farachooni talaata marraat be asaay. Wa l-naas rajamooni marra waahide. Talaata marraat ana musaafir be safiina wa l-safiina ankasarat beyi fi ust al-bahar. Yoom waahid ana ga’adt fi ust al-bahar yoom kaamil leel wa nahaar.

Ana saafart katiir bilheen wa waajaht khutuura katiire. Khutuura wakit ana gaati’ al-buhuur wa khutuura min rabbaatiin al-duruub. Wa khutuura fi usut naasi al-Yahuud wa khutuura fi ust al-naas al-ma Yahuud. Wa khutuura fi l-hillaal wa khutuura fi l-kadaade wa khutuura fi ust al-bahar al-maalih. Wa khutuura fi ust al-mu’miniin al-khaayniin.
Ana khadamt be duraa’i wa ti’ibt wa fagadt daayman al-noom wa l-akil wa l-churaab. Wa katiir ke al-barid lihigaani wa khulgaan gassaro leyi.
Wa battaan, fi cheyy aakhar. Kulla ma yoom, al-hamm al-chadiid yakrubni fi chaan al-mu’miniin al-fi ayyi bakaan.
Kan akhu waahid ta’baan, ana kula ta’baan. Kan naadum maragooh min al-derib, ana nihiss be naar.
Kan waajib nilfachchar, nilfachchar be l-cheyy al-yiwassif kadar ana ma indi gudra.
Wa Allah abu Rabbina Isa, hu al-waajib leyah al-chukur ila l-abad, ya’arif kadar kalaami ma kidib.

Wakit ana gaa’id fi madiinat Dimachkh, dawwaro yakurbuuni. Wa fi l-wakit daak, haakim al-madiina al-kallafah al-malik Al-Haaris rassal askarah achaan yaharsu kulla biibaan al-madiina achaan ma namrug.
Wa ana da, al-akhwaan dallooni be chabaka min chubbaak waahid al-gaa’id fi durdur al-madiina wa misil da bas nijiit minnah
Al-fachaar da ma indah faayde laakin kan laabudda nilfachchar, nihajji be l-ru’ya wa l-asraar al-Allah kachafaahum leyi.

Ana na’arif mu’min waahid be l-Masiih wa yoom waahid, gabul arba’taachar sana, hu anrafa’ lahaddi l-sama al-aali. Kan anrafa’ be jismah walla bala jismah, da ma na’arfah. Illa Allah wiheedah ya’arfah.
Wa ana na’arif kadar al-naadum da anrafa’ fi l-Janna. Kan be jismah walla bala jismah, da ma na’arfah. Illa Allah wiheedah ya’arfah.
Wa hu simi’ asraar faaytiin fikir al-naas wa ma fi insaan indah izin yihajji beehum.
Wa fi chaan naadum misil da nilfachchar laakin fi chaani ana ma nilfachchar illa nihajji be l-gudra al-ma indi.

Wa kan nilfachchar kula, ana ma naadum al-ma indah fikir achaan kalaami sahiih. Laakin naaba ma nilfachchar achaan ma nidoor ayyi naadum yifakkir foogi cheyy ziyaada min al-chaafah fi khidimti be eenah wa sim’ah minni be adaanah.

Akiid, ana chift ru’ya ajiibe bilheen wa Allah ma yidoor ana nistakbar be sababha. Wa achaan da, Allah antaani cheyy waahid al-gaa’id yita’’ibni misil chook fi lahami wa misil mursaal hana l-Cheetaan al-gaa’id yuduggini. Wa antaani al-ta’ab da achaan ma nistakbar.
Wa talaata marraat ana da’eet Rabbina Isa wa chahadtah achaan yarfa’ah minni.

Wa laakin hu radda leyi wa gaal «Ni’mati takfi leek. Gudurti tabga kaamile fi l-naadum al-ma indah gudra». Achaan da, nilfachchar be farah ziyaada fi l-gudra al-ana ma indi achaan gudrat al-Masiih tasbut foogi.

Achaan da, ana nafrah wakit ma indi gudra wa wakit yi’ayyuruuni wa yita’’ubuuni wa yaturduuni wa yidaayuguuni fi chaan ana taabi’ al-Masiih. Achaan wakit ma indi gudra, fi l-bakaan da bas, al-gudra gaa’ide foogi.

Khalaas, ana hajjeet leeku misil naadum ma indah fikir. Intu lazzeetuuni achaan nuguul al-kalaam da. Wa intu bas al-naas al-waajib yikarrumuuni achaan ana ma sakhayyar be ayyi cheyy min al-rusul al-intu tuguulu humman al-kubaar, kan ana naadum ma naafi’ kula.
Intu chiftu al-daliil al-yisabbit kadar ana rasuul wakit khadamt fi usutku. Chiftu al-sabur al-gawi wa l-alaamaat wa l-ajaayib wa amal Allah.
Hal ligiitu minni faayde chiyya min al-faayde al-ligooha al-mu’miniin al-fi l-bakaanaat al-aakhariin ? Cheyy waahid bas ana ma sawweetah wa hu ana ma kallaftuku be diifti. Wa da jariime. Saamuhuuni !

Khalaas, daahuuni jaahiz namchi leeku taalit marra. Wa ana ma nabga leeku tagiil achaan al-nidoorah ma maalku. Nidoorku intu. Achaan al-iyaal ma yudummu maal fi chaan waaldeenhum. Al-waaldeen bas waajib yudummu maal fi chaan iyaalhum.
Wa fi chaanku intu, nanti be farah kulla cheyy al-indi wa nanti nafsi fi chaanku battaan. Kan nihibbuku katiir, hal intu tihibbuuni chiyya walla ?
Khalaas, tuguulu sahiih ana ma kallaftuku be diifti. Laakin waahidiin yuguulu ana najiid wa akaltuku be najaada.
Wa hal chilt minku cheyy be waasitat al-akhwaan al-ana rassaltuhum leeku ?

Ana talabt min Tiitus achaan yamchi leeku wa rassalt ma’aayah al-akhu al-aakhar. Wa hal Tiitus chaal cheyy minku be khachch walla ? La. Haalah wa haali ma sawa walla ? Aniina ma khadamna be nafs al-tariiga walla ?

Akuun intu tuguulu fi guluubku aniina gulna kulla l-kalaam da achaan aniina nidaafu’u le nufuusna giddaamku. La, ma ke. Nihajju leeku be usum al-Masiih giddaam Allah. Ya akhwaanna al-nihibbuuku, kulla cheyy al-sawweenaah da, hu fi chaanku bas achaan iimaanku yabga gawi.

Wa hassa’ ana khaayif achaan wakit najiiku, intu ma tukuunu misil ana nidoorah wa ana kamaan ma nukuun misil intu tidooruuh. Akuun nalga ambeenaatku al-duwaas wa l-husud wa l-za’al wa l-tama’ wa l-namiime wa l-guwaale wa l-istikbaar wa l-barjaal.
Akuun wakit najiiku, Allah yijiib leyi battaan al-eeb giddaamku. Wa nahzan fi chaan al-naas al-katiiriin al-awwal aznabo wa ma taabo min al-haal al-khabiise wa l-zina wa l-fasaad al-awwal sawwoohum.
Wa hassa’ da, namchi leeku taalit marra. Wa da yabga misil al-cheyy al-maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Chuhuud itneen aw talaata yisabbutu ayyi kalaam}.

Wa l-cheyy al-ana gultah wakit ana gaa’id ma’aaku al-marra al-taaniye, nuguulah leeku battaan hassa’ ana khaayib minku. Ana gult le l-naas al-aznabo wa le kulla l-aakhariin kan najiiku battaan, ma ni’addibhum be nafas baarid.
Tidooru al-daliil al-yiwassif kadar al-Masiih yihajji leeku be waastiti ana wa daahu ana niwassifah leeku. Hu ma da’iif fi l-cheyy al-yisawwiih leeku wa akiid hu yiwassif gudurtah fi usutku.

Sahiih, al-Masiih khalla minnah al-gudra wa maat fi l-saliib laakin hu hayy be gudrat Allah. Wa fi alaakhitna ma’aayah, aniina ma indina gudra hintina laakin nahyo ma’aayah be gudrat Allah wa be l-gudra di ni’aamuluuku.
As’alo nufuusku. Hal be l-sahiih ke intu mu’miniin ? Jarrubu nufuusku. Ma ta’arfu kadar Isa al-Masiih gaa’id fiiku walla ? Wa da yabga sahiih kan ma fachaltu marra waahid.
Wa nitmanna ta’arfu aniina ma fachalna.
Wa nas’alo Allah achaan intu ma tisawwu ayyi khata. Wa su’aalna da, ma achaan al-naas yichiifu najaahna laakin achaan intu tisawwu al-kheer, hatta kan naas waahidiin buguulu aniina fachalna kula.
Achaan aniina ma nagdaro nisawwu cheyy didd al-hagg illa le l-hagg.
Wa kan aniina ma indina gudra wa intu bas induku, khalaas aniina farhaaniin. Wa nas’alo Allah leeku achaan intu tabgo mu’miniin kaamiliin.

Wa khalaas, naktib leeku al-kalaam da wakit ana khaayib minku achaan wakit ana gaa’id ma’aaku ma waajib leyi nahrijku. Achaan al-sulta al-Rabbina antaani foogku hi le nigawwiiku fi l-iimaan wa ma le nikharribku.
Wa khalaas, ya akhwaani, afraho. Abgo mu’miniin kaamiliin. Achchaaja’o ambeenaatku. Khalli fikirku yabga waahid. Iichu be l-salaam wa Allah siid al-mahabba wa l-salaam yagood ma’aaku.
Assaalamo ambeenaatku be salaam al-saalihiin.
Kulla l-akhwaan al-saalihiin al-ma’aayi yisallumuuku.
Khalli ni’mat Rabbina Isa al-Masiih wa mahabbat Allah wa l-ukhuwwa al-jaaye min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus yagoodu saabtiin foogku kulluku.
Jawaab minni ana Buulus al-bigiit rasuul ma be izin al-naas wa la be niiyithum, laakin be izin Isa al-Masiih wa Allah abuuh al-ba’asah min ust al-maytiin.
Al-jawaab da jaayi minni wa min kulla l-akhwaan al-ma’aayi wa hu le jamaa’aat al-mu’miniin al-fi balad Khalaatiya.
Aleekum al-salaam wa l-rahma min Allah Abuuna wa Rabbina Isa al-Masiih
al-gaddam nafsah dahiiye fi chaan zunuubna achaan yinajjiina min charr al-dunya di be muraadat Allah Abuuna.
Wa l-hamdulillah daayman wa ila l-abad. Aamiin.
Ana ajjabt leeku bilheen. Allah naadaaku achaan ti’iichu be ni’mat al-Masiih wa ajala ke intu gammeetu khalleetuuh achaan tidooru titaabu’u bichaara aakhara.
Wa be l-sahiih, ma fi bichaara aakhara laakin naas waahidiin gammo yibarjuluuku be kalaamhum wa yidooru yitallufu bichaarat al-Masiih.
Wa kan ayyi naadum minnina walla malak min malaa’ikat Allah yaji yiballikh leeku bichaara fi l-Masiih chig min al-bichaara al-ballakhnaaha leeku di, khalli Allah yan’alah marra waahid.
Gulnaah gibeel wa hassa’ nuguulah battaan, kan naadum yiballikh leeku fi l-Masiih bichaara chig min al-bichaara al-awwal simi’tuuha di, khalli Allah yan’al al-naadum da marra waahid.
Chunu fikirku fi l-kalaam da ? Nidoor nalga beyah rida min al-naas walla rida min Allah ? Nidoor na’ajib al-naas walla ? Nuguulu leeku kan ana lissaa’ gaa’id na’ajib al-naas, ana ma abid al-Masiih.
Ya akhwaani, nidoor kadar intu ta’arfu al-bichaara al-ballakhtaha leeku ma jaat min al-naas.
Wa naadum ma antaaha leyi wa ma fi naadum garraani leeha. Nazalat leyi wakit Allah bayyan leyi Isa al-Masiih.
Akiid ta’arfu haali wakit ana lissaa’ nitaabi’ diin al-Yahuud. Simi’tu ana haarabt ummat al-Masiih al-Allah ikhtaarha be chidde wa dawwart nidammirha marra waahid.
Wa fi diin al-Yahuud, ana faayit naas katiiriin al-ana ma’aahum umurna sawa achaan ana munkarib bilheen fi aadaat juduudna.
Laakin gubbaal ma wildooni kula, Allah ikhtaaraani achaan nabga be ni’matah rasuul. Wa fi l-wakit al-Allah gata’ah leyi,
hu bayyan Ibnah fi galbi achaan nibachchir beyah fi buldaan hana l-naas al-ma Yahuud. Wa ana ma gammeet chaawart ayyi insaan.
Wa ma macheet lammeet ma’a l-naas al-bigo rusul gubbaali al-gaa’idiin fi Madiinat al-Khudus. Laakin futt tawwaali fi daar al-Arab wa ba’adeen gabbalt fi madiinat Dimachkh.
Wa ba’ad talaata sana, khalaas macheet Madiinat al-Khudus achaan nil’aarafo ma’a Butrus. Wa ga’adt ma’aayah khamistaachar yoom.
Laakin ma chift naadum aakhar min al-rusul illa chift Yaakhuub akhu al-Rabb Isa.
Wa kulla l-kalaam da al-katabtah leeku sahiih. Allah ya’arif kalaami ma kidib.
Wa ba’ad da, gammeet nuruukh fi Suuriya wa Kilikiiya.
Wa fi l-wakit da, jamaa’aat al-Masiihiyiin al-fi daar al-Yahuudiiya lissaa’hum ma chaafooni.
Sim’o al-khabar bas al-buguul «Al-naadum al-awwal haarabaana gaa’id yiballikh le l-naas be l-iimaan al-awwal dawwar yidammirah».
Wa chakaro Allah fi chaani.
Wa battaan ba’ad arba’taachar sana, ana macheet Madiinat al-Khudus marra taaniye. Wa Barnaaba kula macha ma’aayi wa chilna ma’aana akhuuna Tiitus.

Macheet be sabab ru’ya min Allah. Wa macheet le kubaaraat al-mu’miniin al-ma’ruufiin wa lammeet ma’aahum fi malamma wiheedna. Wa gaddamt leehum al-bichaara al-ballakhtaha fi ust al-naas al-ma Yahuud. Dawwart ni’akkid kadar al-khidme al-awwal sawweetha wa l-hassa’ gaa’id nisawwiiha ma tabga baatle.
Wa Tiitus zaatah al-gaa’id ma’aayi hu Yuunaani wa ma Yahuudi wa laakin ma jabaroona achaan nitahhuruuh.

Hajjeena fi su’aal al-tahuura achaan akhwaan waahidiin ma mu’miniin be l-sahiih andasso ambeenaatna. Jo be talbiid yijaasusu fi l-hurriiye al-indina be l-Masiih Isa achaan dawwaro yarbutu foogna aadaat al-Yahuud lahaddi nabgo misil abiid.
Laakin aniina abeenaahum marra waahid ma simi’na kalaamhum achaan dawwarna nahfado leeku al-kalaam al-sahiih al-Allah antaana fi bichaarat al-Masiih.
Wa hajjeena ma’a l-naas al-kubaaraat fi fikir akhwaanna. Wa kan humman kubaaraat walla ma kubaaraat, da ma lammaani. Giddaam Allah kulla l-naas sawa sawa. Wa humman ma zaado le kalaami cheyy waahid.
Be l-aks, bigi leehum waadih kadar Allah kallafaani be ballikhiin bichaarat al-Masiih le l-naas al-ma Yahuud misil hu kallaf Butrus be ballikhiin bichaarat al-Masiih le l-Yahuud.
Wa misil Allah ikhtaar Butrus wa sawwaah rasuul le l-Yahuud, hu ikhtaaraani ana kula wa sawwaani rasuul le l-ma Yahuud.

Wa l-ru’asa al-ma’ruufiin Yaakhuub wa Butrus wa Yuuhanna bigi leehum waadih kadar Allah antaani al-ni’ma di. Wa khalaas, karaboona be l-iid al-zeene wa sallamoona ana wa Barnaaba achaan yiwassufu aniina kullina muchtarikiin fi l-khidme. Wa astafago kadar aniina nakhdumu fi ust al-naas al-ma Yahuud wa humman yakhdumu fi ust al-Yahuud.
Talabo minnina cheyy waahid bas. Dawwaro aniina nifakkuru fi l-masaakiin al-ma’aahum. Wa da bas al-cheyy al-min awwal niriid nisawwiih.
Laakin wakit Butrus ja fi Antaakiya, ana khattamt leyah wa aaradtah achaan hu khaltaan.

Gubbaal naas waahidiin ma yaju min bakaan Yaakhuub, Butrus gaa’id yaakul ma’a l-akhwaan al-ma Yahuud. Laakin min al-naas dool jo khalaas, hu bada yikiss min al-naas al-ma Yahuud wa anfarag minhum achaan hu khaayif min Hizib al-Tahuura
Wa akhwaan aakhariin min al-Yahuud taaba’ooh fi l-nifaakh da lahaddi waddo ma’aahum Barnaaba zaatah fi nifaakhhum.

Laakin wakit ana chift kadar humman ma maachiin adiil wa ma yitaabu’u al-kalaam al-sahiih al-Allah antaana fi bichaarat al-Masiih, gammeet hajjeet le Butrus giddaamhum kulluhum. Wa gult «Inta Yahuudi wa bigiit misil naadum ma Yahuudi wa khalleet minnak aadaat al-Yahuud. Wa misil da, maala tidoor tajbur al-naas al-ma Yahuud yabgo misil al-Yahuud ?».
Aniina zaatna mawluudiin Yahuud wa ma min al-muznibiin al-ma Yahuud dool.

Wa be da kula, na’arfu kadar Allah ma yaj’al ayyi naadum saalih achaan hu yitaabi’ churuut al-Tawraat. Laakin hu yaj’al al-naadum saalih kan hu mu’min be l-Masiih. Wa be misil da, aniina aamanna be l-Masiih Isa achaan Allah yaj’alna saalihiin be sabab iimaanna be l-Masiih wa ma achaan nitaabu’u churuut al-Tawraat. Achaan ma fi insaan waahid yabga saalih giddaam Allah be tabbigiin churuut al-Tawraat.
Laakin kan chilna derib al-Masiih achaan nabgo saalihiin wa be da al-Yahuud buguulu foogna aniina muznibiin, hal nuguulu al-Masiih hu sabbab zunuub walla ? La, abadan.
Laakin kan ana nigabbil wa nitaabi’ battaan al-aadaat al-awwal khalleethum minni, misil da bas nabga khaati be l-sahiih.
Al-Tawraat sawwa foogi amalah wa khalaas, fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss churuut al-Tawraat ana mayyit. Wa ana mutt le churuutah achaan nugumm ni’iich le Allah. Ana mutt ma’a al-Masiih fi saliibah.
Wa hassa’ da, al-naadum al-hayy ma ana laakin al-Masiih hu hayy fiyi. Wa kulla cheyy al-nisawwiih fi l-dunya, nisawwiih hasab al-iimaan fi Ibn Allah al-habbaani lahaddi anta nafsah dahiiye fi chaani.
Abadan ana ma nankur ni’mat Allah. Kan al-naas yabgo saalihiin be tabbigiin churuut al-Tawraat, misil da al-Masiih maat bala sabab.
Ya l-Khalaatiyiin al-mataamiis ! Be kalaam waadih bilheen fassarna leeku moot Isa al-Masiih fi l-saliib. Wa hassa’ naadum saharku walla ?
Nidoor nas’alku cheyy waahid. Al-Ruuh al-Khudduus nazal foogku achaan intu taaba’tu churuut al-Tawraat walla achaan simi’tu bichaarat al-Masiih wa aamantu beeha ?
Bigiitu mataamiis marra waahid walla ? Wakit badeetu fi derib Allah, khatteetu baalku fi gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus. Hassa’ tidooru tikammuluuh be gudrat al-bachar walla ?
Kulla cheyy al-bigi leeku da, bigi bala faayde walla ? Ma mumkin bigi bala faayde.
Fakkuru foogah. Allah yinazzil foogku al-Ruuh al-Khudduus be gudra wa yisawwi ajaayib fi usutku maala ? Achaan titaabu’u churuut al-Tawraat walla achaan simi’tu bichaarat al-Masiih wa aamantu beeha ?
Fakkuru fi Ibraahiim. Maktuub {Hu aaman be kalaam Allah wa Allah ja’alah naadum saalih fi chaan iimaanah}.
Wa min al-kalaam da, a’arfu kadar al-naas al-bigo mu’miniin humman bas iyaal Ibraahiim.

Wa l-Kitaab buguul min awwal kadar Allah indah niiye achaan yaj’al al-naas al-ma Yahuud saalihiin be l-iimaan wa ballakh Ibraahiim be l-bichaara wa gaal {Be sababak inta, kulla l-gabaayil yalgo baraka}.
Wa be misil da, al-naas al-muntakiliin fi l-iimaan humman yalgo baraka ma’a Ibraahiim al-mu’min.

Wa kulla l-naas al-muntakiliin fi tabbigiin churuut al-Tawraat, al-la’ana gaa’ide fooghum. Achaan maktuub fi l-Kitaab kadar ayyi naadum al-ma yitaabi’ al-kalaam al-maktuub fi l-Tawraat kulla ke wa ma yitabbigah tamaam, hu man’uul.
Akiid kadar ma fi naadum yabga saalih giddaam Allah be tabbigiin churuut al-Tawraat. Wa achaan da, maktuub {Al-naadum al-bigi saalih be sabab al-iimaan, hu bahya}.
Laakin derib hana tabbigiin churuut al-Tawraat bukhuss amal al-naas wa ma bukhuss iimaan al-naas. Achaan maktuub {Illa l-naadum al-sawwa kulla l-achya dool bahya beehum}.
Laakin al-Masiih fadaana min al-la’ana al-jaaye min al-Tawraat. Hu zaatah bigi man’uul fi chaanna. Al-Kitaab buguul {Ayyi naadum al-mu’allag foog fi l-uud hu man’uul}.

Wa bigi misil da, achaan be l-Masiih Isa al-baraka al-Allah waa’ad beeha Ibraahiim taji fi l-naas al-ma Yahuud kula. Wa khalaas be sabab al-iimaan, Allah yinazzil foogna kullina al-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-hu waa’ad beyah al-naas.
Ya akhwaani, nantiiku masal fi l-cheyy al-naas bisawwuuh. Kan naaseen induhum mu’aahada wa astafago fi cheyy waahid wa mado foogah khalaas, ma fi naadum al-yagdar yibattilah walla yiziid leyah cheyy.

Zeen. Allah waa’ad Ibraahiim wa l-baji min zurriiytah. Wa l-Kitaab ma buguul «Al-baju min zurriiytak» ya’ni naas katiiriin, laakin buguul «Al-baji min zurriiytak» ya’ni naadum waahid. Wa hu al-Masiih.

Daahu al-cheyy al-nidoor ni’ooriiku beyah. Allah sawwa mu’aahada ma’a Ibraahiim wa ba’ad urbu’miiya wa talaatiin sana, kitaab al-Tawraat ja laakin kalaam al-Tawraat ma yitallif al-mu’aahada al-Allah zaatah sawwaaha wa la yibattil al-wa’ad.
Kan al-naas ma yalgo al-baraka al-Allah waa’ad beeha Ibraahiim illa kan yitaabu’u churuut al-Tawraat, al-baraka ma taji be sabab al-wa’ad. Laakin na’arfu kadar be wa’ad bas antaaha le Ibraahiim.

Wa kan ke da, maala Allah nazzal al-Tawraat le Muusa ? Allah zaad le juduudna al-Tawraat be kulla l-wasaaya be sabab zunuub al-naas. Wa dawwar al-naas yitaabu’u churuut al-Tawraat lahaddi wariis Ibraahiim al-Allah waa’adah be l-baraka yaji. Wa l-Tawraat da, Allah nazzalah be l-malaa’ika be waasitat insaan ya’ni Muusa.
Laakin kan fiyah jaanib waahid bas, ma fi waasta. Wa Allah hu waahid.

Al-Tawraat yikhaalif wa’ad Allah walla ? La, abadan. Kan awwal al-naas gidro yalgo al-haya al-abadiiye be tabbigiin churuut al-Tawraat al-Allah antaahum, khalaas humman yabgo saalihiin be l-churuut dool.

Laakin fi l-Kitaab, Allah yisabbit kadar kulla l-naas gaa’idiin tihit hukum al-zanib wa ma yagdaro yamurgu minnah. Wa bigi misil da achaan Allah indah niiye yanti le l-mu’miniin bas al-baraka al-hu waa’ad beeha be sabab iimaanhum be l-Masiih Isa.
Gubbaal zaman al-iimaan ma yabda, aniina misil masaajiin wa kalaam al-Tawraat hu al-haaris al-gaa’id foogna lahaddi Allah yibayyin leena derib al-iimaan.
Be misil da, al-Tawraat gaa’id yiraakhib foogna lahaddi l-Masiih yaji achaan nabgo saalihiin be l-iimaan.
Wa hassa’ zaman al-iimaan ja khalaas wa kalaam al-Tawraat ma yiraakhib foogna battaan.
Achaan intu kulluku iyaal Allah fi l-Masiih be derib al-iimaan.
Kulluku al-ichtaraktu ma’a l-Masiih be l-khattisiin anrabattu ma’a l-Masiih.
Wa hassa’ ma fi farig been al-Yahuudi wa l-ma Yahuudi, wa la been al-abid wa l-naadum al-hurr, wa la been al-raajil wa l-mara, laakin kulluku waahid fi l-Masiih Isa.
Wa kan intu naas hana l-Masiih, khalaas intu ma’aayah iyaal Ibraahiim wa tawrusu al-baraka al-Allah waa’adah beeha.
Walla be kalaam aakhar, kan wileed waras maal katiir wa hu lissaa’ ma aagil, hu misil abid bas.
Laazim yitaabi’ kalaam al-masaa’iil al-gaa’idiin yirabbuuh wa l-muwakkaliin be maalah lahaddi l-wakit al-abuuh gata’ah leyah.
Wa awwal bigi misil da leena aniina al-Yahuud. Awwal aniina misil al-naas al-ma aagliin wa aaychiin misil al-abiid tihit al-gawaaniin al-bukhussu khumaam al-dunya di.
Laakin al-wakit tamma khalaas wa Allah rassal Ibnah fi l-dunya. Hu mawluud min mara wa rabbooh tihit gawaaniin al-Tawraat
achaan yafda al-naas al-tihit gawaaniin al-Tawraat. Wa khalaas, ligiina beyah al-huguug al-waajbe le iyaal Allah.
Wa intu kula bigiitu iyaalah wa achaan da Allah nazzal fi guluubna Ruuh hana Ibnah al-yasrakh «Abba, Abuuna !».
Wa khalaas, inta ma abid misil awwal. Bigiit wileed Allah wa kan inta wileedah, Allah ja’alak wariisah.
Fi l-wakit al-faat, ma iriftu Allah wa intu abiid le l-ilaahaat al-ma ilaahaat be l-sahiih.

Laakin hassa’ dakhaltu fi alaakha ma’a Allah, walla akheer nuguul Allah dakhkhalaaku fi alaakha ma’aayah. Wa kan ke da, maala tidooru tigabbulu titaabu’u battaan al-gawaaniin al-ma induhum gudra wa la faayde wa bukhussu khumaam al-dunya bas ? Maala tidooru tabgo battaan abiid ?
Haay ! Intu gaa’idiin yukhuttu fikirku fi l-ayyaam wa l-chuhuur wa l-fusuul wa l-siniin !
Haalitku di hayyaratni bilheen. Akuun al-ta’ab al-ti’ibtah foogku macha fi riih saakit.
Ya akhwaani, awwal ana bigiit misilku intu al-ma Yahuud. Hassa’ nachhadku, abgo misli ana. Awwal ma sawweetu leyi cheyy fasil.
Be l-aks, ta’arfu kadar wakit awwal marra ana bachchartuku, ana haass be jildi wa achaan da bas wigift ma’aaku.
Wa ta’abi da bigi leeku gaasi laakin be da kula ma hagartuuni wa la taradtuuni. La, intu dayyaftuuni misil ana malak Allah walla misil ana al-Masiih Isa zaatah.
Ween al-farha al-awwal induku ? Nachhad leeku kadar fi l-wakit daak, kan induku gudra achaan tamurgu uyuunku, tawwaali ke tamurguuhum tantuuhum leyi.
Wa hassa’ da, ana bigiit aduuku achaan ooreetku al-hagg walla ?

Al-naas al-yidooru yijiibuuku fi deribhum dool yakhdumu ambeenaatku be niiye waahide laakin niiyithum ma adiile. Yidooru yifaaruguuku minnina. Wa yidooru intu tugummu titaabu’uuhum wiheedhum be niiye waahide.
Wa kan niiyitku chadiide, da sameh kan al-sabab sameh. Wa da sameh kan niiyitku chadiide daayman wa ma wakit ana ma’aaku bas.
Ya iyaali al-nihibbuku, ana bigiit misil amm al-iyaal al-gaa’ide taldaaku marra taaniye. Gaa’id nat’ab fi l-talaga lahaddi tabgo saabtiin fi l-Masiih.
Nitmanna kadar nagdar nukuun ma’aaku wa nihajji leeku be hiss baarid. Laakin ana ba’iid minku wa ana alhayyart minku.
Intu al-tidooru titaabu’u churuut al-Tawraat, ooruuni cheyy waahid. Intu ma simi’tu al-kalaam al-maktuub fi l-Tawraat walla ?
Al-Kitaab buguul Ibraahiim indah awlaad itneen
Wileed al-khaadum da, wildooh be l-waaluuda al-aadiiye wa laakin al-wileed al-aakhar waaluudtah bigat hasab wa’ad Allah.
Wa l-kalaam da masal leena. Al-awiin al-itneen dool yiwassufuuna mu’aahadaat itneen been Allah wa been al-naas. Al-awwalaaniiye hi al-mu’aahada al-Allah sawwaaha fi Jabal Siinaa’
Haagar wa Jabal Siinaa’ al-fi daar al-Arab yiwassufuuna Madiinat al-Khudus aasimat al-Yahuud al-gaa’ide fi l-dunya. Achaan al-madiina wa naasha gaa’idiin fi l-ubuudiiye tihit churuut al-Tawraat.
Laakin Madiinat al-Khudus al-gaa’ide foog ma’a Allah hi hurra wa hi bas ammina.

Wa maktuub fi l-Kitaab {Ya l-mara al-aagre al-ma talde, afrahi. Inti al-waja’ al-talge ma lihigki, zakhriti be hiss foog. Achaan iyaal al-mara al-raajilha khallaaha yabgo katiiriin min iyaal al-mara al-gaa’ide ma’a l-raajil}.
Wa khalaas ya akhwaani, intu bigiitu misil Ishaakh achaan bigiitu iyaal Allah be wa’ad Allah.
Laakin fi zaman Ibraahiim, al-wileed al-wildooh be l-waaluuda al-aadiiye gamma yita’’ib al-wileed al-wildooh be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus wa bigi misil da fi zamanna kula.
Laakin al-Kitaab buguul chunu ? Buguul {Atrud al-khaadum wa wileedha. Achaan wileed al-khaadum ma yawris cheyy ma’a wileed al-hurra}.
Wa be misil da ya akhwaani, aniina ma iyaal al-khaadum. Aniina iyaal al-hurra.
Al-Masiih sawwaana naas hurriin achaan ni’iichu fi l-hurriiye. Agoodu saabtiin fi l-hurriiye wa aabo ma tabgo battaan abiid.
Fukku adaanku. Ana Buulus nuguul leeku kan tikhalluuhum yitahhuruuku, barakat al-Masiih ma tanfa’ leeku bat.
Nachhad leeku battaan kadar ayyi naadum al-yikhalli nafsah yitahhuruuh be tahuurat al-Tawraat, waajib leyah yitabbig churuut al-Tawraat kulluhum ke.
Intu al-tidooru tabgo saalihiin be tabbigiin churuut al-Tawraat dool, anfaragtu marra waahid min al-Masiih wa khalleetu minku ni’mat Allah.
Laakin be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus, aniina nukhuttu achamna fi Allah al-yisawwiina saalihiin be sabab iimaanna.
Achaan fi derib al-Masiih Isa, kan naadum mutahhar walla ma mutahhar, da ma bisawwi cheyy. Al-cheyy al-waajib hu al-iimaan be l-Masiih wa l-mahabba al-jaaye min al-iimaan da.
Badeetu adiil fi derib al-Masiih. Kikkeef khalleetu naadum yamrugku min al-derib ?
Al-kalaam da ma jaayi min Allah al-gaa’id yinaadiiku.
Angar’u ! Tawwaara chiyya bas takfi le tigawwim al-ajiine kullaha ke.
Laakin al-Rabb antaani damaan leeku wa na’arif kadar intu ma takhbalo fikir chig min fikirna. Wa l-naadum al-gaa’id yibarjilku da, al-hukum yaji foogah kan yabga yaatu kula.

Ya akhwaani, kan ana zaati gaa’id ni’allim al-naas kadar al-tahuura waajbe, maala al-Yahuud gaa’idiin yita’’ubuuni ? Kan sahiih ana gaa’id nuguul kalaam misil da, bichaarat al-saliib ma tiza’’ilhum battaan.
Al-naas al-gaa’idiin yibarjuluuku dool, nitmanna kadar yikhassu nufuushum marra waahid.
Ya akhwaani, Allah naadaaku achaan yidoor intu ti’iichu fi l-hurriiye. Laakin ma tisawwu al-hurriiye di fursa le titaabu’u chahwaatku al-fasliin. Akheer takhdumu le akhwaanku be l-mahabba.
Achaan kulla churuut al-Tawraat zibdithum tinlagi fi wasiiye waahide wa hi {Hibb akhuuk misil tihibb nafsak}.
Laakin kan tilkhaalafo ambeenaatku wa tiddaawaso misil kulaab, khalaas fi l-akhiir til’aakalo marra waahid.
