Ma tikhalli naadum yahgirak be sabab umrak al-sakhayyar. Sawwi nafsak masal le l-mu’miniin fi kalaamak wa haalak. Khalli yichiifu foogak al-mahabba wa l-iimaan wa l-tihaara.
Lahaddi najiik, ankarib fi giraayit Kitaab Allah le l-naas wa ma tikhalli minnak al-bachchiriin wa l-allimiin.
Khutt baalak fi l-baraka al-Allah antaaha leek be l-kalaam al-naazil min Allah wakit jamaa’at al-chuyuukh khatto iideenhum foogak.
Ankarib foog al-waajbaat dool wa jaahid fi chaanhum achaan kulla l-naas yichiifu najaahak.
Khutt baalak fi nafsak wa fi ta’liimak le l-naas. Ankarib foogah wa be misil da, tinajji nafsak wa tinajji al-naas al-yasma’o kalaamak.
Ma tikichch le ayyi chaayib laakin hajji leyah be adab misil hu abuuk. Wa hajji le l-subyaan misil humman akhwaanak.
Wa hajji le kulli ajuuz misil hi ammak wa hajji le kulli bineeye be niiye taahire marra waahid misil hi akhtak.
Al-awiin al-rujaalhin maytiin waajib tikarrimhin kan sahiih ma indihin naadum al-yifakkir fooghin.
Kan ayyi mara al-raajilha mayyit indaha iyaal walla iyaal iyaalha, khalli ya’arfu kikkeef yabgo takhiyiin ma’a naas beethum wa yantu le waaldeenhum huguughum misil Allah yarda beyah.
Laakin al-mara al-raajilha mayyit wa ma yifaddil leeha naadum al-yifakkir foogha, hi tukhutt achamha saabit foog Allah wa tinkarib fi du’aaha wa salaawaatha, leel wa nahaar.
Wa laakin al-mara al-raajilha mayyit al-tiriid halaat al-dunya bas, kan hi lissaa’ hayye kula, hi mayte.
Aamurhum le jamaa’at al-mu’miniin be l-wasaaya dool achaan yabgo naas ma induhum eeb.
Wa ayyi naadum al-yaaba ma yirayyis ahalah wa khaassatan naas beetah, hu nakar al-iimaan khalaas. Naadum kaafir akheer minnah.
Ma tisajjil ayyi mara al-raajilha mayyit fi Majmuu’at al-Araamil

wa kan hi ma’ruufa be l-amal al-saalih. Waajib tabga mara al-rabbat iyaalha adiil wa kariime le l-diifaan wa sallamat nafisha achaan takhdim le l-naas al-saalihiin wa saa’adat al-ta’baaniin wa misil da hi ankarabat fi kulla amal al-kheer.
Aaba ma tisajjil fi Majmuu’at al-Araamil ayyi mara sabiiye al-raajilha maat achaan wakit chahwaatha yilizzuuha, hi taaba khidmit al-Masiih wa tidoor taakhud battaan.
Wa misil da, hi tabga khaatiye achaan tikhaalif al-wa’ad al-awwal sawwatah ma’aayah.

Wa awiin misil deel yabgan kamaan aatilaat wa yugumman yuruukhan min beet le beet. Wa ma yabgan aatilaat bas laakin yabgan gawwaalaat wa yindassan fi l-cheyy al-ma bukhussihin wa yihajjan be kalaam al-ma bichaabih.
Achaan da, nidoor ayyi mara sabiiye al-raajilha maat taakhud wa talda iyaal wa tirayyis naas beetha wa khalaas ma tanti fursa le naas hana Ibliis achaan yuguulu foogna kalaam cheen.
Wa gult al-kalaam da achaan awiin waahdaat maragan min al-derib wa taaba’an al-Cheetaan.

Wa khalaas ayyi mu’mine al-indaha fi ahalha awiin al-rujaalhin maytiin, khalliiha tisaa’idhin. Khalli ma tikallif beehin jamaa’at al-mu’miniin. Wa be misil da, al-mu’miniin yisaa’udu al-awiin al-sahiih ke ma indihin naadum al-yifakkir fooghin.
Al-chuyuukh al-chaayliin mas’uuliiyit al-kaniisa adiil, khalli al-akhwaan yihtarumuuhum bilheen wa yantuuhum al-musaa’ada, khaassatan al-chuyuukh al-munkaribiin fi l-bachchiriin wa l-allimiin.

Wa da yiwaafig be l-masal al-maktuub fi l-Kitaab al-buguul {Wakit al-toor gaa’id yifajjikh leek al-khalla fi l-madagg, ma tarbut khachmah. Khalli yaakul}. Wa be masal taani {Ujrat al-khaddaam al-bakhdim hi waajbe leyah}.
Wa kan al-naas yukhuttu tuhma foog ayyi cheekh, ma takhbal kalaamhum illa kan chuhuud itneen aw talaata yisabbutuuh.
Wa kan naadum min al-chuyuukh yaznib, aharjah giddaam al-jamaa’a achaan al-aakhariin yakhaafo.

Asma’ kalaami. Ana niwassiik giddaam Allah wa l-Masiih Isa wa l-malaa’ika al-mugarrabiin. Taabi’ al-wasaaya al-anteethum leek dool wa ma tifannid al-naas wa ma tichiif ayyi naadum akheer min al-aakhariin.
Ma tista’jal wakit tidoor tidarrij cheekh wa ma tichaarik fi zunuub hana naadum aakhar. Angari’ ma titallif haalak al-saalhe.
Wa min al-yoom wa giddaam, ma tachrab almi wiheedah bas. Ziid leyah khamar chiyya achaan tidaawi batnak min amraadha al-katiiriin.
Naas waahidiin zunuubhum waadihiin le kulla l-naas gubbaal ma yihaasubuuhum. Wa naas aakhariin zunuubhum ma yin’arfu illa ba’adeen.
Wa nafs al-cheyy le amal al-kheer. Hu waadih. Wa kan awwal ma waadih kula, ma yagood mulabbad wakit tawiil.

Khalli kulla l-mu’miniin al-gaa’idiin fi l-ubuudiiye yukhuttu fi fikirhum kadar waajib yihtarumu siyaadhum marra waahid. Wa misil da, naadum ma yuguul be sababhum kalaam fasil foog usum Allah wa ta’liimna.

Khalli al-abiid al-siyaadhum mu’miniin ma yuguulu «Humman akhwaanna. Ma waajib nitii’uuhum misil awwal». Akheer yakhdumu leehum be ziyaada achaan al-naas al-yalgo faayde min khidmithum al-samhe di, humman mu’miniin wa mahbuubiin. Allim al-akhwaan al-wasaaya dool wa chajji’hum achaan yitaabu’uuhum.
Ayyi naadum al-yugumm yi’allim kalaam chig min da wa ma yidoor al-kalaam al-adiil al-jaayi min Rabbina Isa al-Masiih wa yaaba al-ta’liim al-yiwaddi al-naas fi l-takhwa,
hu mustakbir marra waahid. Ma ya’arif cheyy. Indah marad hana l-munaakhachaat wa l-mukhlaat fi ma’ana al-kalimaat. Kalaamah yisabbib al-husud wa l-mukhaasama wa l-gatii’e wa al-tuham al-baatliin.
Al-munaakhachaat abadan ma yikammulu le l-naas al-uguulhum talfaaniin wa l-hagg anrafa’ minhum. Wa yisawwu nufuushum mu’allimiin hana l-takhwa achaan fi fikirhum yalgo minnah ribah.
Wa be l-sahiih, kan naadum bigi takhi wa radyaan be l-indah, hu rabhaan ziyaada.
Achaan wildoona fi l-dunya iidna yaabse wa be l-moot namurgu min al-dunya iidna yaabse.
Wa kan indina ma’aach wa kiswe, khalli nabgo radyaaniin khalaas.

Laakin al-naas al-yidooru yabgo khaniyiin, tama’hum yilizzuhum fi zunuub wa yabga leehum charak. Wa katarat chahwaathum yisabbubu leehum al-aza wa yisawwuuhum ajaama wa yiwadduuhum fi l-damaar wa l-halaak.
Achaan hubb al-maal hu ga’ar kulla l-fasaalaat. Be sabab al-tama’, naas waahidiin waddaro. Marago min derib al-iimaan wa jaabo fi raashum nadaama chadiide.
Laakin inta ya khaddaam Allah, ajri min kulla l-kalaam da. Ankarib be niiye waahide fi l-haal al-saalhe wa l-takhwa wa l-iimaan wa l-mahabba wa l-sabur wa l-nafas al-baarid.
Jaahid jihaad adiil fi derib al-iimaan. Akrub gawi al-haya al-abadiiye al-Allah naadaak le tadkhul foogha wa inta kula chihidt leeha be chahaadat al-hagg giddaam chuhuud katiiriin.
Wa niwassiik giddaam Allah al-yanti al-haya le kulla cheyy wa be usum al-Masiih Isa al-chihid le l-hagg giddaam al-waali Bilaatus al-Bunti.
Taabi’ wasiiyat Allah bala khata wa bala eeb lahaddi yoom Rabbina Isa al-Masiih yigabbil wa kulla l-naas yichiifuuh.
Wa da yabga fi l-wakit al-Allah haddadah wa waajib le Allah al-chukur. Hu al-sultaan al-waahid wa malik al-muluuk wa Rabb kulla cheyy.

Hu wiheedah al-Hayy ila l-abad wa hu saakin fi nuur aziim al-naas ma yagdaro yigarrubu leyah. Abadan ma fi naadum al-chaafah wa la yagdar yichiifah. Waajib leyah kulla l-ikraam wa l-muluk ila l-abad. Aamiin.

Wa l-akhwaan al-induhum maal katiir fi l-dunya wassiihum achaan ma yabgo fachchaariin wa ma yukhuttu baalhum fi l-maal al-yufuut. Khalli yukhuttu baalhum foog Allah al-yantiina be ziyaada wa yarzukhna be kulla cheyy achaan nafraho minnah.
Khalli yisawwu al-kheer wa yabgo siyaad al-hasanaat be l-karam wa l-juud.
Wa misil da, yudummu le nufuushum raas maal hana l-aakhira achaan yakurbu gawi al-haya al-sahiihe al-hi al-haya al-abadiiye.
Ya Timuutaawus, ahfad al-amaana al-Allah antaak. Angari’ min al-kalaam al-ma yanfa’ wa l-kalaam al-yikhaalif al-hagg, al-kalaam al-buguuluuh be kidib hu al-ilim.
Naas waahidiin saddakho beyah wa taaba’ooh. Wa khalaas, marago min derib al-iimaan wa waddaro. Wa aleekum al-ni’ma.
Jawaab minni ana Buulus Rasuul hana Isa al-Masiih be izin Allah. Wa hu ja’alaani Rasuul achaan niballikh al-haya al-abadiiye al-Allah waa’adaana beeha wa antaaha be Isa al-Masiih.
Wa naktib leek inta, ya Timuutaawus, al-bigiit wileedi al-niriidak. Aleekum al-salaam wa l-ni’ma wa l-rahma min Allah Abuuna wa l-Masiih Isa Rabbina.
Fi chaanak inta, nachkur Allah al-na’abudah misil juduudi abadooh be niiye mukhlisa wa nifakkir foogak daayman wakit nad’i leel wa nahaar.
Nifakkir fi dumuu’ak wa nagram leek. Nidoor nichiifak battaan achaan ninmali be l-farha.
Ana gaa’id nifakkir fi iimaanak al-mukhlis al-misil al-iimaan al-awwal chiftah fi jidditak Luwiisa wa ammak Yuunika wa hassa’ akiid gaa’id foogak inta.
Achaan da, nidoor nizakkirak battaan. Wakit ana da’eet wa khatteet foogak iideeni, Allah anta leek baraka wa hi misil jamur. Hajjijha achaan tabga battaan haamiye misil awwal.
Achaan Allah antaana al-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-hu ma yisawwiina khawwaafiin. Be l-aks, al-Ruuh al-Khudduus yantiina al-gudra wa l-mahabba wa l-agul al-saabit.

Ma takhaaf wa ma takhjal. Bachchir al-naas be usum al-Rabb al-ana masjuun fi chaanah. Ma tidangir raasak be sabab sijni ana. Chaarikni fi l-ta’ab fi chaan bichaarat al-Masiih wa Allah yantiik al-gudra.

Hu najjaana wa naadaana achaan nabgo naas khaassiin leyah. Wa da ma be sabab ayyi amal saalih al-aniina sawweenaah laakin be sabab niiyitah wa rahmatah. Gubbaal al-dunya ma badat, hu indah niiye achaan yantiina al-ni’ma di fi l-Masiih Isa.
Wa hassa’ fi l-zaman al-haadir, hu bayyan rahmatah fi jayyit al-naadum al-yinajjiina wa hu al-Masiih Isa. Al-Masiih battal gudrat al-moot wa fi bichaartah wassaf leena al-haya al-abadiiye.
Wa Allah ikhtaaraani wa sawwaani mubachchir wa rasuul wa mu’allim achaan niballikh le l-naas al-bichaara di.

Wa achaan da bas, ana gaa’id nat’ab misil da. Laakin al-eeb abadan ma sawwaani achaan hu al-ana aamant beyah na’arfah tamaam. Wa ana mu’akkid kadar hu gaadir wa yahfad al-amaana al-anteetha leyah lahaddi l-yoom al-akhiir.
Akrub gawi al-ta’liim al-adiil al-simi’tah minni wa taabi’ah tamaam. Wa ankarib fi l-iimaan wa l-mahabba misil al-waajib fi derib al-Masiih Isa.
Kalaam al-hagg, hu amaana min Allah. Ahfadah be gudrat al-Ruuh al-Khudduus al-gaa’id fi usutna.
Akiid, inta simi’t kadar kulla l-akhwaan al-min balad Aasiya gata’o ma’aayi al-alaakha wa l-akhwaan Figeel wa Harmuugiin kula minhum.
Khalli Rabbina yarham naas beet akhuuna Waani Sifirus achaan hu ja leyi fi l-sijin wa chajja’aani katiir. Janaaziiri abadan ma sawwo leyah eeb.
Be l-aks, wakit wisil fi Rooma hu fattachaani be niiye waahide lahaddi ligiini.
Wa nas’al Rabbina le Waani Sifirus achaan yalga rahma min Allah fi l-yoom al-akhiir. Wa inta ta’arif hu saa’adaani katiir wakit ana gaa’id fi hillit Afasus kula.
Wa inta, ya wileedi, abga saabit fi l-ni’ma al-indina fi l-Masiih Isa.
Wa l-kalaam al-inta simi’tah min khachmi giddaam chuhuud katiiriin, kallif beyah naas saadikhiin al-yagdaro yi’allumu beyah aakhariin battaan.
Akhbal al-ta’ab misil askari adiil hana l-Masiih Isa.
Al-askari al-gaa’id yisawwi khidimtah ma lammaayah be khidmit al-naas al-ma askar. Hu yukhutt baalah le kalaam kabiirah al-yaamurah wa yidoor rida minnah hu bas.
Wa be masal taani, kan naadum yajri fi sabag ma yuguulu hu al-saabig illa kan jara hasab al-churuut.
Wa battaan, al-harraati al-ti’ib foog al-zere’ waajib hu bas awwal naadum al-yalga al-khalla.
Fakkir foog al-kalaam al-gultah leek da wa Rabbina yantiik gudra achaan tafham kulla cheyy.
Fakkir fi Isa al-Masiih. Hu min zurriiyit Dawuud wa ba’as min ust al-maytiin. Wa da bas al-kalaam al-ana ballakhtah le l-naas.
Wa be sabab al-bichaara di, ana gaa’id fi l-ta’ab marbuut be janaaziir misil ana mujrim. Laakin kalaam Allah abadan ma yagdaro yarbutuuh.
Wa be misil da, nahmal ayyi ta’ab fi chaan al-naas al-Allah ikhtaaraahum wa nijaahid achaan yalgo ma’aayi al-naja be l-Masiih Isa wa yadkhulu fi l-majd al-abadi.
Al-kalaam da hagg, kan mutna ma’aayah nahyo ma’aayah.
Wa kan nahmalo al-ta’ab fi chaanah, namluku ma’aayah. Wa kan nankuruuh, hu kula yankurna.
Wa kan aniina ma indina amaan, hu yagood daayman amiin achaan hu ma yagdar yankur nafsah.
Zakkirhum le l-akhwaan be l-kalaam da wa warwirhum giddaam Allah achaan ma yilkhaalato fi tafsiir al-kalimaat. Kalaam misil da ma indah faayde wa yisabbib al-halaak le l-naas al-yasma’ooh.
A’asir galbak achaan tabga naadum al-Allah yarda beyah. Abga misil khaddaam al-khidimtah ma tisabbib leyah eeb. Fassir kalaam al-hagg be tafsiir adiil.
Wa angari’ min al-kalaam al-cheen al-ma indah faayde. Al-naas al-yitaabu’u al-kalaam da yiziidhum kufur be ziyaada.
Wa kalaamhum yichattit been al-naas misil marad al-nimla foog al-jisim. Wa minhum Hamaani wa Filiitus.
Humman marago min derib al-hagg. Wa hassa’ gaa’idiin yuguulu kadar al-bu’aas tamma khalaas. Wa gaa’idiin yitallufu iimaan hana naas waahidiin.

Laakin al-asaas al-gawi al-Allah khattah gaa’id saabit wa hu khatta foogah khitim wa da al-kalaam al-maktuub fi l-Kitaab al-buguul {Allah ya’arif naasah} wa battaan {Waajib ayyi naadum al-yikarrim usum Allah, yikhalli minnah al-fasaala marra waahid}.

Fi beet hana naadum khani, fiyah mawaa’iin khaaliyiin min al-dahab wa l-fudda wa mawaa’iin rukhaas min al-hatab wa l-tiine. Wa l-waahidiin yakhdumu beehum amal nadiif wa l-waahidiin yakhdumu beehum amal waskhaan.

Wa be misil da, kan naadum yisaffi nafsah min kulla cheyy waskhaan, hu yabga misil maa’uun hana l-amal al-nadiif wa yabga misil maa’uun taahir al-indah faayde le siidah. Hu yabga jaahiz achaan yisawwi ayyi amal al-zeen.
Angari’ min chahwaat hana l-suba. Khutt baalak achaan tabga naadum saalih wa tabga gawi fi l-iimaan wa l-mahabba wa l-salaam misil kulla l-naas al-yad’u al-Rabb be galib taahir.
Wa angari’ marra waahid min al-munaakhachaat al-baatliin al-ma induhum faayde. Inta ta’arif kadar al-munaakhachaat al-misil dool yisabbubu al-huraaj bas.
Wa khaddaam al-Rabb ma waajib yihaarij. Wa laakin waajib yisawwi zeen le kulla l-naas wa ya’arif kikkeef yi’allimhum wa yasbur leehum.
Be nafas baarid hu yiwassif al-hagg le l-naas al-yikhaalufuuh wa hu yidoor kadar Allah yahdiihum le l-tooba wa ya’arfu al-hagg.
Wa khalaas, yamurgu min charak Ibliis al-awwal karabaahum achaan yisawwu leyah al-cheyy al-hu yidoorah.
Waajib ta’arif kadar al-zaman al-akhiir yabga zaman gaasi bilheen.

Wa fi l-zaman da, al-naas yihibbu nufuushum be ziyaada wa yihibbu al-gurus bilheen. Wa yabgo fachchaariin wa mustakbiriin wa kalaamhum yabga murr wa yabgo aaykhiin le waaldeenhum wa nassaayiin al-kheer wa faasdiin.
Wa ma induhum mahanna wa yaabo ma yisaamuhu. Wa yabgo gattaa’iin wa ma gaadriin yisabbutu nufuushum wa yabgo kachraaniin wa yakraho al-kheer.
Wa yabgo khaayniin wa muta’ammidiin wa fachchaariin. Wa yihibbu halaat al-dunya ziyaada min Allah.
Wa yinkarubu fi l-chokhol al-biwassif al-takhwa laakin fi guluubhum yaabooh ma yitaabu’uuh.
Angari’ min al-naas al-misil dool.
Waahidiin minhum yindasso fi buyuut al-naas be najaada. Wa yissaytaro be l-khachch foog al-awiin al-fikirhin ma saabit al-malaanaat be zunuub wa gaa’idaat yitaabi’an kulla nafar al-chahwaat.
Al-awiin al-misil deel yasma’an ta’liim katiir wa abadan ma yagdaran yafhaman al-hagg.
Wa l-khachchaachiin dool gaa’idiin yikhaalufu al-hagg misil Yaniis wa Yambaaris
Laakin ma yanjaho achaan ba’ad chiyya yabga waadih le kulla l-naas kadar kalaamhum baatil. Wa yabga leehum misil al-cheyy al-bigi le Yaniis wa Yambaaris.
Laakin inta raafagtini wa ta’arifni. Chiftini wakit ana gaa’id ni’allim al-naas wa ta’arif haali wa niiyiti fi kulla cheyy. Ta’arif iimaani wa sabri wa mahabbiti wa galbi al-saabit.
Inta chiftini wakit al-naas gaa’idiin yita’’ubuuni wa wakit ta’ab chadiid ja foogi. Wa chiftini fi kulla cheyy al-gaasi al-bigi foogi fi l-hillaal Antaakiya wa Iguuniya wa Listara
Wa akiid ayyi naadum al-yidoor yinkarib fi l-takhwa fi derib al-Masiih Isa, yita’’ubuuh.
Wa laakin al-naas al-fasliin wa l-kaddaabiin, fasaalithum tiziid be ziyaada wa yabgo khachchaachiin wa makhchuuchiin.
Laakin inta, agood saabit fi kulla cheyy al-allamtah wa aamant beyah be iimaan gawi. Ta’arif kadar al-naas al-allamook leyah saadikhiin.
Min inta sakhayyar, irift kitaab Allah al-antaak al-ilim al-yiwaddiik le l-naja be l-iimaan fi l-Masiih Isa.
Al-Kitaab kulla ke hu kalaam min Allah wa indah faayde achaan yi’allim al-hagg wa yiwassif al-naas khataahum wa yigabbilhum fi l-derib al-adiil wa yidarribhum fi l-haal al-saalhe.
Wa beyah khaddaam Allah yabga gaadir wa jaahiz achaan yisawwi ayyi amal al-kheer.
Wa nantiik wasiiye be usum Allah wa be usum al-Masiih Isa al-yihaasib al-hayyiin wa l-maytiin wa be l-yoom al-hu yibiin foogah be mamlakatah.
Ballikh kalaam Allah. Ankarib foogah kan talga min al-naas murr walla halu kula. Jiib al-naas fi l-derib. Al-waahidiin ahrijhum wa l-waahidiin chajji’hum. Allimhum kulluhum be sabur chadiid.
Fiyah wakit jaayi al-naas yaabo ma yahmalo al-ta’liim al-adiil. Yitaabu’u al-kalaam al-halu leehum wa yichiilu mu’allimiin katiiriin al-yuguulu al-kalaam al-ya’ajib al-naas bas.
Wa ma yidooru yasma’o abadan kalaam al-hagg. Fi badalah yidooru yasma’o gisas al-naas al-yiwadduruuhum.
Laakin inta, agood daayman saabit wa ahmal al-ta’ab wa bachchir al-naas be l-bichaara wa akhdim adiil al-khidme al-Allah antaaha leek.
Wa laakin ana bigiit misil dahiiye wa gariib dammi yidaffig. Wa ana mooti garrab khalaas.
Ana jaahadt jihaad adiil fi l-hagg. Wa l-sabag al-tawiil kammaltah wa l-iimaan karabtah gawi lahaddi l-nihaaya.

Wa hassa’ al-jaa’iza al-yantuuha le l-khaalib tarjaani. Wa hi al-taaj al-Rabbina yukhuttah fi raas al-naadum al-saalih. Wa Rabbina al-haakim al-aadil yantiini al-taagiiye di fi l-yoom al-akhiir. Wa ma yantiiha leyi ana wiheedi laakin yantiiha le kulla l-naas al-garmaaniin le yoom jaytah.
Jaahid le tajiini ajala

achaan akhuuna Diimaas yihibb al-dunya wa faat khallaani macha fi hillit Tasaluuniiki. Wa l-aakhariin ma fiihum. Akhuuna Kiriiski macha fi balad Khalaatiya wa akhuuna Tiitus macha fi balad Dalmaatiya.
Wa misil da, illa akhuuna Luukha wiheedah gaa’id ma’aayi. Amchi le akhuuna Markhus wa jiibah ma’aak. Hu yisaa’idni bilheen fi khidmit al-Rabb.
Wa ana rassalt akhuuna Tichiikus fi hillit Afasus.
Wa wakit taji, jiib ma’aak khalagi hana l-barid al-khalleetah ma’a akhuuna Kaarbus fi hillit Turuwaas. Wa jiib al-kutub kula. Wa fakkir fi l-kutub al-maktuubiin fi farwa wa ma tansaahum.
Wa Iskandar daggaag al-nahaas hu sawwa leyi fasil bilheen. Rabbina bas yijaaziih foog al-cheyy al-sawwaah leyi.
Angari’ minnah achaan hu khaalaf kalaamna mukhaalafa chadiide.
Fi l-marra al-awwalaaniiye al-jaabooni fi l-mahkama wa daafa’t le nafsi, ma fi naadum waahid al-wigif ma’aayi. Kulluhum khallooni marra waahid. Nas’al Rabbina ma yihaasibhum.

Laakin Rabbina wigif ma’aayi wa antaani gudra wa beeha ballakht al-bichaara kullaha ke wa naas min kulla l-umam sim’ooha. Wa fi l-yoom da, ana misil naadum al-duud yidoor yaakulah laakin al-Rabb najjaani min al-moot.
Wa hu yinajjiini min kulla cheyy fasil wa yiwaddiini aafe fi mamlakatah al-samaawiiye. Al-hamdulillah daayman wa ila l-abad. Aamiin.
Sallim Firiska wa Akiila wa naas beet Waani Sifirus.
Akhuuna Rastus ga’ad fi Kuruntus. Wa Turuufiimus bigi mardaan wa ana khalleetah fi hillit Miliitus. Jaahid achaan taji leyi gubbaal al-chite ma yabda.
Yuubulus wa Buudis wa Liinus wa Kuluudiya wa kulla l-akhwaan yisallumuuk.
Al-Rabb ma’aak. Aleekum al-ni’ma.
Jawaab minni ana Buulus abid hana Allah wa rasuul hana Isa al-Masiih, murassal achaan nijiib al-naas al-Allah ikhtaaraahum fi derib al-iimaan wa ni’arrifhum al-hagg al-yiwaddiihum fi l-takhwa.
Wa be sabab al-iimaan da, yarjo be acham al-haya al-abadiiye al-hu waa’adaahum beeha min gubbaal bidaayit al-dunya. Wa Allah abadan ma yakdib.
Wa fi l-wakit al-Allah haddadah, hu nazzal kalaamah fi l-Masiih. Wa Allah Munajjiina kallafaani be l-kalaam da wa amaraani achaan niballikhah.
Wa naktib leek inta ya Tiitus al-bigiit wileedi al-sahiih be l-iimaan al-nichaaruku foogah. Aleekum al-salaam wa l-rahma min Allah Abuuna wa l-Masiih Isa al-Munajji.

Ana khalleetak fi jaziirat Kiriit achaan ti’addil kulla cheyy al-lissaa’ ma indah nizaam adiil. Waajib tikhtaar min al-mu’miniin naas fi ayyi hille achaan yabgo leehum chuyuukh misil ana awwal wasseetak beyah.
Kulla cheekh waajib yabga naadum ma indah eeb. Khalli yabga raajil martah waahide bas wa iyaalah mu’miniin wa ma fi naadum waahid yuguul fooghum kadar humman faasdiin wa la aasiyiin.

Mas’uul al-mu’miniin hu wakiil Allah wa achaan da, waajib yabga naadum ma indah eeb. Waajib ma yabga naadum mustakbir raasah gawi wa la naadum al-baz’al ajala wa la sakkaari wa la siid al-machaakil wa la naadum al-biriid ribah al-haraam.
Laakin waajib yabga naadum kariim le l-diifaan wa l-yiriid al-kheer wa aagil wa saalih wa takhi wa yisabbit nafsah.
Hu waajib yakrub gawi al-kalaam al-sahiih al-allamnaah leyah achaan yichajji’ akhwaanah be ta’liim adiil wa yurudd le l-naas al-yikhaalufuuh.
Achaan fiyah naas katiiriin aasiyiin wa khachchaachiin wa bihajju kalaam saakit wa katiiriin minhum min Yahuud.
Laazim niwaggufuuhum achaan tallafo iimaan hana kulla l-naas fi buyuut waahidiin be ta’liimhum. Gaa’idiin yi’allumu kalaam ma adiil achaan yarbaho gurus be kidibhum.
Naadum waahid min al-Kiriitiyiin al-bigi leehum misil nabi gaal «Naas hana Kiriit humman daayman kaddaabiin wa misil haywaanaat khatiiriin. Humman bihibbu al-akil wa ma biriidu al-khidme».
Wa kalaamah da sahiih. Wa achaan da, ahrijhum be chidde achaan yagoodu saabtiin fi l-iimaan
wa ma yasma’o battaan al-gisas al-baatliin al-jaayiin min ust al-Yahuud wa la churuut al-naas al-abo al-hagg.
Le l-naas al-guluubhum taahiriin, kulla cheyy taahir. Wa laakin le l-naas al-guluubhum ma taahiriin wa le l-ma mu’miniin ma fi cheyy waahid taahir. Afkaarhum wa guluubhum ma taahiriin marra waahid.
Yuguulu ya’arfu Allah laakin be amalhum yakfuru beyah. Naas misil dool makruuhiin wa aasiyiin wa ma yanfa’o le ayyi amal al-kheer.
Laakin inta, allim al-akhwaan al-haal al-muwaafge ma’a l-ta’liim al-adiil.
Wassi al-chuyaab achaan yabgo aagliin wa muhtaramiin wa khalli baalhum yabga wasii’. Wa khalli yabgo saabtiin fi l-iimaan wa l-mahabba wa l-sabur.
Wa wassi al-ajaayiz kula achaan haalhin tabga takhiiye wa ma yabgan gawwaalaat wa la sakkaariyaat. Khalli yi’alliman akhwaathin kikkeef yisawwan al-kheer.
Wa be misil da, yichajji’an al-chaabbaat achaan yiriidan rujaalhin wa iyaalhin

wa yi’iichan be haal aagle wa taahire wa yukhuttan baalhin fi buyuuthin wa guluubhin yabgo buyud wa yasma’an kalaam rujaalhin. Wa be misil da, yisiddan al-derib le l-naadum al-yidoor yuguul kalaam fasil foog kalaam Allah.
Wa wassi al-subyaan achaan yisabbutu nufuushum.
Abga leehum masal fi kulla cheyy. Wassif leehum be haalak kikkeef yisawwu al-kheer. Wa khalliihum yichiifu kadar inta naadum mukhlis fi ta’liimak wa munkarib foogah.
Wa khalli kalaamak yabga saalim bilheen hatta naadum ma yalga foogah sabab le yaharjak. Wa be misil da, ayyi naadum al-yidoor yikhaalifak, yakhjal wa ma yagdar yuguul foogna cheyy fasil.
Wa wassi al-abiid achaan yasma’o kalaam siyaadhum lahaddi siyaadhum yardo beehum fi kulla cheyy. Wa khalli al-abiid ma yikhaalufuuhum
wa la yasurgu minhum cheyy. Wa laakin waajib yabgo leehum saadikhiin marra waahid achaan yiwassufu fi kulla cheyy kadar ta’liim hana Allah al-yinajjiina, hu sameh bilheen.
Akiid, ni’mat Allah baanat fi l-Masiih achaan tinajji kulla l-naas.
Wa hi tidarribna achaan nikhallu minnina al-kufur wa chahwaat al-dunya wa ni’iichu fi l-dunya be haal aagle wa saalhe wa takhiiye.
Wa narjo be acham al-yoom al-mubaarak al-yibiin foogah majd hana Ilaahna wa Munajjiina al-aziim, Isa al-Masiih.
Hu anta nafsah dahiiye le yafdaana min kulla fasaala wa yitahhir guluubna achaan nabgo leyah cha’abah halaalah munkaribiin fi amal al-kheer.
Wa khalaas kulla l-kalaam da, ooriihum beyah be kalaam waadih. Indak fooghum gudra achaan tichajji’hum wa tahrijhum hasab haalhum. Ma tikhalli naadum yahgirak.
Fakkirhum le l-akhwaan achaan yasma’o kalaam al-hakuuma wa l-kubaaraat wa yitaabu’u kalaamhum. Wa khalli yabgo jaahiziin le yisawwu al-kheer fi kulli haal.
Wa khalli ma yuguulu kalaam fasil foog ayyi naadum wa la yihaaruju. Wa khalli yihajju be nafas baarid wa be adab ma’a kulla l-naas.

Khalli ma nanso kadar awwal aniina kula misilhum, jaahiliin wa aasiyiin. Awwal aniina muwaddiriin wa chahwaatna malakoona wa guluubna marbuutiin fi halaat al-dunya. Awwal aniina aaychiin be l-fasaala wa l-husud, wa gaa’idiin nakraho al-naas wa l-naas yakrahoona.
Wa laakin wakit Allah Munajjiina bayyan mahannatah wa mahabbatah,
hu najjaana. Wa da ma be sabab ayyi amal saalih al-sawweenaah laakin be sabab rahmatah hu. Wa hu khassalaana be l-waaluuda al-taaniye wa antaana haya jadiide be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus
al-hu nazzalah foogna be kulla barakaatah be waasitat Munajjiina Isa al-Masiih.
Wa misil da, bigiina saalihiin be ni’matah wa aniina achmaaniin foog Rabbina kadar nawrusu al-haya al-abadiiye.

Wa l-kalaam da hagg. Wa nidoor kadar inta tifassir leehum kulla l-kalaam da achaan al-naas al-aamano be Allah yinkarubu be niiye waahide fi amal al-kheer. Kulla l-kalaam da sameh bilheen wa indah faayde le kulla l-naas.
Laakin angari’ min al-munaakhachaat al-ma induhum faayde misil munaakhachaat fi l-guram wa min al-mukhaasama wa l-mukhlaat fi tafsiir al-Tawraat. Kalaam misil da baatil wa ma indah faayde abadan.
Wa ayyi naadum al-yihajji kalaam chig wa yifarrig beyah al-akhwaan, hazzirah marra waahide wa hazzirah wa marra taaniye wa ba’ad da, agta’ ma’aayah al-alaakha.
Akiid ayyi naadum al-misil da, hu muwaddir wa khaati. Hu yijiib al-ikhaab fi raasah.
Nidoor nirassil leek Artimaas walla Tichiikus. Wa wakit waahid minhum yawsilak, a’asir nafsak achaan taji leyi fi hillit Nikuubulus. Ana chilt niiye nagood foogha tuul al-chite.
Wa fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss akhwaanna Zeenaas al-muhaami wa Abuluus, a’asir nafsak achaan tisaa’idhum fi safarhum wa khalli cheyy ma yigassir leehum fi l-derib.
Wa khalli kulla akhwaanna ya’arfu kikkeef yinkarubu fi amal al-kheer achaan yisaa’udu al-naas al-hawjaaniin be l-sahiih. Wa misil da akhwaanna ma yabgo naas al-hayaathum ma indaha faayde.
Kulla l-naas al-ma’aayi yisallumuuk. Wa sallim kulla l-mu’miniin al-yihibbuuna. Aleekum kulluku al-ni’ma.
Jawaab minni ana Buulus al-masjuun fi chaan al-Masiih Isa wa min akhuuna Timuutaawus. Wa naktib leek inta, ya habiibna wa rafiigna fi l-khidme Filimuun
wa jamaa’at al-mu’miniin al-yilimmu fi beetak wa akhutna Abfiyya wa akhuuna Arkhibba al-misilna yitaabi’ kalaam Rabbina misil askari yitaabi’ kabiirah.
Al-salaam wa l-rahma aleekum min Allah Abuuna wa Rabbina Isa al-Masiih.
Ya Filimuun, ayyi wakit al-nisalli, nifakkir foogak wa nachkur Allah Rabbi
achaan simi’t khabar iimaanak be Rabbina Isa wa be mahabbitak le kulla l-saalihiin.
Wa nas’al leek Allah kadar be l-alaakha al-indak ma’a akhwaanak al-mu’miniin talga irfe be ziyaada fi kulla l-kheer al-indina fi l-Masiih.
Wa be l-sahiih ya akhuui, khabar hana mahabbitak antaani farha kabiire wa chajaa’a chadiide achaan al-cheyy al-inta sawweetah farrahaahum le l-saalihiin.
Wa achaan da, nidoor natlub minnak cheyy waahid. Indi hagg fi l-Masiih le naamurak tawwaali achaan tisawwi al-cheyy al-nidoorah.
Wa laakin aniina nirraayado wa achaan da, yabga leyi akheer kan nigaddim leek talab wa inta tafhamni. Wa ana al-nihajji leek ana Buulus safiir al-Masiih al-haaliiyan masjuun fi chaanah.
Wa nigaddim leek talab fi chaan wileedi Alfaayid
Awwal hu ma indah leek faayde laakin be l-sahiih hassa’ hu bigi naadum indah faayde katiire bilheen. Hu indah faayde leek inta wa leyi ana kula.
Wa ana gaa’id nigabbilah leek ma’a l-jawaab da wa da gaasi leyi achaan nagram leyah bilheen.

Be l-sahiih, dawwart hu yagood hini ma’aayi. Ana gaa’id fi l-sijin fi chaan bichaarat al-Masiih wa na’arif kadar inta tidoor tisaa’idni. Wa kan Alfaayid yagood ma’aayi, hu yagdar yisaa’idni fi badalak inta.
Laakin ma dawwart nisawwi ayyi cheyy al-bukhussah illa kan inta khassadt beyah. Wa misil da, tisawwi al-kheer ma achaan ana asartak leyah laakin achaan inta chilt niiye leyah be nafsak.
Akuun fi chaan da bas, Allah farragah minnak wakit chiyya achaan hassa’ yigabbil leek wa yagood ma’aak daayman.

Wa ma yabga battaan abdak bas laakin yabga akheer min abdak. Hu bigi akhuuk al-mahbuub. Akiid ana nihibbah laakin inta waajib tihibbah be ziyaada achaan hu abdak al-khaali wa be Rabbina al-Masiih hu bigi akhuuk.
Zeen. Na’arif kadar inta taj’alni ana muchaarikak fi l-iimaan. Wa natlub minnak takrub Alfaayid gawi misil tidoor takrubni ana gawi.
Kan hu sawwa leek cheyy fasil walla indah deen fi raasah kula, kallifni beyah ana.

Ana Buulus karabt al-galam wa naktib al-kalaam da be iidi «Ana bas nikaffiik». Wa inta ligiit al-haya al-jadiide be kalaami ana bas wa laakin ma nidoor nihajji leek be l-cheyy al-waajib tisawwiih leyi.
Aywa ya akhuui, aniina akhwaan be l-Masiih wa nidoor minnak faayde chiyya. Antiini farah fi l-Masiih be ziyaada.
Ana mu’akkid kadar titaabi’ kalaami. Ana gaa’id naktib leek wa fi galbi na’arif inta tisawwi ziyaada min al-gultah leek kula.
Wa ma’a l-kalaam da, nuguul leek jahhiz leyi bakaan fi beetak achaan naji nagood ma’aak. Narja Allah yasma’ du’aaku fi chaani wa yatluguuni gariib.
Akhuuna Abfuraas al-gaa’id ma’aayi fi l-sijin fi chaan al-Masiih Isa, hu yisallimak.
Wa ma’aayah al-akhwaan al-yakhdumu ma’aayi Markhus wa Aristaarkus wa Diimaas wa Luukha.
Aleekum ni’mat al-Rabb Isa al-Masiih.
Fi l-zaman al-faat, Allah kallam le juduudna be waasitat al-anbiya iddat marraat wa be turug chig chig.
Wa hassa’ fi l-zaman al-akhiir, Allah kallam leena be waasitat Ibnah al-hu ja’alah wariis hana kulla cheyy. Wa beyah hu bas, Allah khalag al-dunya.

Wa Ibn Allah hu nuur Allah al-majiid wa suurat tabii’tah wa hu yahfad kulla cheyy be gudrat kalaamah. Wa wakit hu tahhar al-naas min zunuubhum khalaas, hu tala’ fi l-bakaan al-aali wa ga’ad jamb Allah al-Aziim fi nussah al-zeenaay.
Wa Allah antaah daraja kabiire bilheen min al-malaa’ika misil al-usum al-Allah antaah leyah afdal ziyaada min asaameehum.
Abadan ma fi malak al-Allah gaal leyah {Inta ibni wa l-yoom ana bigiit abuuk} walla battaan gaal {Ana nabga abuuh wa hu yabga ibni}.
Wa laakin wakit Allah jaab Ibnah al-bikir fi l-dunya, hu gaal {Khalli kulla malaa’ikat Allah yasjudu leyah}.
Wa l-kalaam al-maktuub al-bukhuss al-malaa’ika buguul {Hu ja’al malaa’ikatah misil al-riih wa khaddaamiinah dool misil lisaan al-naar}.
Wa laakin fi Ibnah buguul {Ya Allah, archak yagood ila l-abad wa tamluk fi mamlakatak be adaala kaamile.
Inta tihibb al-adil wa takrah al-zulum. Achaan da, Allah Rabbak antaak daraja wa mala galbak be l-farah wa khattaak fi bakaan aali foog min rufgaanak}.
Wa battaan buguul {Ya Rabb, fi l-bidaaya inta faracht al-ard wa inta bas khalagt al-samaawaat.
Humman yabgo ma fiihum laakin inta tagood daayman. Misil al-kiswe tagdam, humman kula yagdamo.
Wa misil naadum yatwi furaachah, inta kula tatwiihum wa tibaddilhum misil lubaas. Laakin inta abadan ma tikhayyir wa waktak abadan ma yikammil}.
Wa abadan ma fi malak al-Allah gaal leyah {Agood be iidi al-zeene lahaddi nukhutt udwaanak tihit rijileenak}.
Wa l-malaa’ika humman kulluhum arwaah khaddaamiin bas wa Allah yirassilhum achaan yakhdumu fi chaan al-naas al-yalgo al-naja.
Achaan da, waajib nukhuttu baalna wa nitaabu’u adiil al-kalaam al-simi’naah achaan ma nansooh wa namurgu min al-derib al-adiil.
Na’arfu kadar al-kalaam al-malaa’ikat Allah ballakhooh hagg wa ayyi naadum al-khaalafah aw abaah yijiib fi nafsah al-ikhaab al-waajib leyah.
Wa kikkeef aniina nanjo kan ma nitaabu’u adiil kalaam hana l-naja al-muhimma di ? Al-awwal ballakhaaha, hu Rabbina. Wa l-chuhuud al-sim’o kalaamah akkadooh leena.
Wa Allah kula chihid leyah be alaamaat wa ajaayib wa mu’jizaat al-chig chig wa be l-gudra al-hu antaaha le l-naas be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus hasab muraadaatah.
Al-aakhira, Allah ma khattaaha tihit sultat al-malaa’ika.
Laakin fi bakaan waahid al-Kitaab buguul {Chunu al-insaan wa maala tifakkir foogah ? Wa Bani Adam hu chunu wa maala tihimm beyah ?
Inta nazzaltah wa khatteetah tihit min al-malaa’ika le mudda gisayre. Wa ba’ad da, anteetah azama wa charaf.
Wa khatteet kulla cheyy tihit sultitah}.
Wa kan hu khatta kulla cheyy tihit sultitah, battaan ma faddal cheyy al-ma tihit sultitah. Wa haaliiyan ma nichiifu kulla cheyy tihit sultitah.

Laakin al-nichiifuuh, hu Isa. Wa Isa da, Allah nazzalah tihit min al-malaa’ika le mudda gisayre wa ba’ad da, Allah antaah azama wa charaf be sabab ta’abah wa mootah. Achaan be rahmat Allah, Isa daag al-moot fi chaan kulla l-naas.

Allah al-khalag kulla cheyy wa fi chaanah hu, kulla cheyy mawjuud, dawwar naas katiiriin yabgo iyaalah wa yadkhulu fi majdah. Wa achaan da, Allah sawwa cheyy muwaafig leehum. Hu rassal al-naadum al-yaftah leehum derib al-naja. Wa ja’al leyah al-ta’ab wa be ta’abah da, hu bigi al-Munajji al-kaamil.
Achaan al-yikhassis al-naas le Allah wa l-naas al-bigo mukhassasiin le Allah, kulluhum induhum abu waahid. Achaan da, Isa akkad kadar humman akhwaanah.
Hu buguul {Ana niballikh le akhwaani kadar inta Allah wa nahmudak fi ust al-jamaa’a}.
Wa hu buguul le Allah {Ana natwakkal aleek}. Wa buguul {Daahuuni ana ma’a al-naas al-Allah ja’alaahum iyaali}.
Al-iyaal dool kulluhum bachar wa achaan da, Isa kula bigi bachar misilhum. Wa bigi misilhum achaan be mootah hu yibattil gudrat Ibliis al-indah gudra foog al-moot.
Wa be da, Isa harraraahum le kulla l-naas al-khaayfiin min al-moot wa aaychiin tuul hayaathum misil abiid be sabab khoofhum.
Akiid, hu ma ja achaan yisaa’id al-malaa’ika laakin achaan yisaa’id iyaal Ibraahiim.
Wa be sabab da, laabudda yabga misil akhwaanah fi kulla cheyy wa yabga leehum raajil al-diin al-kabiir, al-rahiim wa l-amiin, wa yakhdim le Allah wa yikaffir zunuub al-cha’ab.
Hu zaatah ti’ib wa ga’ad tihit al-tajriba. Wa achaan da, hu kula yagdar yisaa’id al-naas al-gaa’idiin tihit al-tajriba.
Achaan da, ya akhwaani al-saalihiin al-Allah naadaaku kulluku le tadkhulu fi derbah, fakkuru fi Isa. Hu rasuul Allah wa raajil al-diin al-kabiir al-aniina mu’miniin beyah wa nachhado leyah.
Wa hu amiin le Allah al-kallafah be l-khidme di misil zamaan Muusa kula bigi amiin fi l-khidme al-Allah kallafah beeha fi kulla beetah.
Laakin al-ikraam al-waajib le Isa ziyaada min al-ikraam al-waajib le Muusa misil al-naadum al-bana al-beet mukarram ziyaada min al-beet al-hu banaah.
Wa kulli beet indah naadum al-banaah wa laakin Allah bas al-bana kulla cheyy.
Wa Muusa al-bigi amiin fi kulla beet Allah, hu gaa’id foogah achaan hu khaddaam Allah wa bigi chahaada le l-kalaam al-Allah yidoor yiballikhah fi l-mustakhbal.

Laakin al-Masiih bigi amiin achaan hu Ibn Allah al-mas’uul fi Beet Allah. Wa aniina be nafisna bas beetah, kan nagoodu saabtiin bala chakak wa nukhuttu achamna daayman fi l-Masiih al-aniina nilfachcharo beyah.
Achaan da, asma’o al-kalaam al-buguulah al-Ruuh al-Khudduus. {Al-yoom, kan tasma’o hiss Allah,
ma tigawwu ruuseenku misil juduudku al-abo ma taaba’o kalaamah fi wakit al-tajriba fi l-sahara.
Fi l-bakaan da, juduudku jarrabooni wa imtahanooni hatta kan chaafo fi’li
fi muddat arba’iin sana. Wa khalaas, ana zi’ilt min al-naas dool wa gult humman yiriidu yiwadduru nufuushum wa abadan ma ya’arfu derbi.
Wa fi za’ali, ana halaft wa gult abadan ma yadkhulu fi raahti}.
Ya akhwaani, khuttu baalku achaan galib hana ayyi naadum ma yabga fasil wa yaaba al-iimaan wa yamrug min derib Allah al-Hayy.
Achchaaja’o ambeenaatku kulla ma yoom, aywa, kulla ayyaam ninaaduuhum al-yoom, achaan al-zanib ma yukhuchch naadum minku wa yigawwi raasah.
Achaan kullina bigiina muchaarikiin fi l-Masiih kan sahiih nitaabu’u al-iimaan al-indina min al-bidaaya wa nagoodu saabtiin foogah lahaddi l-nihaaya.
Al-kitaab buguul {Al-yoom, kan tasma’o hiss Allah, ma tigawwu ruuseenku misil juduudku al-abo ma taaba’o kalaamah}.
Yaatumman al-naas al-sim’o kalaam Allah laakin abooh ? Humman kulla l-naas al-taaba’o Muusa wa marago min Masir.
Yaatumman al-naas al-Allah zi’il minhum fi muddit arba’iin sana ? Humman al-naas al-aznabo wa janaazaathum faddalo fi l-sahara.
Wa yaatumman al-naas al-Allah halaf leehum kadar ma yadkhulu fi raahtah ? Humman al-naas al-iso Allah.
Wa khalaas be l-kalaam da, na’arfu kadar ma gidro yadkhulu fi raahtah achaan ma induhum iimaan.
Khalli nakhaafo achaan wa’ad Allah al-bukhuss al-dakhuul fi raahtah lissaa’ gaa’id. Khalli ayyi naadum minku yadkhul fi l-raaha di bala fachal.
Aniina simi’na al-bichaara misil awwal humman kula sim’ooha. Laakin al-kalaam al-humman sim’ooh ma jaab leehum faayde achaan al-naas al-sim’ooh ma khiblooh be iimaan.

Wa aniina al-aamanna bas nadkhulu fi l-raaha al-Allah hajja beeha di wa gaal {Wa fi za’ali, ana halaft wa gult abadan ma yadkhulu fi raahti}. Wa na’arfu raahtah gaa’ide achaan amalah kammal min hu kawwan al-dunya.
Achaan al-kitaab kallam fi bakaan waahid be l-yoom al-saabi’ wa gaal {Allah kammal khidimtah wa l-yoom al-saabi’ hu chaalah yoom hana l-raaha}.
Wa battaan, Allah hajja be raahtah wakit hu gaal {Ma yadkhulu fi raahti}.
Wa khalaas, fi niiyit Allah fi naas yadkhulu fi raahtah wa laakin al-naas al-awwal sim’o bichaarat Allah ma dakhalo fi l-raaha di be sabab isyaanhum.

Wa battaan, Allah gata’ le l-naas yoom waahid wa sammaah «al-yoom». Wa siniin katiiriin ba’ad al-isyaan da, hu hajja beeha fi kalaam Dawuud al-aniina kallamna beyah al-gaa’id fi l-kitaab al-buguul {Al-yoom, kan tasma’o hiss Allah, ma tigawwu ruuseenku}.
Wa akiid kan Yachuu’a wadda al-cha’ab fi l-raaha khalaas, Allah ma yihajji battaan be yoom aakhar.
Wa be da, na’arfu kadar raaha aakhara misil raahat yoom al-sabit tifaddil le cha’ab Allah.
Wa l-naadum al-yadkhul fi raahat Allah yagiif min khidimtah misil Allah wigif min khidimtah.
Wa khalaas, khalli nijaahudu le nadkhulu fi l-raaha di achaan naadum minnina ma yiwaddir be sabab al-isyaan misil juduudna.

Kalaam Allah hayy wa gaadir wa yagta’ ziyaada min seef mutarrag jaayi wa jaayi. Hu yagta’ daakhal fi l-naadum marra waahid lahaddi yalhag al-bakaan al-yilimmu foogah al-nafas wa l-ruuh, wa l-udaam wa l-muchaach. Kalaam Allah yimayyiz al-afkaar wa l-niiye fi galib al-insaan.
Wa ma fi cheyy fi kulla l-khaliige al-mulabbad le Allah wa kulla cheyy makchuuf wa waadih giddaamah. Wa giddaamah hu bas, aniina kullina waajib naju be a’maalna achaan hu yihaasibna.
Ta’arfu kadar aniina indina raajil diin kabiir wa hu aziim wa tala’ foog fi l-samaawaat wa hu Isa Ibn Allah. Wa achaan da, khalli nakurbu gawi iimaanna be Isa al-nachhado leyah.
Raajil al-diin hanaana da, ya’arif du’ufna achaan hu kula jarrabooh be kulla l-tajriba misilna laakin hu abadan ma sawwa khata.
Wa khalaas, khalliina na’abudu Allah al-rahiim bala chakak achaan hu yarhamna. Wa nalgo minnah al-ni’ma al-tisaa’idna fi ayyi wakit al-nihtaajo leeha.
Ayyi raajil diin kabiir yikhtaarooh min al-naas achaan yakhdim le l-naas giddaam Allah wa yigaddim leyah dahaaya chig chig le zunuubhum.
Wa hu ya’arif kikkeef yihajji be nafas baarid le l-naas al-jaahiliin wa le l-naas al-muwaddiriin achaan hu kula insaan mu’arrad le l-du’uf.
Achaan da, laabudda hu yigaddim le Allah dahiiye le zunuubah hu, wa le zunuub al-cha’ab kula.
Wa naadum ma yidarrij nafsah le l-khidme al-mucharrafa di. Allah bas yinaadiih leeha misil zamaan hu naada leeha Haaruun
Wa l-Masiih kula ma darraj nafsah achaan yisawwi nafsah raajil diin kabiir, laakin al-darrajah hu Allah al-gaal leyah {Inta ibni wa l-yoom ana bigiit abuuk}.
Wa fi bakaan waahid fi l-kitaab, hu gaal {Inta raajil diin daayim misil Malkisaadikh
Wakit Isa gaa’id fi l-dunya, hu naada Allah al-yagdar yafza’ah min al-moot wa sa’alah be hiss aali wa dumuu’. Wa Allah khibil su’aalah achaan hu takhi.
Sahiih, Isa hu Ibnah laakin hu at’allam kikkeef yitaabi’ kalaam abuuh be l-ta’ab al-ti’ibah.
Wa khalaas, hu bigi al-Munajji al-kaamil wa bigi derib al-naja al-abadiiye le kulla l-naas al-yitaabu’u kalaamah.
Wa Allah ja’alah raajil diin kabiir misil Malkisaadikh.
Indina kalaam katiir nidooru nuguuluuh leeku fi l-ta’liim da laakin tafsiirah leeku gaasi leena achaan intu bigiitu mataamiis.

Intu al-tawwaltu fi l-derib, waajib tabgo mu’allimiin hana l-iimaan laakin be l-sahiih, intu hawjaaniin le duruus awwalaaniyiin hana kalaam Allah. Intu bigiitu misil al-sakhiir al-lissaa’ah hawjaan le laban ammah achaan hu ma jaahiz le l-akil.
Ayyi naadum al-aayich be l-laban lissaa’ sakhiir wa ma ya’arif derib al-saalihiin.
Wa l-ta’liim al-muhimm, hu misil al-laham wa hu waajib le l-naadum al-aagil fi l-iimaan al-darrasooh lahaddi ya’arif kikkeef yimayyiz al-kheer min al-charr.

Achaan da, khalli namchu giddaam le l-ta’liim al-waajib le l-naas al-aagliin fi l-Masiih wa nikhallu waraana al-duruus al-awwalaaniyiin. Ma nabdo battaan be ta’liim al-tooba min al-a’maal al-yiwaddu al-naas le l-moot wa ta’liim al-iimaan be Allah.
Ma ni’allumu battaan al-khasuul wa baruud al-tihaara wa khattiin al-iideen foog al-naas wa ma ni’allumu battaan bu’aas al-maytiin wa l-hisaab al-akhiir.
Wa khalaas, namchu giddaam kan Allah gaal aamiin.
Al-naas al-khiblo nuur Allah fi guluubhum wa irifo al-baraka al-Allah antaaha wa chaarako fi l-Ruuh al-Khudduus
wa daago al-kheer hana kalaam Allah wa ajaayib hana l-zaman al-jaayi fi l-akhiir,
humman dool kan abo al-iimaan, ma mumkin nigabbuluuhum le l-tooba. Achaan al-naas dool bigo misil gaa’idiin yaktulu Ibn Allah fi l-saliib marra taaniye wa yi’ayyuruuh giddaam al-naas.
Wa na’arfu kadar al-ard al-chirbat almi al-matar al-sabba foogha wa gawwamat al-nabaat al-indah faayde le l-naas al-haratooha, al-ard di Allah yibaarikha.
Laakin kan al-ard tigawwim chook wa haskaniit, hi ma indaha faayde wa la’anat Allah tigarrib leeha wa fi l-akhiir yiharruguuha.
Ya akhwaanna al-nihibbuku, hatta kan nihajju leeku be l-kalaam al-misil da kula, ma indina chakk foogku. Intu gaa’idiin fi l-derib al-adiil wa akiid hu derib al-naja.
Achaan Allah daayman aadil. Hu ma yansa khidmitku fi chaanah wa l-mahabba al-wassaftuuha leyah be musaa’aditku le akhwaanku al-saalihiin. Wa ya hassa’ intu gaa’idiin tisaa’uduuhum.
Wa nidooru kadar ayyi waahid minku yiwassif daayman al-niiye al-adiile al-misil di wa achamku yabga bala chakak lahaddi al-akhiir.
Wa kan tisawwu misil da, ma tabgo kaslaaniin laakin titaabu’u derib hana l-naas al-gaa’idiin saabtiin fi l-iimaan be l-sabur wa yawrusu barakat Allah al-waa’adaahum beeha.
Achaan Allah anta wa’ad le Ibraahiim wa halaf. Wa Allah halaf be nafsah achaan abadan ma fi cheyy akbar minnah le yahlif beyah.
Wa Allah gaal {Akiid ana nibaarikak wa zurriiytak tabga katiire}.
Wa khalaas, Ibraahiim sabar sabur gawi wa ligi al-cheyy al-Allah waa’adah beyah.
Akiid, al-naas fi aadithum yahlufu be cheyy akbar minhum wa kan naadum yi’akkid kalaamah be haliife khalaas, battaan kalaam ma fi.
Wa Allah kula, wakit hu yikallim le l-naas al-yawrusu wa’adah wa yidoor yi’akkid leehum kharaarah abadan ma yikhayyir, hu sabbatah leehum be haliife.

Wa fi chaan al-kalaam da, indina chajaa’a chadiide, awwal be wa’ad Allah wa battaan be haliifit Allah. Al-achya al-itneen dool akiid yukuunu achaan ma mumkin Allah yabga kaddaab. Wa khalaas, aniina al-tubna le Allah achaan nanjo, nakurbu gawi al-acham al-hu gaddamah leena.
Achamna fi Isa da misil witid saabit al-yisabbit nufuusna achaan Isa macha wara l-sitaar daakhal fi Beet Allah.
Aywa, Isa dakhal fi Beet Allah al-samaawi fi chaanna misil giid achaan hu bigi raajil diin kabiir ila l-abad misil Malkisaadikh.
Wa Malkisaadikh da, hu malik hana madiinat Chaaliim wa raajil diin hana Allah al-Aali. Wa hu laaga Ibraahiim wa baarakah wakit Ibraahiim mugabbil min al-bakaan al-annasar foogah fi l-muluuk.
Wa leyah hu, Ibraahiim anta al-uchur min kulla cheyy al-chaalah fi l-harb. Wa awwal cheyy, al-usum Malkisaadikh ma’anaatah al-malik al-saalih wa battaan hu malik Chaaliim ma’anaatah malik al-salaam.
Wa fi l-kitaab, hu ma indah abu wa la amm wa la gurma. Waktah ma indah bidaaya wa hayaatah ma indaha nihaaya laakin hu gaa’id daayman misil Ibn Allah wa hu raajil diin ila l-abad.
Fakkuru fi kubuuriitah. Ibraahiim zaatah antaah al-uchur min kulla cheyy al-chaalah fi l-harb wa Ibraahiim hu jiddina al-kabiir.

Wa l-naas al-min zurriiyit Laawi al-Allah ja’alaahum rujaal diin induhum izin fi l-Tawraat achaan yichiilu al-uchur min al-cha’ab, ya’ni min akhwaanhum. Wa akhwaanhum dool kula min zurriiyit Ibraahiim.
Laakin Malkisaadikh da, hu ma min zurriiyit Laawi misilhum wa hu chaal al-uchur min Ibraahiim wa baarakah wa Ibraahiim hu bas al-naadum al-Allah antaah al-wu’uud.
Wa bala chakk, al-naadum al-yanti al-baraka akbar min al-naadum al-yichiilha.
Wa misil da, al-Laawiyiin al-bichiilu al-uchur, humman al-naas al-yumuutu laakin Malkisaadikh al-bichiil al-uchur hayy hasab chahaadat al-kitaab.
Be masal aakhar, nagdaro nuguulu kadar iyaal Laawi al-bichiilu al-uchur zaathum anto al-uchur le Malkisaadikh be waasitat Ibraahiim
achaan Laawi lissaa’ah gaa’id fi sulub jiddah Ibraahiim wakit Malkisaadikh laagaah.

Wa khidmit rujaal al-diin al-min zurriiyit Laawi, hi asaas al-churuut al-Allah antaahum le l-cha’ab. Laakin kan al-naas yagdaro yabgo kaamiliin be khidmit rujaal al-diin al-min zurriiyit Laawi, maala jayyit raajil diin aakhar misil Malkisaadikh tabga muhimma wa ma raajil diin misil Haaruun
Wa akiid kan khidmit rujaal al-diin khayyarat, laabudda al-churuut kula yikhayyuru.
Wa Isa al-nihajju beyah ma min zurriiyit Laawi. Wa min gabiiltah, abadan ma fi naadum al-kallafooh be l-dahiiye.
Achaan Rabbina Isa hu min zurriiyit Yahuuza wa da ma’ruuf. Wa fi l-cheyy al-bukhuss gabiilat Yahuuza, Muusa abadan ma gaal cheyy fi rujaal al-diin.
Wa l-kalaam da yabga waadih bilheen wakit yaji raajil diin aakhar wa hu yichaabih Malkisaadikh.
Wa Isa bigi raajil diin be sabab gudrat hayaatah al-ma tikammil wa ma be sabab chart waahid min churuut al-Tawraat al-bukhuss zurriiyit al-naas.
Achaan al-kitaab chahad le Isa wa gaal {Inta raajil diin daayim misil Malkisaadikh}.
Wa khalaas, al-chart al-gadiim bigi baatil achaan ma yanfa’ wa ma indah gudra.
Akiid, churuut al-Tawraat ma ja’alo ayyi cheyy yukuun kaamil. Wa Allah jaab fi badalhum derib akheer ziyaada al-beyah na’abudu Allah be acham jadiid.
Wa battaan, fi cheyy aakhar wa hu haliifit Allah. Al-naas al-awwal bigo rujaal diin ma bigo be haliife.
Laakin Isa bigi raajil diin be haliifit Allah. Maktuub fi l-kitaab {Allah halaf wa yitimm kalaamah al-buguul : Inta raajil diin daayim}.
Be l-sabab da, indina mu’aahada akheer ziyaada wa Isa hu al-yadman leena al-mu’aahada di.
Wa battaan fi cheyy aakhar. Rujaal al-diin al-min zurriiyit Laawi dool katiiriin achaan humman yumuutu wa be da, ayyi waahid ma yagdar yitawwil fi khidimtah.
Laakin Isa, hu raajil al-diin al-yagood daayman achaan hu hayy ila l-abad.
Be l-sabab da, hu daayman yagdar yinajji al-naas al-ya’abudu Allah beyah hu, achaan hu hayy daayman wa gaa’id yas’al leehum Allah.
Wa be da, Isa bigi raajil al-diin al-kabiir al-muwaafig leena marra waahid. Hu saalih wa ma indah ayyi eeb wa hu daayman taahir. Hu ma’zuul ba’iid min al-muznibiin wa marfuu’ foog fi l-samaawaat.

Isa hu ma misil rujaal al-diin al-kubaar al-aakhariin dool. Ma waajib leyah kulla yoom yigaddim dahiiye awwal fi chaan zunuubah hu, wa ba’ad da dahiiye fi chaan zunuub al-cha’ab. La. Hu gaddam dahiiye waahide bas wa nihaa’iiye wakit gaddam nafsah fi l-saliib.

Aywa, churuut al-Tawraat khatto al-naas al-mu’arradiin le l-du’uf rujaal diin kubaar. Laakin al-haliife al-jaat ba’ad al-Tawraat khattat Ibn Allah raajil diin kabiir wa da hu al-Allah sawwaah kaamil ila l-abad.
Wa diihi zibdit al-kalaam. Aniina indina raajil diin kabiir misil al-fassarna beyah leeku. Hu ga’ad jamb arch Allah al-Aziim fi nussah al-zeenaay foog fi l-samaawaat.
Wa hinaak hu khaddaam fi l-Bakaan al-Mukhaddas al-sahiih wa di bas al-kheema al-ma banaaha insaan. Rabbina bas banaaha.
Wa kulli naadum al-yidarrujuuh raajil diin kabiir waajib yigaddim le Allah dahaaya chig chig wa achaan da, waajib le raajil diin hanaana kula yigaddim dahiiye.
Wa kan Isa gaa’id fi l-ard, hu abadan ma yabga raajil diin achaan fi l-ard rujaal diin aakhariin gaa’idiin al-yigaddumu al-dahaaya hasab churuut al-Tawraat.

Wa l-bakaan al-humman yakhdumu foogah da, alaama bas wa hi timassil al-Bakaan al-Mukhaddas al-samaawi. Wa da ma’ruuf achaan wakit Muusa yidoor yabni kheemat al-ibaada, Allah kallam leyah wa gaal {Khutt baalak achaan tisawwi kulla cheyy misil fi l-nizaam al-ana wassaftah leek fi l-hajar}.

Laakin hassa’ Isa indah khidme akheer ziyaada min khidmit rujaal al-diin al-awwalaaniyiin achaan hu bigi wasiit hana mu’aahada al-akheer ziyaada. Wa l-mu’aahada di indaha baraka ziyaada min al-baraka al-Allah waa’ad beeha awwal.
Wa kan al-mu’aahada al-awwal ma indaha eeb, ma waajib yibadduluuha be mu’aahada aakhara.
Wa laakin Allah hajja be eeb al-naas wakit hu haraj le l-cha’ab wa gaal {Yaji wakit waahid nisawwi ma’a Bani Israa’iil wa ma’a Bani Yahuuza mu’aahada jadiide. Da bas kalaam Allah.

Wa hi ma tabga misil al-mu’aahada al-ana sawweetha ma’a juduudhum wakit gudtuhum fi l-derib be salaama wa maragtuhum min balad Masir. Al-mu’aahada al-jadiide di ma tabga misil al-awwal achaan humman ma ga’ado saabtiin foogha. Wa achaan da, ana khalleethum. Da bas kalaam Allah.

Wa hassa’ diihi al-mu’aahada al-nisawwiiha ma’a Bani Israa’iil ba’adeen. Nukhutt churuuti fi fikirhum wa naktib kalaami fi guluubhum wa nabga leehum Rabbuhum wa humman yabgo cha’abi. Da bas kalaam Allah.
Wa naadum ma yi’allim rafiigah wa la yuguul le akhuuh «A’arif Allah» achaan kulluhum ya’arfuuni, al-sakhayyar wa l-kabiir.
Achaan nakhfir leehum khataayaahum wa ma nifakkir battaan fi zunuubhum dool}.
Wa fi l-kalaam da, hu hajja be mu’aahada jadiide. Wa be da, hu ja’al al-mu’aahada al-awwal gadiime. Wa ayyi cheyy al-yabga gadiim waktah kammal wa gariib yabga ma fiih.
Wa ta’arfu kadar fi l-mu’aahada al-awwal, fi churuut al-beehum al-naas waajib ya’abudu Allah wa fi bakaan mukhaddas fi l-ard.
Wa bano kheema wa fi nussaha al-barraani khatto al-faanuus wa l-tarbeeza al-yigaddumu foogha khubza le Allah. Wa l-nuss al-barraani da, usmah al-Bakaan al-Mukhaddas.
Wa l-nuss al-dakhlaani al-usmah al-Bakaan al-Mukhaddas Marra Waahid gaa’id khaadi le l-sitaar.

Wa da al-bakaan al-gaa’id foogah al-mukhbar al-dahabi wa sanduug al-ahad al-mamsuuh be dahab daakhal wa barra. Wa fi lubb al-sanduug da, fi jarr dahabi al-foogah al-manna wa asaat Haaruun al-sawwat nuwaar wa liihaan al-mu’aahada.

Wa fi dahar al-sanduug, fi suurat haywaanaat samaawiiye al-yiwassufu majd Allah wa humman mumattitiin janaaheehum giddaam wa mukhattiyiin beehum sidaadit al-sanduug wa da bakaan al-kaffaara. Wa laakin hassa’ da, ma nagdaro nifassuru ma’ana hana kulla l-achya dool.
Wa wakit kulla l-achya dool jahhazoohum khalaas, rujaal al-diin yadkhulu kulla yoom fi nuss al-kheema al-barraani achaan yisawwu khidmit al-ibaada.

Laakin raajil al-diin al-kabiir bas yadkhul fi nussaha al-dakhlaani. Wa hu ma yadkhul illa marra waahide bas fi l-sana. Wa hu ma yadkhul illa hu chaayil al-damm al-yigaddimah le Allah kaffaara le nafsah wa le khataayah al-cha’ab al-sawwoohum bala raayhum.
Wa dool churuut al-ibaada. Wa beehum al-Ruuh al-Khudduus yiwassif kadar dakhuul fi l-Bakaan al-Mukhaddas al-gaa’id fi l-samaawaat ma maftuuh maadaamit al-kheema al-awwal lissaa’ha gaa’ide.
Wa da masal hana l-zaman al-haali. Humman yigaddumu dahaaya laakin al-dahaaya dool ma yagdaro yisawwu al-naadum al-ya’abud Allah kaamil achaan ma yagdaro yikhayyuru galbah.
Wa nizaam al-ibaada da bukhuss al-akil wa l-churaab wa l-khasuul wa baruud al-tihaara. Al-churuut dool bukhussu jisim al-insaan bas wa humman yagoodu lahaddi wakit al-nizaam al-jadiid yaji.

Laakin al-Masiih ja wa bigi raajil al-diin al-kabiir al-jaab al-kheer al-katiir al-hassa’ gaa’id. Wa hu dakhal fi kheema kabiire wa kaamile min al-kheema al-awwal. Wa l-kheema di, insaan ma banaaha. Hi ma min makhluugiin al-dunya di.

Wa khalaas, hu dakhal dakhuul waahid wa nihaa’i fi l-Bakaan al-Mukhaddas. Wa l-damm al-hu chaalah ma hana khanam wa la hana ijil laakin chaal dammah hu. Wa be da, hu fadaana wa jaab leena al-naja al-daayme ila l-abad.
Awwal al-naas al-ajsaamhum bigo ma taahiriin yitahhuruuhum be rachchiin damm hana l-khanam wa l-bagar wa rumaad al-bagara al-harragooha.

Laakin damm al-Masiih indah gudra ziyaada. Al-Masiih ma indah eeb wa hu gaddam nafsah le Allah be gudrat al-Ruuh al-abadi. Wa akiid dammah yitahhir guluubna min al-a’maal al-yiwaddu al-naas le l-moot wa yijahhizna le na’abudu Allah al-Hayy.

Wa fi chaan da, hu bigi waasta ambeen Allah wa l-naas wa beyah hu, jaat al-mu’aahada al-jadiide. Al-naas al-Allah naadaahum yalgo al-warasa al-abadiiye al-Allah waa’ad beeha achaan naadum waahid maat wa mootah da fadaahum min ayyi khata al-sawwooh fi wakit al-mu’aahada al-awwal.
Wa mootah muhimm achaan kan naadum khatta wasiiye maktuuba hana warasa, waajib yi’akkudu moot al-naadum al-khattaaha.
Achaan al-wasiiye al-maktuuba ma yakhdumu beeha illa ba’ad moot siidha. Ma yitabbuguuha wakit hu lissaa’ hayy.
Achaan da, al-mu’aahada al-awwal kula ma kaanat illa be daffigiin al-damm.

Wakit Muusa ballakh kulla l-cha’ab be kulla wasaaya al-Tawraat khalaas, hu chaal damm hana ijil wa khanam wa almi wa suuf ahmar wa firi’ hana zuufa wa rachcha beehum al-Kitaab zaatah wa kulla l-cha’ab.
Wa gaal «Daahu damm al-mu’aahada al-Allah wassaaku beyah».
Wa be misil da, hu rachcha al-damm fi l-kheema wa fi kulla l-mawaa’iin al-yista’maloohum fi bakaan al-ibaada.
Aywa, hasab churuut al-Tawraat, katiir min al-achya yitahhuruuhum be damm. Wa kan damm ma daffagooh, khufraan ma fi.

Achaan da, laabudda yitahhuru be l-dahaaya dool al-kheema al-gaa’ide fi l-ard al-hi alaama hana al-kheema al-samaawiiye. Laakin al-kheema al-samaawiiye zaatha waajib yitahhuruuha be dahaaya al-afdal ziyaada.

Wa l-Bakaan al-Mukhaddas al-Isa al-Masiih dakhal foogah ma al-bakaan al-banaah al-insaan. Al-bakaan da suura bas hana l-bakaan al-sahiih. Laakin hu dakhal fi l-sama zaatah achaan yahdar giddaam Allah fi chaanna fi l-wakit al-haali.
Wa hu dakhal laakin ma achaan yigaddim nafsah iddat marraat. Hu ma misil raajil al-diin al-kabiir al-yadkhul kulli sana fi l-Bakaan al-Mukhaddas Marra Waahid chaayil ma’aayah damm al-bahaayim.
Kan yabga misil da, waajib yat’ab iddat marraat min bidaayit al-dunya. Laakin hu ja marra waahide bas fi aakhir al-zaman achaan yigaddim nafsah misil dahiiye al-beeha yamha al-zunuub.
Akiid, maktuub le ayyi naadum yumuut marra waahide wa ba’ad al-moot yaji al-Hisaab.
Wa l-Masiih kula gaddam nafsah marra waahide achaan yamha zunuub hana naas katiiriin. Wa hu yaji battaan marra taaniye ma achaan yamha al-zunuub wa laakin achaan yinajji al-naas al-gaa’idiin yarjooh.

Al-Tawraat ma yiwassif be l-sahiih kulla l-kheer al-yaji waraayah. Hu yiwassif alaamtah bas. Wa hasab al-Tawraat, waajib yigaddumu daayman nafs al-dahaaya kulla sana. Wa l-dahaaya dool abadan ma yagdaro yitahhuru al-naas al-yidooru ya’abudu Allah tihaara kaamile.

Wa kan sahiih al-dahaaya dool yitahhuru al-naas, akiid gaddimiinhum yagiif laakin ma wagaf. Achaan kan al-naas al-ya’abudu Allah ligo al-tihaara al-kaamile khalaas, humman ma yifakkuru battaan fi zunuubhum.
Laakin kulla sana be l-dahaaya dool al-naas yifakkuru fi zunuubhum.
Damm al-bagar wa damm al-khanam abadan ma yagdar yamha zunuub al-naas.
Achaan da, wakit al-Masiih ja fi l-dunya, hu gaal {Al-dahaaya al-chig chig inta ma dawwartuhum wa achaan da bas, inta jahhazt leyi jismi al-bachari.
Wa inta ma ridiit be l-dahaaya al-muharragiin wa be l-dahaaya al-yigaddumuuhum le l-zunuub.
Wa khalaas, ana gult ya Allah, daahu ana jaahiz. Ana jiit achaan nisawwi muraadaatak hasab al-kalaam al-bukhussini al-maktuub fi l-Kitaab}.

Wa fi l-kalaam da, hu gaal awwal «Inta ma dawwart wa la ridiit be l-dahaaya al-chig chig wa la be l-dahaaya al-muharragiin wa la be l-dahaaya al-yigaddumuuhum le l-zunuub». Wa fi l-kalaam da, hu hajja be l-dahaaya al-waajib yigaddumuuhum hasab kalaam al-Tawraat.
Wa ba’ad da, hu gaal «Daahu ana jaahiz. Ana jiit achaan nisawwi muraadaatak». Wa misil da, hu yibattil al-dahaaya al-awwal wa yisabbit dahiiyit nafsah.
Wa be muraadat Allah di, Isa al-Masiih gaddam jismah marra waahide bas wa l-dahiiye di sawwatna khaassiin le Allah.
Wa ayyi raajil diin yagiif kulla yoom be tuulah fi bakaan khidimtah wa yigaddim nafs al-dahaaya al-abadan ma yagdaro yamho al-zunuub.
Laakin Isa al-Masiih gaddam dahiiye waahide bas le kulla l-zunuub wa khalaas hu ga’ad jamb Allah fi nussah al-zeenaay.
Wa hassa’ yarja lahaddi Allah yukhutt udwaanah tihit rijileenah.
Achaan al-Masiih gaddam dahiiye waahide bas wa beeha hu kammal marra waahid tihaarat al-naas al-yabgo khaassiin le Allah.
Wa le l-kalaam da, al-Ruuh al-Khudduus kula chaahid. Achaan awwal hu gaal
{Diihi al-mu’aahada al-nisawwiiha ma’aahum ba’adeen. Nukhutt churuuti fi fikirhum wa naktib kalaami fi guluubhum. Da bas kalaam Allah}.
Wa ba’ad da, hu gaal {Wa ma nifakkir battaan fi zunuubhum wa isyaanhum}.
Wa wakit Allah khafar le l-naas zunuubhum, battaan humman ma yigaddumu dahiiye le l-zunuub.
Khalaas ya akhwaani, akiid be sabab damm Isa nagdaro nadkhulu fi l-Bakaan al-Mukhaddas be galib raagid.
Wa l-derib al-maftuuh leena da, jadiid wa hayy wa hu Isa. Wa be gaddimiin jismah, hu fatah leena al-sitaar.
Wa aniina akiid indina raajil diin aziim wa hu mas’uul fi Beet Allah.

Achaan da, khalli na’abudu Allah be galib mukhlis wa be iimaan kaamil. Na’arfu kadar al-Masiih tahhar guluubna min al-charr be rachchiin dammah wa ajsaamna kamaan misil naddafnaahum be l-almi al-saafi.
Khalli nachhado daayman le Rabbina al-achamna gaa’id foogah wa ma nichakkuku achaan al-antaana al-wa’ad hu daayman saadikh.
Khalli nifakkuru fi kikkeef nichchaaja’o ambeenaatna achaan nitaabu’u derib al-mahabba wa nisawwu al-kheer.
Khalli daayman nulummu wa ma nitaabu’u aadat al-naas al-waahidiin al-ma yidooru yilimmu. Ta’arfu kadar yoom jayyit al-Masiih garrab wa achaan da achchaaja’o be ziyaada.
Kan irifna kalaam al-hagg wa ba’adeen nugummu nitaabu’u al-zunuub, ma yifaddil leena dahiiye battaan al-tamha al-zunuub.
Ma fi cheyy yifaddil leena illa narjo be khoof chadiid al-Hisaab wa naar hana khadab Allah al-taakul kulla l-aasiyiin.
Na’arfu kadar ayyi naadum al-aba ma taaba’ churuut Tawraat Muusa wa chuhuud itneen aw talaata chihido foogah, al-naadum da yaktuluuh bala mahanna.

Haay ! Fakkuru fi l-ikhaab al-waajib le l-naadum al-khalla derib al-Masiih ! Hu hagar Ibn Allah hugra chadiide. Damm al-mu’aahada al-beyah hu bigi khaass le Allah, hu chaafah misil chokhol saakit. Wa ayyar al-Ruuh al-jaab leyah al-rahma.
Na’arfu Allah bas al-gaal {Al-taar hanaayi, ana bas al-nichiilah}. Wa battaan maktuub {Allah yihaasib cha’abah}.
Wa fi l-Hisaab, ayyi naadum aasi yakhaaf khoof chadiid bilheen giddaam Allah al-Hayy.
Fakkuru fi l-wakit al-faat wakit awwal marra dakhaltu fi nuur Allah. Fi l-wakit daak, intu jaahadtu wa sabartu sabur gawi fi l-diige.
Waahidiin minku ayyaroohum giddaam al-naas wa ta’’aboohum wa waahidiin minku chaarako ma’a l-naas fi l-ta’ab al-ti’ibooh.
Wa intu hanneetu le l-masaajiin. Wa wakit al-naas nahabo maalku, intu farhaaniin achaan iriftu kadar induku maal akheer minnah gaa’id giddaamku wa l-maal da yagood daayman.
Wa fi kulla l-kalaam da, nuguul leeku ma tikhallu iimaanku al-gawi al-yijiib leeku ajur kabiir bilheen.
Hassa’ da, waajib tasburu sabur gawi wa tisawwu muraadat Allah achaan talgo minnah al-baraka al-hu waa’ad beeha.
Achaan fi l-kitaab, Allah gaal {Al-wakit al-faddal chiyya bas achaan al-jaayi yaji wa ma yi’akhkhir battaan.
Wa l-naadum al-saalih yi’iich be l-iimaan wa kan yikaskis minnah, ana ma narda beyah}.
Wa laakin aniina ma min al-naas al-yikaskusu wa yamchu le l-halaak. Aniina min naas al-iimaan wa namchu le l-naja.
Al-naadum al-indah iimaan, hu mul’akkid kadar hu yalga al-cheyy al-yarjaah wa ma indah chakk fi l-cheyy al-lissaa’ ma binchaaf.
Fi chaan iimaanhum, naas al-zamaan ligo rida Allah.
Be l-iimaan, na’arfu kadar Allah khalag al-dunya be kilmitah. Wa achaan da, na’arfu kulla cheyy al-binchaaf ja be tariigat al-ma tinchaaf.

Wa be l-iimaan, Haabiil gaddam dahiiye le Allah. Wa dahiiytah bigat akheer min khurbaan Gaabiil. Wa fi chaan iimaanah, Allah ridi beyah wa ja’alah naadum saalih. Allah khibil hadaayaah wa be da chihid leyah. Wa Haabiil maat laakin be iimaanah, ya hassa’ kula hu gaa’id yihajji.
Wa be l-iimaan, Akhnuukh rafa’ooh achaan ma yumuut. Hu ma anlaga achaan Allah bas rafa’ah. Wa l-kitaab yachhad le Akhnuukh kadar gubbaal ma yinrafi’, Allah ridi beyah.
Wa ma fi naadum bala iimaan Allah yarda beyah. Achaan ayyi naadum al-yidoor ya’abud Allah waajib yi’aamin kadar Allah mawjuud wa yanti ajur le l-naas al-yidooru ya’arfuuh.

Wa be l-iimaan, Nuuh simi’ kalaam Allah. Awwal Allah khabbarah be l-cheyy al-yidoor yabga wa lissaa’ ma binchaaf. Wa Nuuh bana safiina achaan yinajji ahal beetah. Wa be da, Nuuh sabbat kadar naas al-dunya khaatiyiin. Wa hu waras bakaan fi lubb al-saalihiin. Wa l-bakaan da naadum ma yagdar yalhagah illa be l-iimaan.
Allah naada Ibraahiim achaan yamchi fi bakaan al-ba’adeen yabga warasatah. Wa be l-iimaan, Ibraahiim simi’ kalaam Allah wa gamma macha gubbaal ma ya’arif al-bakaan al-waajib yamchi leyah.

Wa be l-iimaan, hu bigi ajnabi fi l-balad al-Allah waa’adah beeha wa sakan foogha fi kheema wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub sawwo nafs al-cheyy. Wa humman kula wurraas mislah wa yarjo nafs al-cheyy al-Allah waa’adah beyah.
Wa Ibraahiim gaa’id yarja be acham al-madiina al-jaaye al-asaasha saabit al-Allah bas yikhattitha wa yabniiha.
Wa be l-iimaan, Saara kula ligat gudra wa bigat khalbaane wakit hi ajuuz ma indaha gudra le l-waaluuda. Laakin Allah waa’adaaha be wileed wa hi gaalat Allah saadikh.
Wa khalaas misil da, raajil waahid al-chayyab marra waahid bigi abu hana zurriiye katiire bilheen misil al-nujuum. Wa misil ramla hana khachum al-bahar, hi ma tinhasib.

Wa kulla naas al-zamaan dool maato saabtiin fi l-iimaan. Humman ma ligo al-cheyy al-Allah waa’ad beyah laakin chaafooh min ba’iid wa firho beyah. Wa i’tarafo kadar humman saakniin fi usut naas al-ard misil ajaanib wa diifaan.
Wa l-naas al-yihajju kalaam misil da yiwassufu kadar yidooru watan aakhar yaskunu foogah.
Fikirhum ma fi l-balad al-marago minha. Kan dawwaro yigabbulu foogha, yagdaro.
Laakin be l-sahiih, humman yidooru watan akheer min al-marago minnah wa hu al-watan al-samaawi. Achaan da, Allah akkad kadar hu Rabbuhum wa humman cha’abah wa jahhaz leehum madiina.
Wa be l-iimaan, Ibraahiim wakit Allah jarrabah gaddam Ishaakh dahiiye. Al-naadum al-Allah antaah al-wa’ad chaal niiye achaan yigaddim wileedah al-wahiid dahiiye le Allah.
Wa Ishaakh da, hu al-wileed al-Allah awwal hajja beyah wa gaal {Min Ishaakh bas, talga al-zurriiye al-binaaduuha be usmak}.
Wa Ibraahiim khatta fi fikrah kadar Allah indah gudra yigawwim al-maytiin kula. Wa be l-sahiih, wakit Allah gabbal Ishaakh le Ibraahiim, Ibraahiim chaaf wileedah misil maat wa gamma min al-moot.
Wa be l-iimaan, Ishaakh talab le Yaakhuub wa Isuu be l-baraka al-tukhuss al-cheyy al-yabga ba’adeen.
Wa be l-iimaan, Yaakhuub wakit hu gariib yumuut, talab baraka le ayyi waahid min awlaad Yuusuf wa arrakkaz fi raas asaaytah achaan ya’abud Allah.
Wa be l-iimaan, Yuusuf wakit hu gariib yumuut, hajja be marigiin Bani Israa’iil min Masir al-yabga ba’adeen. Wa amaraahum yichiilu udaamah ma’aahum.
Wa be l-iimaan, waaldeen Muusa ba’ad wildooh, labbadooh muddat talaata chahar. Chaafo kadar wileedhum sameh bilheen wa humman ma khaayfiin min al-malik wa ma taaba’o amrah.
Wa be l-iimaan, Muusa wakit hu kibir khalaas, aba ma khalla al-naas yinaaduuh wileed bineeyit Fir’oon.
Wa hu chaal niiye achaan yat’ab ma’a cha’ab Allah wa aba ma yitaabi’ al-zunuub wa chahwaat al-dunya al-ma daayme.
Hu khatta fi fikrah kadar al-mu’yaar al-yaji foogah fi chaan al-Masiih indah faayde kabiire min kulla dahab Masir. Wa hu khatta fikrah fi l-ajur al-giddaamah.
Wa be l-iimaan, hu marag min Masir ma khaayif min za’al al-malik. Hu taaba’ Allah be sabur gawi misil naadum gaa’id yichiif Allah al-ma binchaaf.
Wa be l-iimaan, Muusa assas Iid al-Fisha wa rachcha al-damm leechaan malak al-moot al-gaa’id yaktul awlaad al-bikir ma yaji foog awlaad Bani Israa’iil.
Wa be l-iimaan, al-cha’ab gata’o al-Bahar al-Ahmar wa hu bigi leehum misil ard yaabse. Laakin wakit al-Masriyiin dawwaro yisawwu nafs al-cheyy, al-almi akalaahum.
Wa be l-iimaan, daraadir hana madiinat Ariiha waga’o wa da ba’ad Bani Israa’iil haawagooha sab’a marraat.
Wa be l-iimaan, Raahaab al-charmuuta ma hilikat ma’a l-aasiyiin achaan hi dayyafat al-naas al-jo raakho al-balad.
Wa nuguul chunu battaan ? Al-wakit ma yitimm leyi nihajji be Gid’uun wa Baaraakh wa Chamchuun wa Yiftaah wa Dawuud wa Samuwiil wa l-anbiya.
Be l-iimaan, humman chaalo mamaalik wa tabbago al-adaala wa ligo min Allah al-cheyy al-waa’adaahum beyah wa saddo khuchuum al-diidaan.
Wa be l-iimaan, katalo naar mugargire wa nijo min suyuuf udwaanhum wa ligo al-gudra al-awwal ma induhum wa bigo gawiiyiin fi l-harb wa tarado al-duyuuch al-hajamo baladhum.
Wa fi awiin al-maytiinhin ba’aso wa gabbalo leehin. Fi naas waahidiin azzaboohum wa abo ma yamurgu min al-azaab achaan yidooru yab’aso ba’adeen fi haal akheer min haal udwaanhum.
Wa mu’miniin waahidiin achchammato leehum wa jaladoohum wa waahidiin rabatoohum wa sajanoohum.
Wa l-mu’miniin rajamoohum wa gata’oohum min usut be munchaar wa kataloohum be seef. Wa humman daayman raaykhiin laabsiin firaaw al-khanam wa himlo fagur chadiid wa diige wa zulum.
Humman muwaddiriin wa gaa’idiin yuruukhu fi l-sahara wa l-hujaar. Humman saakniin fi karaakiir wa nugaar al-ard. Wa humman dool akheer marra waahid min naas al-dunya al-taradoohum.
Wa kulla l-naas dool, Allah ridi beehum be sabab iimaanhum laakin ma ligo al-baraka al-Allah waa’adaahum beeha.
Achaan min awwal Allah khaddar cheyy akheer leena wa khidmit Allah ma tabga kaamile fooghum illa ma’aana aniina.

Wa fi l-kalaam da, indina chuhuud katiiriin bilheen al-yachhado leena min ayyi jiihe. Achaan da, khalli nikhallu minnina kulla cheyy al-yiwaggifna wa kulla zanib al-yidoor yakrubna. Wa khalli namchu giddaam bala kasal misil naas fi sabag lahaddi nihaayat al-derib al-aniina jaariyiin foogah.

Khalli nukhuttu baalna fi Isa al-fatah leena derib al-iimaan wa kammalah. Min ba’iid, hu chaaf al-farah al-gaa’id giddaamah wa be da, himil ta’ab al-saliib wa ma fakkar fi l-eeb al-khattooh foogah. Wa hassa’ hu gaa’id jamb arch Allah fi nussah al-zeenaay.
Fakkuru foogah hu, al-himil al-bukhud al-chadiid hana l-muznibiin. Fakkuru foogah achaan intu ma tabgo kaslaaniin wa la khawwaafiin.
Intu ga’adtu saabtiin be juhud chadiid fi ust al-muznibiin laakin lahaddi hassa’ lissaa’ ma daffago dammuku.
Hal nisiitu wasiiyit Allah al-tuguul intu awlaadah ? {Ya wileedi, kan Allah gaa’id yi’addibak, khutt baalak wa kan hu yaharjak, ma taksal.
Achaan Allah yi’addib al-naadum al-yiriidah wa yudugg ayyi wileed al-hu khiblah}.
Al-ta’ab al-intu tasburu foogah waajib leeku fi chaan al-addibiin. Allah yi’aamilku misil raajil yi’aamil iyaalah. Ween al-wileed al-abuuh ma yi’addibah ?
Kan al-addibiin al-yaji foog kulla l-iyaal min abbahaathum ma yaji foogku, khalaas intu ma awlaad abuuku da, intu furuukh.

Fakkuru battaan. Ayyi naadum minnina indah abu insaani al-addabah wa abbahaatna dool aniina nikarrumuuhum. Wa da yi’akkid leena be ziyaada kadar waajib nakhbalo addibiin Allah Abuuna al-samaawi wa beyah nahyo.
Achaan abbahaatna addaboona addibiin al-humman yardo beyah le mudda gisayre. Laakin Allah yi’addibna le faayditna achaan nabgo naasah al-saalihiin.
Fi l-wakit al-haali, kulla addibiin gaasi leena wa ma yantiina farah. Laakin ba’adeen, al-naas al-darraboohum be addibiin yalgo minnah al-salaam wa l-haal al-saalhe.
Achaan da, khallu minku al-kasal. Gawwu iideenku wa rijileenku al-ma induhum gudra.
Addulu al-derib al-turuukhu foogah achaan al-rijil al-tawja’ku tabra wa ma tamrug.
Sawwu juhud achaan ti’iichu be l-salaam ma’a kulla l-naas wa iichu be haal saalhe al-balaaha ma fi naadum yichiif Rabbina.
Aw’u baalku achaan naadum minku ma yadhar nafsah min ni’mat Allah. Aw’u baalku achaan naadum ambeenaatku ma yitallif nafsah wa yitallif al-jamaa’a misil hu chadara fi usutku al-iyaalha induhum samm.
Aw’u baalku achaan naadum ma yabga zannaay walla misil Isuu al-isi Allah. Hu baa’ hagg al-bukuuriiye fi chaan akle waahide bas.
Wa ta’arfu kadar ba’adeen hu dawwar yalga al-baraka wa laakin abuuh abaah. Wakt al-tooba faat khalaas wa Isuu ma ligi al-baraka hatta kan hu talabaaha be baki kula.
Khuttu baalku achaan al-hajar al-intu jiitu giddaamah da, ma al-hajar al-naas yagdaro yalmasooh. Hu ma al-hajar al-gaa’idiin foogah naar mugargire wa dalaam azrag wa riih chadiide.
Wa l-hajar hana l-wakit daak ansama’ foogah hiss al-buug wa l-hiss al-kalaamah khawwaf al-cha’ab lahaddi al-naas al-sim’ooh chahado achaan ma yihajji leehum battaan.
Achaan al-amur al-Allah amaraahum beyah gaasi leehum wa ma himlooh. Hu gaal kadar al-yalmas al-hajar waajib yarjumuuh, hatta kan bahiime kula.
Aywa, al-cheyy al-chaafooh khawwafaahum marra waahid lahaddi Muusa kula gaal «Ana gaa’id narjif min al-khoof».

Laakin al-hajar al-intu jiitu giddaamah, hu Jabal Sahyuun al-gaa’ide foogah madiinat Allah al-Hayy al-hi Madiinat al-Khudus al-samaawiiye. Jiitu giddaam al-malaa’ika al-ma binhasubu min al-katara al-laammiin le l-ibaada.
Wa jiitu giddaam jamaa’at awlaad al-bikir al-asaameehum musajjaliin fi l-sama. Wa jiitu giddaam Allah al-yihaasib kulla l-naas. Wa jiitu giddaam al-saalihiin al-Allah sawwaahum kaamiliin.
Wa jiitu giddaam Isa wasiit hana l-mu’aahada al-jadiide wa giddaam dammah al-marchuuch al-yikallim leena kalaam akheer min kalaam damm Haabiil.

Aw’u baalku achaan ma taabo al-yikallim leeku. Achaan kan naas al-zamaan ma nijo wakit abo ma taaba’o kalaam Muusa al-hazzarhum fi l-ard, kikkeef aniina nanjo kan naabo kalaam al-yihazzirna min al-sama ?
Awwal hissah hazza al-ard wa hassa’ hu waa’adaana wa gaal {Marra waahide battaan, nihizz al-ard wa nihizz ma’aaha al-sama kula}.
Wa l-kalaam da «Marra waahide battaan» yiwassif be kalaam waadih al-khaliige tinhazza wa tinrafi’. Wa be da, al-ma yinhazza bas yifaddil.
Wa khalaas, khalli nachkuru Allah achaan hu gaa’id yantiina mamlaka saabte al-ma tinhazza. Wa khalli na’abudu Allah be l-ibaada al-yarda beeha saajidiin giddaamah be takhwa.
Achaan Allah al-na’abuduuh da, hu misil naar al-tahrig kulla cheyy.
Agoodu saabtiin fi l-mahabba al-akhawiiye.
Ma tikhallu minku faddiliin al-diifaan al-yajuuku. Ta’arfu kadar naas waahidiin dayyafo malaa’ika wa ma irifoohum.
Fakkuru fi akhwaanku al-gaa’idiin fi l-sijin wa aj’alo nafisku misil gaa’idiin ma’aahum. Wa akhwaanku al-gaa’idiin yahmalo al-ta’ab, fakkuru fooghum achaan jisimhum misil jisimku.
Kulluku ihtarumu al-akhiide. Ma tikhallu al-zina yinajjis saraayirku al-zawjiye achaan ta’arfu kadar Allah yihaasib kulla l-zannaayiin, kan maakhdiin walla ma maakhdiin.
Angar’u min hubb al-maal wa abgo radyaaniin be l-induku achaan Allah gaal {Abadan ma nikhalliik wa ma nansaak}.
Achaan da, kullina nagdaro nuguulu bala chakak {Al-yisaa’idni hu Allah. Achaan da, ma nakhaaf. Al-insaan yagdar yisawwi leyi chunu ?}.
Fakkuru adiil fi kubaaraatku al-awwal ballakho leeku kalaam Allah. Fakkuru fi haalhum, fi l-haya wa fi l-moot. Khalli iimaanku yabga misil iimaanhum.
Isa al-Masiih abadan ma yilkhayyar. Hu gaa’id min awwal wa l-yoom wa ila l-abad.

Ma tikhallu al-naas al-jaayiin be ta’aaliim ajiibiin aw chig chig yiwadduuku fi derib aakhar. Akheer galib al-insaan yalga gudra min ni’mat Allah bas wa ma min al-akil al-khaass. Wa l-naas al-taaba’o al-ta’liim da, ma ligo minnah faayde.
Al-dahiiye al-aniina nichaaruku foogha di, rujaal al-diin al-yakhdumu fi kheemat al-ibaada ma induhum hagg yaakulu minha.
Achaan raajil al-diin al-kabiir yadbah bahaayim dahiiye le l-zunuub wa yijiib al-damm fi l-Bakaan al-Mukhaddas. Laakin laham al-bahaayim dool, yimarruguuh barra min al-mukhayyam wa yiharruguuh.
Wa achaan da, Isa kula marag wa ti’ib barra min al-madiina achaan yisawwi al-cha’ab khaass le Allah be daffigiin dammah hu.
Achaan da, khalli namurgu wa namchu leyah barra min al-mukhayyam wa nahmalo nafs al-mu’yaar al-hu himlah.
Achaan hini fi l-ard ma indina madiina al-titawwil laakin aniina gaa’idiin nukhuttu baalna fi l-madiina al-taji ba’adeen.
Fi badal al-dahiiye hana al-bahaayim, khalli na’abudu Allah be derib Isa wa nigaddumu le Allah daayman dahiiyit al-chukur ma’anaatha al-chukur al-jaayi min al-naas al-yachhado Allah.
Sawwu daayman al-kheer wa assaa’ado ambeenaatku achaan di bas al-ibaada al-Allah yarda beeha.

Asma’o kubaaraatku wa taabu’u kalaamhum adiil. Achaan humman gaa’idiin yifakkuru foogku wa ya’arfu kadar humman mas’uuliin minku giddaam Allah al-yihaasibhum. Khalli khidmithum di tabga leehum farha. Kan tabga leehum gaasiye, intu kula ma talgo minha faayde.
As’alo Allah leena. Aniina mu’akkidiin kadar niiyitna mukhlisa wa nidooru nitaabu’u haal adiile fi kulla cheyy.
Wa battaan natlubu minku be ziyaada, as’alo leyi ana achaan Allah yirassilni leeku fi wakit gariib.
Wa khalaas, Allah Rabb al-salaam ba’as min ust al-maytiin Rabbina Isa al-bigi raa’i kabiir hana khanam Allah be sabab damm al-mu’aahada al-abadiiye.

Wa khalli Allah yijahhizku be kulla cheyy al-adiil achaan tisawwu muraadaatah wakit hu gaa’id yisawwi foogku kulla cheyy al-hu yarda beyah be waasitat Isa al-Masiih. Wa l-hamdulillah daayman wa ila l-abad. Aamiin.
Ya akhwaani, nachhadku achaan tasma’o be sabur al-kalaam al-nirassilah leeku le nichajji’ku. Katabt leeku kalaam chiyya bas.
Nidoor intu ta’arfu kadar akhuuna Timuutaawus talagooh min al-sijin wa kan hu yaji leyi ajala, namchu leeku ma’aayah wa nichiifuuku.
Sallumu kulla kubaaraatku wa kulla l-saalihiin. Al-akhwaan al-min Itaaliya yisallumuuku.
Aleeku kulluku rahmat Allah. Aamiin.
Jawaab minni ana Yaakhuub abid Allah wa abid Rabbina Isa al-Masiih. Wa nirassilah leeku intu ummat Allah al-muchattatiin fi kulli bakaan. Al-salaam aleekum.
Ya akhwaani, afraho fi ayyi ta’ab al-yajiiku
achaan ta’arfu kadar al-ta’ab yijarrib iimaanku wa kan ga’adtu saabtiin fi ust al-ta’ab, tabgo naas sabuuriin.
Wa khalli saburku yabga tamaam achaan beyah tabgo kaamiliin wa gaadriin fi ayyi haal wa ma fi cheyy yigassir leeku.
Kan naadum minku fikir gassar leyah, khalli yatlubah min Allah wa Allah yantiih achaan Allah yanti le kulla l-naas be ziyaada be juud wa bala kalaam.
Wa khalli yatlubah be iimaan saabit wa bala chakak. Naadum kan yichakkik, hu misil al-challaal al-fi l-bahar al-riih tichiilah wa tihizzah.
Naadum misil da, khalli ma yukhutt fi aglah kadar yalga cheyy min Rabbina
achaan al-naadum da galbah itneen wa hu ma saabit fi ayyi cheyy al-bisawwiih.
Al-mu’min al-miskiin, khalli yafrah achaan Allah darrajah.
Wa l-mu’min al-siid al-maal kula, khalli yafrah achaan hu maskan nafsah giddaam Allah. Wa siyaad al-maal ma yitawwulu misil al-gechch.

Kan al-harraay tala’at wa bigat haamiye bilheen, hi tutugg al-gechch wa l-gechch da yabga asfar wa yaybas wa yumuut. Be misil da bas, siyaad al-maal kula yumuutu fi usut khidmithum wa yabgo ma fiihum.

Mabruuk le l-naadum al-yasbur fi l-ta’ab al-yijarrib iimaanah. Achaan wakit al-tajriba di kammalat khalaas, hu yalga baraka kabiire. Wa l-baraka di, hi al-haya al-Allah waa’ad beeha al-naas al-yihibbuuh.
Kan naadum yidoor yaznib, khalli ma yuguul «Allah gaa’id yilizzini fi l-zunuub». Achaan abadan ma fi cheyy yilizz Allah fi l-zanib wa Allah hu abadan ma yilizz naadum fi l-zanib.
Laakin kan naadum yidoor yaznib, chahwatah bas gaa’ide tilizzah achaan al-zanib bigi leyah halu.
Wa l-chahwa hi misil mara al-takhlab wa talda sakhiir. Al-chahwa kula takhlab wa sakhiirha hu al-zanib. Wa l-zanib kan khalaas kibir yisabbib al-moot.
Ya akhwaani al-nihibbuku, ma tukhuchchu nufuusku.
Kulla cheyy al-adiil wa kulla cheyy al-tamaam jaayi min Allah bas wa yanzil min Allah khaalig al-nuur. Al-wata tikhayyir, tabga leel wa nahaar, laakin Allah abadan ma yikhayyir wa ma indah dalaam.
Be waasitat kalaam al-hagg, Allah antaana al-haya al-jadiide be niiyitah hu achaan aniina nabgo giddaam kulla cheyy al-hu khalagah.
Ya akhwaani al-nihibbuku, fakkuru sameh. Khalli ayyi naadum yabga daayman jaahiz achaan yasma’. Khalli ma yugumm ajala yihajji wa ma yaz’al ajala
achaan naadum kan za’laan ma yisawwi al-amal al-saalih al-Allah bidoorah.
Achaan da, khallu minku kulla cheyy al-yinajjisku wa kulla cheyy al-fasil wa akhbalo be maskana al-kalaam al-Allah khattah fi guluubku. Al-kalaam da indah gudra achaan yinajjiiku.
Tabbugu kalaam Allah wa ma tasma’ooh saakit. Kan tasma’ooh bas wa ma titabbuguuh, intu tukhuchchu nufuusku.
Kan naadum simi’ kalaam Allah wa ma tabbagah, hu yabga misil naadum al-yichiif wijhah fi amchawwaafa
wa yichiif kikkeef wijhah wa khalaas yamchi wa tawwaali ke yansaah.

Wa laakin kan naadum yukhutt baalah adiil fi l-wasaaya al-yantuuna al-hurriiye wa yinkarib fooghum wa ma yasma’hum le yansaahum wa yitabbighum, al-naadum da Allah yibaarikah fi kulla cheyy al-bisawwiih.
Al-naadum al-buguul hu yitaabi’ adiil al-diin wa laakin ma yalzam lisaanah, hu da gaa’id yukhuchch nafsah wa diinah ma yanfa’.
Daahu al-diin al-mukhlis al-ma indah eeb giddaam Abuuna Allah, aawunu al-ataama wa l-awiin al-rujaalhin maytiin al-gaa’idaat fi l-ta’ab wa agiifu ba’iid min al-achya al-yinajjusu naas fi l-dunya.
Ya akhwaani, intu mu’miniin be Rabbina al-majiid Isa al-Masiih wa fi derbah hu, waajib ma tifarrugu been al-naas wa tichiifu al-waahid akheer min al-aakhar.

Masalan, tisawwu chunu kan naaseen yaju fi malammitku wa l-waahid siid al-maal laabis khulgaan samhiin marra waahid wa indah khaatim hana dahab wa l-waahid miskiin laabis khalag waskhaan wa mucharrat ?
Kan intu tikarrumu siid al-maal al-khulgaanah samhiin wa tuguulu leyah «Alfaddal giddaam, ya l-sayyid» wa tuguulu le l-miskiin «He inta da, yalla, agood tihit hinaak»,
intu tichiifu al-waahid akheer min al-aakhar wa tahguru al-miskiin. Wa kan tisawwu misil da, sawweetu nufuusku misil hukkaam al-guluubhum fasliin.

Ya akhwaani al-nihibbuku, asma’o kalaami. Allah ikhtaar al-naas al-masaakiin fi l-dunya di achaan yalgo baraka ziyaada be derib al-iimaan wa yawrusu al-mamlaka al-Allah waa’ad beeha al-naas al-yihibbuuh.
Laakin intu hagartu al-miskiin da. Yaatumman al-yazlumuuku ? Yaatumman al-yakurbuuku wa yathamooku giddaam al-hukkaam ? Ma siyaad al-maal walla ?
Dool humman bas al-yi’ayyuru al-usum al-kariim hana Rabbuku.
Kan be l-sahiih, intu gaa’idiin titaabu’u wasaaya hana Mamlakat Allah al-gaa’idiin fi l-Kitaab al-buguulu {Hibb akhuuk misil tihibb nafsak}, khalaas da adiil.
Wa laakin kan intu gaa’idiin tifarrugu al-naas, intu gaa’idiin taznubu. Wa l-wasaaya dool yahkumu foogku achaan intu khaatiyiin.
Ta’arfu kadar al-naadum al-taaba’ kulla l-wasaaya wa laakin khaalaf fi wasiiye waahide bas, hu khaalaf kulla l-wasaaya.
Ta’arfu kadar Allah gaal {Ma tazna} wa gaal battaan {Ma taktul}. Wa kan naadum katal dimme wa laakin ma zana, khalaas hasab al-wasaaya hu khaati.
Hajju kalaam adiil wa sawwu amal adiil wa abadan ma tanso kadar Allah yihaasibku hasab al-wasaaya al-yantu al-hurriiye.
Kan naadum ma yarham al-naas, Allah kula ma yarhamah fi yoom al-Hisaab. Wa laakin naadum al-yarham al-naas ma yakhaaf min yoom al-Hisaab.
Ya akhwaani, ween al-faayde kan naadum buguul hu indah iimaan wa laakin ma yisawwi al-amal al-waajib le l-mu’min ? Iimaan nafar da yagdar yinajjiih walla ?
Masalan, kan chiftu akhwaanku walla akhwaatku ma induhum lubaas wa ma induhum cheyy hana akil
wa tuguulu leehum «Amchu aafe, Allah yaftah leeku», chunu al-faayde kan intu ma tantuuhum al-cheyy al-humman hawjaaniin leyah ?
Wa khalaas, kan naadum buguul hu indah iimaan laakin ma yisawwi al-amal al-waajib le l-mu’min, iimaanah da ma yanfa’ marra waahid !

Laakin akuun naadum buguul «Inta indak iimaan wa laakin ana nisawwi al-amal». Ana nurudd leyah «Inta ma tagdar tiwassif leyi iimaanak bala al-amal al-tisawwiih». Wa leyi ana, niwassif leek iimaani be l-amal al-nisawwiih.
Inta mu’min kadar Allah waahid. Da sameh. Al-chawaatiin kula mu’miniin kadar Allah waahid laakin humman yarjufu min al-khoof khaayfiin min al-azaab al-yaji fooghum.
Inta al-fikrak baatil, hal tidoor ana niwassif leek kan inta mu’min be Allah wa ma tisawwi al-amal al-waajib, iimaanak ma yanfa’ ?
Fakkuru fi abuuna Ibraahiim. Allah ja’alah naadum saalih be sabab al-amal al-sawwaah. Hu khassad yadbah wileedah Ishaakh dahiiye.
Chiifu, Ibraahiim iimaanah bigi kaamil achaan hu sawwa al-cheyy al-Allah bidoorah.
Be misil da bas, tamma al-cheyy al-maktuub fi l-Kitaab al-buguul {Ibraahiim aaman be Allah wa Allah ja’alah naadum saalih} wa Allah ja’alah rafiigah.
Chiifu, Allah yaj’al al-naas saalihiin be l-cheyy al-bisawwuuh wa ma be l-iimaan wiheedah.
Bigi misil da le Raahaab al-charmuuta kula. Allah ja’alaaha saalhe be sabab al-cheyy al-hi sawwatah. Hi labbadat al-marsuuliin wa maragathum be derib aakhar
